fielddef.descr: The number of business days used in the determination of physical settlement. Its precise meaning is dependant on the context in which this element is used.

fielddef.name: PhysicalSettlMaximumBusinessDays
fielddef.descr: A maximum number of business days. Its precise meaning is dependant on the context in which this element is used. Intended to be used to limit a particular ISDA fallback provision.

fielddef.name: PhysicalSettlTermXID
fielddef.descr: A named string value referenced by UnderlyingSettlTermXIDRef(41315).

fielddef.name: NoPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligations
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of deliverable obligation applicable for physical settlement. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Deliverable_Obligation_Types for code list for applicable deliverable obligation types.

fielddef.name: PhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationValue
fielddef.descr: Physical settlement deliverable obligation value appropriate to PhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationType(40210). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Deliverable_Obligation_Types for applicable obligation type values.

fielddef.name: NoPayments
fielddef.descr: Number of additional settlement or bullet payments.

fielddef.name: PaymentType
fielddef.descr: Type of payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentPaySide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party paying the payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party receiving the payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency in which PaymentAmount(40217) is denominated. Uses ISO 4271 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentAmount
fielddef.descr: The total payment amount.

fielddef.name: PaymentPrice
fielddef.descr: The price determining the payment amount expressed in terms specified in PaymentPriceType(40919) and expressed in market format.

fielddef.name: PaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted payment date.

fielddef.name: PaymentBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Payment date adjustement Business Day Convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business centeral calendar used for date adjustment of the payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted payment date.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionValue
fielddef.descr: Applicable value for LegMarketDisruptionEvent(41468).

fielddef.name: PaymentDiscountFactor
fielddef.descr: The value representing the discount factor used to calculate the present value of the cash flow.

fielddef.name: PaymentPresentValueAmount
fielddef.descr: The amount representing the present value of the forecast payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentPresentValueCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the PaymentPresentValueAmount(40225) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlStyle
fielddef.descr: Payment settlement style.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. When LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlRateSource(40087) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains a value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: PaymentText
fielddef.descr: Free form text to specify additional information or enumeration description when a sdtandard value does not apply. Identifies the payment type when PaymentType(40213) = 99 (Other).

fielddef.name: NoPaymentSettls
fielddef.descr: Number of additional settlements or bullet payments.

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlAmount
fielddef.descr: The payment settlement amount.

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the PaymentSettlAmount(40231) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentSettlPartyIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of parties identified in the additional settlement or bullet payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlPartyID
fielddef.descr: The payment settlement party identifier.

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlPartyIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of PaymentSettlPartyID(40234) value (e.g. BIC).

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlPartyRole
fielddef.descr: Identifies the role of PaymentSettlPartyID(40234) (e.g. the beneficiary's bank or depository institution).

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlPartyRoleQualifier
fielddef.descr: Qualifies the value of PaymentSettlPartyRole(40236).

fielddef.name: NoPaymentSettlPartySubIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of sub-party IDs to be reported for the party.

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlPartySubID
fielddef.descr: Party sub-identifier, if applicable, for PaymentSettlPartyRole(40236).

fielddef.name: PaymentSettlPartySubIDType
fielddef.descr: The type of PaymentSettlPartySubID(40239) value.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreams
fielddef.descr: Number of swap streams in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegStreamType
fielddef.descr: Type of swap stream.

fielddef.name: LegStreamDesc
fielddef.descr: A short descriptive name given to the payment stream, e.g. CDS, Fixed, Float, Float2, GBP. The description has no intrinsic meaning but should be arbitrarily chosen by the remitter as a reference.

fielddef.name: LegStreamPaySide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party paying the stream.

fielddef.name: LegStreamReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party receiving the stream.

fielddef.name: LegStreamNotional
fielddef.descr: Notional, or initial notional value for the payment stream. The LegPaymentSchedule component should be used for specifying the steps.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the LegStreamNotional(40246) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegStreamText
fielddef.descr: Free form text to specify additional information or enumeration description when a standard value does not apply.

fielddef.name: LegStreamEffectiveDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted effective date for the payment.

fielddef.name: LegStreamEffectiveDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for determining the adjusted effective date or relative effective date. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegStreamEffectiveDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar for date adjustment of the instrument's leg stream effective date or relative effective date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegStreamEffectiveDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the effective date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamEffectiveDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative effective date offset.

fielddef.name: LegStreamEffectiveDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative effective date offset.

fielddef.name: LegStreamEffectiveDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative effective date offset.

fielddef.name: LegStreamEffectiveDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted effective date for the payment. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTerminationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted termination date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTerminationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The instrument leg stream's termination, or relative termination, date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTerminationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustments of termination, or relative termination, date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTerminationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the termination date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTerminationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative termination date offset.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTerminationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative termination date offset.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTerminationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative termination date offset.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTerminationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted termination date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationPeriodBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for the adjusted calculation period. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationPeriodBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument leg's stream calculation period, e.g. "GLBO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegStreamFirstPeriodStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first calculation period start date if before the effective date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamFirstPeriodStartDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to determine the first calculation period start date. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegStreamFirstPeriodStartDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument leg's first calculation period start date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegStreamFirstPeriodStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted first calculation period start date, if it is before the effective date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamFirstRegularPeriodStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first start date of the regular calculation period, if there is an initial stub period.

fielddef.name: LegStreamFirstCompoundingPeriodEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The end of the initial compounding period.

fielddef.name: LegStreamLastRegularPeriodEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted last regular period end date if there is a final stub period.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency at which calculation period end dates occur.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency at which calculation period end dates occur.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of end dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. Used only to override the roll convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: NoCashSettlDealers
fielddef.descr: Number of dealers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of payment stream applicable to the swap stream associated with the instrument leg.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamMarketRate
fielddef.descr: Used only for credit index trade. This contains the credit spread ("fair value") at which the trade was executed. The market rate varies over the life of the index depending on market conditions. This is the price of the index as quoted by trading desks.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamDelayIndicator
fielddef.descr: Applicable to credit default swaps on mortgage backed securities to specify whether payment delays are applicable to the fixed amount. Residential mortgage backed securities typically have a payment delay of 5 days between the coupon date of the reference obligation and the payment date of the synthetic swap. Commercial mortage backed securities do not typically have a payment delay, with both payment dates (the coupon date of the reference obligation and the payment date of the synthetic swap) being on the 25th of each month.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency that the stream settles in (to support swaps that settle in a currency different from the notional currency). Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamDayCount
fielddef.descr: The day count convention used in the payment stream calculations.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamAccrualDays
fielddef.descr: The number of days from the adjusted calculation period start date to the adjusted value date, calculated in accordance with the applicable day count fraction.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamDiscountType
fielddef.descr: The method of calculating discounted payment amounts.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamDiscountRate
fielddef.descr: Discount rate. The rate is expressed in decimal, e.g. 5% is expressed as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamDiscountRateDayCount
fielddef.descr: The day count convention applied to the LegPaymentStreamDiscountRate(40286).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingMethod
fielddef.descr: Compounding method.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there is an initial exchange of principal on the effective date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInterimPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there are intermediate or interim exchanges of principal during the term of the swap.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there is a final exchange of principal on the termination date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to determine the adjusted payment date. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument leg's stream payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of payments.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of payments.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of end dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. Used only to override the roll convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFirstPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The first unadjusted payment date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLastRegularPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted last regular payment date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the payment dates are relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamResetDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the reset dates are determined with respect to each adjusted calculation period start date or adjusted calculation period end date. If the reset frequency is specified as daily this element must not be included.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamResetDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to determine the adjusted reset date. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamResetDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the reset date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamResetFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for frequency of resets.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamResetFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with frequency of resets.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamResetWeeklyRollConvention
fielddef.descr: Used to specify the day of the week in which the reset occurs for payments that reset on a weekly basis.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the initial fixing date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to determine the adjusted initial fixing date. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument leg payment stream's initial fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted initial fixing date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the fixing date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to determine the adjusted fixing date. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument leg payment stream's fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted fixing date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRate
fielddef.descr: The rate applicable to the fixed rate payment stream.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: The leg instrument payment stream's fixed payment amount. In a CDS, this can be an alternative to LegPaymentStreamRate(40326).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateOrAmountCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency in which LegPaymentStreamFixedAmount(40327) or LegPaymentStreamRate(40326) is denominated. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFutureValueNotional
fielddef.descr: The future value notional is normally only required for certain non-deliverable interest rate swaps (e.g. Brazillian Real (BRL) vs. CETIP Interback Deposit Rate (CDI)). The value is calculated as follows: Future Value Notional = Notional Amount * (1 + Fixed Rate) ^ (Fixed Rate Day Count Fraction). The currency is the same as the stream notional.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFutureValueDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted value date of the future value amount.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The payment stream floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The source of the payment stream floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the payment stream's floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the payment stream's floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The basis points spread from the index specified in LegPaymentStreamRateIndex(40331).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. It is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate. The rate is expressed as a decimal, e.g. 5% is represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. This is assumed to be the first required reset rate for the first regular calculation period. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. The initial rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: When averaging is applicable, used to specify whether a weighted or unweighted average method of calculation is to be used.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: The specification of any provisions for calculating payment obligations when a floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInflationLagPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the inflation lag period. The lag period is the offsetting period from the payment date which determineds the reference period for which the inflation index is observed.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInflationLagUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the inflation lag period.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInflationLagDayType
fielddef.descr: The leg instrument's payment stream inflation lag period day type.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInflationInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the inflation index level from multiple points. The most common is linear method.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInflationIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The inflation index reference source.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInflationPublicationSource
fielddef.descr: The publication source, such as relevant web site, news publication or a government body, where inflation information is obtained.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInflationInitialIndexLevel
fielddef.descr: Initial known index level for the first calculation period.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInflationFallbackBondApplicable
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether a fallback bond as defined in the 2006 ISDA Inflation Derivatives Definitions, sections 1.3 and 1.8, is applicable or not. If not specified, the default value is "Y" (True/Yes).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFRADiscounting
fielddef.descr: The method of Forward Rate Agreement (FRA) discounting, if any, that will apply.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableRefCurrency
fielddef.descr: Non-deliverable settlement reference currency. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to determine the fixing date for the non-deliverable currency. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the intrument leg's fixing date for the non-deliverable currency, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the non-deliverable Fixing dates are relative to anchor dates.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegSettlRateFallbackRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: NoLegNonDeliverableFixingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of fixing dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegNonDeliverableFixingDate
fielddef.descr: The non-deliverable fixing date. Type of date is specified in LegNonDeliverableFixingDateType(40369).

fielddef.name: LegNonDeliverableFixingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: LegSettlRateFallbackReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. When LegSettlRateFallbackRateSource(40366) = 3(ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. When PaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlRateSource(40371) = 3(ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: SettlRateFallbackRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentSchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of swap schedules in the repeating group

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleType
fielddef.descr: Type of schedule.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStubType
fielddef.descr: Indicates to which stub this schedule applies.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The date on which the value is adjusted, or calculated if a future value notional for certain non-deliverable interest rate swaps (e.g. Brazillian Real (BRL) vs. CETIP Interback Deposit Rate (CDI)), or the start date of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The end date of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentSchedulePaySide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party paying the step schedule.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party receiving the step schedule.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleNotional
fielddef.descr: The notional value for this step schedule, or amount of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency for this step schedule. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRate
fielddef.descr: The rate value for this step schedule.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The spread value for this step schedule.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or a short position.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the step schedule.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: The explicit payment amount for this step schedule.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixedCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the fixed amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStepFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multipler of the step frequency.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStepFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the step frequency.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStepOffsetValue
fielddef.descr: The explicit amount that the notional changes on each step date. This can be a positive or negative amount.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStepRate
fielddef.descr: The percentage by which the notional changes on each step date. The percentage is either a percentage applied to the initial notional amount or the previous outstanding notional, depending on the value specified in LegPaymentScheduleStepRelativeTo(40395). The percentage can be either positive or negative.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStepOffsetRate
fielddef.descr: The explicit amount that the rate changes on each step date. This can be a positive or negative value.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStepRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the LegPaymentScheduleStepRate(40393) or LegPaymentScheduleStepOffsetValue(40392) should be applied to the initial notional or the previous notional in order to calculate the notional step change amount.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted fixing date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleWeight
fielddef.descr: Floating rate observation weight for cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the notional amount schedule is calculated using a varying notional currency, this is the anchor date for the fixing date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the instrument leg payment schedule's fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The fixing date once the adjustment has been performed.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingTime
fielddef.descr: The fxing time associated with the step schedule.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Business center for determining fixing time. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangePaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Relative date for interim exchanges arising from changes in spot currency exchange amount or notional amortization.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Interim exchange date adjustment business day convention.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the instrument leg payment schedule's interim exchange date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values. Omit if the same as SchedFxNotionalFixingDateBusinessCenters.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The interim exchange date once the adjustement has been performed.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentScheduleRateSources
fielddef.descr: Number of rate sources in the repeating group

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateSourceType
fielddef.descr: Rate source type.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleReferencePage
fielddef.descr:
Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source.
For FX, the reference page to the spot rate to be used for the reference FX spot rate.
When RateSource(1446) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStubs
fielddef.descr: Number of stubs in the repeating group

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubType
fielddef.descr: Stub type.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubLength
fielddef.descr: Optional indication whether stub is shorter or longer than the regular swap period.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubRate
fielddef.descr: The agreed upon fixed rate for this stub.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: A fixed payment amount for the stub.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubFixedCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the fixed payment amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex
fielddef.descr: The stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The source for the stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexRateSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or a short position.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the stub index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The cap rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A floor rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndexFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2
fielddef.descr: The second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2Source
fielddef.descr: The source for the second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2CurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2CurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2RateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the second floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2RateSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from the second floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2RateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or a short position.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2RateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the second stub index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2CapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the second floating rate. The cap rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubIndex2FloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the second floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A floor rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: NoLegProvisions
fielddef.descr: Number of provisions in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionType
fielddef.descr: Type of provisions.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date of the provision.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The instrument leg provision's date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for the date adjustment of the instrument leg provisions, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted date of the provision.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionDateTenorPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the leg provision's tenor period.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionDateTenorUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the leg provision's tenor period.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCalculationAgent
fielddef.descr: Used to identify the calculation agent. The calculation agent may be identified in LegProvisionCalculationAgent(40456) or in the ProvisionParties component.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionSinglePartyBuyerSide
fielddef.descr: If optional early termination is not available to both parties then this component identifies the buyer of the option through its side of the trade.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionSinglePartySellerSide
fielddef.descr: If optional early termination is not available to both parties then this component identifies the seller of the option through its side of the trade.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseStyle
fielddef.descr: The instrument provision option exercise style.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseMultipleNotional
fielddef.descr: A notional amount which restricts the amount of notional that can be exercised when partial exercise or multiple exercise is applicable. The integral multiple amount defines a lower limit of notional that can be exercised and also defines a unit multiple of notional that can be exercised, i.e. only integer multiples of this amount can be exercised.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseMinimumNotional
fielddef.descr: The minimum notional amount that can be exercised on a given exercise date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseMaximumNotional
fielddef.descr: The maximum notional amount that can be exercised on a given exercise date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionMinimumNumber
fielddef.descr: The minimum number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionMaximumNumber
fielddef.descr: The maximum number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date. If the number is not specified, it means that the maximum number of options corresponds to the remaining unexercised options.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseConfirmation
fielddef.descr: Used to indicate whether follow-up confirmation of exercise (written or electronic) is required following telephonic notice by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlMethod
fielddef.descr: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.3. Cash Settlement Methods, paragraph (e).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of settlement. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlCurrency2
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of settlement for a cross-currency provision. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlQuoteType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of quote to be used.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlQuoteSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of quote information.

fielddef.name: BusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionText
fielddef.descr: Free form text to specify additional information or enumeration description when a standard value does not apply.

fielddef.name: NoLegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDates
fielddef.descr: Number of provision cash settlement payment dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDate
fielddef.descr: Cash settlement payment date, unadjusted or adjusted depending on LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateType(40521).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The instrument provision's option exercise date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument leg provision's option exercise date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseEarliestDatePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the first (and possibly only) exercise date in the exercise period.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseEarliestDateUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the first (and possibly only) exercise date in the exercise period.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for subsequent exercise dates in the exercise period following the earliest exercise date. An interval of 1 day should be used to indicate an American style exercise period.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with subsequent exercise dates in the exercise period following the earliest exercise date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first day of the exercise period for an American style option.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option exercise start date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted first day of the exercise period for an American style option.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExercisePeriodSkip
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the referenced date schedule that are between each date in the relative date schedule. Thus a skip of 2 would mean that dates are relative to every second date in the referenced schedule. If present this should have a value greater than 1.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseBoundsFirstDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The first date of a schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of exercise dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseBoundsLastDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The last date of a schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of exercise dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseEarliestTime
fielddef.descr: The earliest time at which notice of exercise can be given by the buyer to the seller (or seller's agent) (i) on the expriation date, in the case of a European style option, (ii) on each bermuda option exercise date and the expiration date, in the case of a Bermuda style option the commencement date to, and including, the expiration date, in the case of an American option.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseEarliestTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used with the provision's earliest time for notice of exercise. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseLatestTime
fielddef.descr: For a Bermuda or American style option, the latest time on an exercise business day (excluding the expiration date) within the exercise period that notice can be given by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent. Notice of exercise given after this time will be deemed to have been given on the next exercise business day.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseLatestTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used with the provision's latest time for notice of exercise. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDates
fielddef.descr: Number of provision option exercise fixed dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDate
fielddef.descr: A predetermined option exercise date unadjusted or adjusted depending on LegProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDateType(40497).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted last day within an exercise period for an American style option. For a European style option it is the only day within the exercise period.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Expiration date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument leg provision's option expiration date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option expiration date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative option expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative option expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative option expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted last day within an exercise period for an American style option. For a European style option it is the only day within the exercise period.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationTime
fielddef.descr: The latest time for exercise on the expiration date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionExpirationTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used with the provision's latest exercise time on expiration date. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date on the underlying set by the exercise of an option. What this date is depends on the option (e.g. in a swaption it is the swap effective date, in an extendible/cancelable provision it is the swap termination date).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The instrument leg provision option relevant underlying date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the instrument leg provision option relevant underlying date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the date relevant to the underlying trade on exercise is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative option relevant underlying date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative option relevant underlying date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative option relevant underlying date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted date on the underlying set by the exercise of an option. What this date is depends on the option (e.g. in a swaption it is the swap effective date, in an extendible/cancelable provision it is the swap termination date).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Termination, or Relative Termination, Date Adjustment Business Day Convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the provisional cash settlement payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the termination date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative cash settlement payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative cash settlement payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative cash settlement payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateRangeFirst
fielddef.descr: First date in range when a settlement date range is provided.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateRangeLast
fielddef.descr: Last date in range when a settlement date range is provided.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueTime
fielddef.descr: A time specified in 24-hour format, e.g. 11am would be represented as 11:00:00. The time of the cash settlement valuation date when the cash settlement amount will be determined according to the cash settlement method if the parties have not otherwise been able to agree to the cash settlement amount.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used with the provision's cash settlement valuation time. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The cash settlement valuation date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the LegDateAdjustment component within the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the provisional cash settlement's value date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the cash settlement value date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative cash settlement value date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative cash settlement value date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative cash settlement value date offset.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlValueDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted cash settlement value date.

fielddef.name: NoLegProvisionPartyIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of parties identified in the contract provision.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionPartyID
fielddef.descr: The party identifier/code for the payment settlement party.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionPartyIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of LegProvisionPartyID(40534).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionPartyRole
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type or role of LegProvisionPartyID(40534) specified.

fielddef.name: NoLegProvisionPartySubIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of sub-party IDs to be reported for the party.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionPartySubID
fielddef.descr: Party sub-identifier, if applicable, for LegProvisionPartyRole(40536).

fielddef.name: LegProvisionPartySubIDType
fielddef.descr: The type of LegProvisionPartySubID(40538) value.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreams
fielddef.descr: Number of swap streams in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamType
fielddef.descr: Type of swap stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamDesc
fielddef.descr: A short descriptive name given to payment stream. Eg. CDS, Fixed, Float, Float2, GBP. The description has no intrinsic meaning but should be arbitrarily chosen by the remitter as a reference.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamPaySide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party paying the stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party receiving the stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamNotional
fielddef.descr: Notional, or initial notional value for the payment stream. Use SwapSchedule for steps.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the UnderlyingStreamNotional(40545) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamText
fielddef.descr: Free form text to specify additional information or enumeration description when a standard value does not apply.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTerminationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted termination date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTerminationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's stream's termination, or relative termination, date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTerminationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the underlying instrument's stream's ermination, or relative termination, date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTerminationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the termination date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTerminationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative termination date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTerminationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative termination date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTerminationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative termination date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTerminationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted termination date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationPeriodBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for the adjusted calculation period of the underlying instrument's stream. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationPeriodBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the underlying instrument's stream calculation period, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamFirstPeriodStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first calculation period start date if before the effective date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamFirstPeriodStartDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: First calculation period start date business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamFirstPeriodStartDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the underlying instrument's stream's first calculation period start date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamFirstPeriodStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted first calculation period start date, if it is before the effective date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamFirstRegularPeriodStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first start date of the regular calculation period, if there is an initial stub period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamFirstCompoundingPeriodEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The end of the initial compounding period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamLastRegularPeriodEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted last regular period end date if there is a final stub period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency at which calculation period end dates occur.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: The unit of frequency at which calculation period end dates occur.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of end dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. Used only to override the roll convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of payment stream applicable to the swap stream associated with the underlying instrument.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamMarketRate
fielddef.descr: Used only for credit index trade. This contains the credit spread ("fair value") at which the trade was executed. The market rate varies over the life of the index depending on market conditions. This is the price of the index as quoted by trading desks.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamDelayIndicator
fielddef.descr: Applicable to credit default swaps on mortgage backed securities to specify whether payment delays are applicable to the fixed amount. Residential mortgage backed securities typically have a payment delay of 5 days between the coupon date of the reference obligation and the payment date of the synthetic swap. Commercial mortage backed securities do not typically have a payment delay, with both payment dates (the coupon date of the reference obligation and the payment date of the synthetic swap) being on the 25th of each month.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency that the stream settles in (to support swaps that settle in a currency different from the notional currency). Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamDayCount
fielddef.descr: The day count convention used in the payment stream calculations.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamAccrualDays
fielddef.descr: The number of days from the adjusted calculation period start date to the adjusted value date, calculated in accordance with the applicable day count fraction.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamDiscountType
fielddef.descr: The method of calculating discounted payment amounts

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamDiscountRate
fielddef.descr: Discount rate. The rate is expressed in decimal, e.g. 5% is expressed as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamDiscountRateDayCount
fielddef.descr: The day count convention applied to the UnderlyingPaymentStreamDiscountRate(40575).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingMethod
fielddef.descr: Compounding Method.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there is an initial exchange of principal on the effective date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInterimPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there are intermediate or interim exchanges of principal during the term of the swap.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there is a final exchange of principal on the termination date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's payment stream's payment date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar usered for date adjustement of the underlying instrument's payment stream's payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for frequency of payments.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with frequency of payments.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of end dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. Used only to override the roll convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFirstPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first payment date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLastRegularPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted last regular payment date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the payment dates are relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamResetDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the reset dates are determined with respect to each adjusted calculation period start date or adjusted calculation period end date. If the reset frequency is specified as daily this element must not be included.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamResetDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's payment stream's reset date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamResetDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the underlying instrument's payment stream's reset date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamResetFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for frequency of resets.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamResetFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with frequency of resets.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamResetWeeklyRollConvention
fielddef.descr: Used to specify the day of the week in which the reset occurs for payments that reset on a weekly basis.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the initial fixing date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's payment stream's initial fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the underlying instrument's payment stream's initial fixing date , e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted initial fixing date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the underlying payment stream fixing date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's payment stream's fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the underlying instrument's payment stream's fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values. Omit if the same as UnderlyingPaymentStreamCalculationPeriodBusinessCenters.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted fixing date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRate
fielddef.descr: The rate applicable to the fixed rate payment stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: The underlying payment stream's fixed payment amount. In CDS an alternative to UnderlyingPaymentStreamRate(40615).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateOrAmountCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency in which UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixedAmount(40616) or UnderlyingPaymentStreamRate(40615) is denominated. Users ISO 4271 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFutureValueNotional
fielddef.descr: The future value notional is normally only required for certain non-deliverable interest rate swaps (e.g. Brazillian Real (BRL) vs. CETIP Interback Deposit Rate (CDI)). The value is calculated as follows: Future Value Notional = Notional Amount * (1 + Fixed Rate) ^ (Fixed Rate Day Count Fraction). The currency is the same as the stream notional.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFutureValueDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted value date of the future value amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The payment stream's floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The source of the payment stream floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the underlying instrument's floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the underlying instrument's floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. A multiplier schedule is expressed as explicit multipliers and dates. In the case of a schedule, the step dates may be subject to adjustment in accordance with any adjustments specified in the calculationPeriodDatesAdjustments. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies a short or long spread value.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The cap rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A floor rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. This is assumed to be the first required reset rate for the first regular calculation period. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. An initial rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: When rate averaging is applicable, used to specify whether a weighted or unweighted average calculation method is to be used.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: The specification of any provisions for calculating payment obligations when a floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInflationLagPeriod
