fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the inflation lag period. The lag period is the offsetting period from the payment date which determines the reference period for which the inflation index is observed.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInflationLagUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the inflation lag period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInflationLagDayType
fielddef.descr: The underlying payment stream inflation lag period day type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInflationInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the Inflation Index Level from multiple points - the most common is Linear.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInflationIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The inflation index reference source.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInflationPublicationSource
fielddef.descr: The current main publication source such as relevant web site or a government body.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInflationInitialIndexLevel
fielddef.descr: Initial known index level for the first calculation period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInflationFallbackBondApplicable
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether a fallback bond as defined in the 2006 ISDA Inflation Derivatives Definitions, sections 1.3 and 1.8, is applicable or not. If not specified, the default value is "Y" (True/Yes).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFRADiscounting
fielddef.descr: The method of Forward Rate Agreement (FRA) discounting, if any, that will apply.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableRefCurrency
fielddef.descr: The non-deliverable settlement reference currency. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's payment stream's non-deliverable fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the underlying instrument's payment stream's non-deliverable fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the non-deliverable fixing dates are relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: SettlRateFallbackReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. When SettlRateFallbackRateSource(40373) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingNonDeliverableFixingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of Fixing dates in the repeating group

fielddef.name: UnderlyingNonDeliverableFixingDate
fielddef.descr: Non-deliverable fixing date unadjusted or adjusted depending on UnderlyingNonDeliverableFixingDateType(40658).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingNonDeliverableFixingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingSettlRateFallbacks
fielddef.descr: Number of settlement rate fallbacks in the repeating group

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlRatePostponementMaximumDays
fielddef.descr: The maximum number of days to wait for a quote from the disrupted settlement rate option before proceding to this method.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlRatePostponementSurvey
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether to request a settlement rate quote from the market.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlRatePostponementCalculationAgent
fielddef.descr: Used to identify the settlement rate postponement calculation agent.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentSchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of swap schedules in the repeating group

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleType
fielddef.descr: Type of schedule.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStubType
fielddef.descr: Indicates to which stub this schedule applies.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The date on which the value is adjusted, or calculated if a future value notional for certain non-deliverable interest rate swaps (e.g. Brazillian Real (BRL) vs. CETIP Interback Deposit Rate (CDI)), or the start date of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The end date of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentSchedulePaySide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party paying the step schedule.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party receiving the step schedule.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleNotional
fielddef.descr: The notional value for this step, or amount of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency for this step. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRate
fielddef.descr: The rate value for this step.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The spread value for this step.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the step schedule.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: The explicit payment amount for this step.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixedCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the fixed amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multipler of the step frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the step frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepOffsetValue
fielddef.descr: The explicit amount that the notional changes on each step date. This can be a positive or negative amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepRate
fielddef.descr: The percentage by which the notional changes on each step date. The percentage is either a percentage applied to the initial notional amount or the previous outstanding notional, depending on the value specified in UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepRelativeTo(40685). The percentage can be either positive or negative.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepOffsetRate
fielddef.descr: The explicit amount that the rate changes on each step date. This can be a positive or negative value.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepRate(40683) or UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepOffsetValue(40682) should be applied to the initial notional or the previous notional in order to calculate the notional step change amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted fixing date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleWeight
fielddef.descr: Floating rate observation weight for cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the notional amount schedule is calculated using an anchor date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessDayCnvtn
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's payment schedule's fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the underlying instrument's payment schedule's fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's payment schedule's adjusted fixing date once the adjustment has been performed.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingTime
fielddef.descr: Fixing time.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Business center for determining fixing time. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleInterimExchangePaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Relative date for interim exchanges arising from changes in spot currency exchange amount or notional amortization.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The underlying instrument's payment schedule's interim exchange date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the underlying instrument's payment schedule's interim exchange date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The interim exchange date once the adjustement has been performed.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateSources
fielddef.descr: Number of rate sources in the repeating group

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateSourceType
fielddef.descr: Rate source type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleReferencePage
fielddef.descr:
Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source.
For FX, the reference page to the spot rate to be used for the reference FX spot rate.
When RateSource(1446) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStubs
fielddef.descr: Number of stubs in the repeating group

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubType
fielddef.descr: Stub type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubLength
fielddef.descr: Optional indication whether stub is shorter or longer than the regular swap period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubRate
fielddef.descr: Agreed to fixed rate for this stub.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubFixedCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the fixed payment amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex
fielddef.descr: The underlying payment stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The source for the underlying payment stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the underlying payment stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the underlying payment stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexRateSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the stub index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The cap rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A floor rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndexFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2
fielddef.descr: The second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2Source
fielddef.descr: The source of the second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2CurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier of the underlying payment stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2CurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the underlying payment stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2RateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the second floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2RateSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from the second floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2RateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2RateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the second stub index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2CapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the second floating rate. The cap rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubIndex2FloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the second floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A floor rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of payment stream associated with the swap.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamMarketRate
fielddef.descr: Used only for credit index trade. This contains the credit spread ("fair value") at which the trade was executed. The market rate varies over the life of the index depending on market conditions. This is the price of the index as quoted by trading desks.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamDelayIndicator
fielddef.descr: Applicable to credit default swaps on mortgage backed securities to specify whether payment delays are applicable to the fixed amount. Residential mortgage backed securities typically have a payment delay of 5 days between the coupon date of the reference obligation and the payment date of the synthetic swap. Commercial mortgage backed securities do not typically have a payment delay, with both payment dates (the coupon date of the reference obligation and the payment date of the synthetic swap) being on the 25th of each month.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency that the stream settles in (to support swaps that settle in a currency different from the notional currency). Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamDayCount
fielddef.descr: The day count convention used in the payment stream calculations.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamAccrualDays
fielddef.descr: The number of days from the adjusted calculation period start date to the adjusted value date, calculated in accordance with the applicable day count fraction.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamDiscountType
fielddef.descr: The method of calculating discounted payment amounts

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamDiscountRate
fielddef.descr: Discount rate. The rate is expressed in decimal, e.g. 5% is expressed as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamDiscountRateDayCount
fielddef.descr: The day count convention applied to the PaymentStreamDiscountRate(40745).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingMethod
fielddef.descr: Compounding method.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there is an initial exchange of principal on the effective date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInterimPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there are intermediate or interim exchanges of principal during the term of the swap.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalPrincipalExchangeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether there is a final exchange of principal on the termination date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Payment date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the stream's payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of payments.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of payments.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of end dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. Used only to override the roll convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFirstPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first payment date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLastRegularPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted last regular payment date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when payment dates are relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative payment date offset

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamResetDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the reset dates are determined with respect to each adjusted calculation period start date or adjusted calculation period end date. If the reset frequency is specified as daily this element must not be included.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamResetDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Reset date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamResetDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the payment stream's reset date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamResetFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of resets.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamResetFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of resets.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamResetWeeklyRollConvention
fielddef.descr: Used to specify the day of the week in which the reset occurs for payments that reset on a weekly basis.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the initial fixing date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Initial fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stream's initial fixing dates, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative initial fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted initial fixing date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the fixing date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the payment stream's fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted fixing date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateCutoffDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative rate cut-off date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRate
fielddef.descr: The rate applicable to the fixed rate payment stream.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: The payment stream's fixed payment amount. In CDS an alternative to PaymentStreamRate(40784).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateOrAmountCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency in which PaymentStreamFixedAmount(40785) or PaymentStreamRate(40784) is denominated. Uses ISO 4271 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFutureValueNotional
fielddef.descr: The future value notional is normally only required for certain non-deliverable interest rate swaps (e.g. Brazillian Real (BRL) vs. CETIP Interback Deposit Rate (CDI)). The value is calculated as follows: Future Value Notional = Notional Amount * (1 + Fixed Rate) ^ (Fixed Rate Day Count Fraction). The currency is the same as the stream notional.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFutureValueDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted value date of the future value amount.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The payment stream floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The source of the payment stream floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. A multiplier schedule is expressed as explicit multipliers and dates. In the case of a schedule, the step dates may be subject to adjustment in accordance with any adjustments specified in the calculationPeriodDatesAdjustments. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The cap rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A floor rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. This is assumed to be the first required reset rate for the first regular calculation period. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. An initial rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: When rate averaging is applicable, used to specify whether a weighted or unweighted average calculation method is to be used.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: The specification of any provisions for calculating payment obligations when a floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInflationLagPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the inflation lag period. The lag period is the offsetting period from the payment date which determines the reference period for which the inflation index is observed.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInflationLagUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the inflation lag period.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInflationLagDayType
fielddef.descr: The payment stream inflation lag period day type.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInflationInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the Inflation Index Level from multiple points - the most common is Linear.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInflationIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The inflation index reference source.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInflationPublicationSource
fielddef.descr: The current main publication source such as relevant web site or a government body.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInflationInitialIndexLevel
fielddef.descr: Initial known index level for the first calculation period.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInflationFallbackBondApplicable
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether a fallback bond as defined in the 2006 ISDA Inflation Derivatives Definitions, sections 1.3 and 1.8, is applicable or not. If not specified, the default value is "Y" (True/Yes).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFRADiscounting
fielddef.descr: The method of Forward Rate Agreement (FRA) discounting, if any, that will apply.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableRefCurrency
fielddef.descr: The non-deliverable settlement reference currency. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the payment stream's non-deliverable fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the non-deliverable fixing dates are relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative non-deliverable fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. When UnderlyingPaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlRateSource(40661) = 3(ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: NoNonDeliverableFixingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of Fixing dates in the repeating group

fielddef.name: NonDeliverableFixingDate
fielddef.descr: Non-deliverable fixing date unadjusted or adjusted depending on NonDeliverableFixingDateType(40827).

fielddef.name: NonDeliverableFixingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: NoPaymentSchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of swap schedules in the repeating group

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleType
fielddef.descr: Type of schedule.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStubType
fielddef.descr: Indicates to which stub this schedule applies.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The date on which the value is adjusted, or calculated if a future value notional for certain non-deliverable interest rate swaps (e.g. Brazillian Real (BRL) vs. CETIP Interback Deposit Rate (CDI)), or the start date of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The end date of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentSchedulePaySide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party paying the step schedule.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: The side of the party receiving the stepf schedule.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleNotional
fielddef.descr: The notional value for this step, or amount of a cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency for this step. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRate
fielddef.descr: The rate value for this step schedule.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The spread value for this step schedule.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the step schedule.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: The explicit payment amount for this step schedule.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixedCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the fixed amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStepFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multipler of the step frequency.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStepFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the step frequency.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStepOffsetValue
fielddef.descr: The explicit amount that the notional changes on each step date. This can be a positive or negative amount.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStepRate
fielddef.descr: The percentage by which the notional changes on each step date. The percentage is either a percentage applied to the initial notional amount or the previous outstanding notional, depending on the value specified in PaymentScheduleStepRelativeTo(40849). The percentage can be either positive or negative.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStepOffsetRate
fielddef.descr: The explicit amount that the rate changes on each step date. This can be a positive or negative value.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStepRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the PaymentScheduleStepRate(40847) or PaymentScheduleStepOffsetValue(40846) should be applied to the initial notional or the previous notional in order to calculate the notional step change amount.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted fixing date.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleWeight
fielddef.descr: Floating rate observation weight for cashflow payment.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the notional amount schedule is calculated using an anchor date for the fixing date.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The payment schedule's fixing date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the payment schedule's Fixing date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative fixing date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The fixing date once the adjustment has been performed.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingTime
fielddef.descr: The fixing time associated with the step schedule.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Business center for determining Fixing time. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangePaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Relative date for interim exchanges arising from changes in spot currency exchange amount or notional amortization.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The payment schedule's interim exchange date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the payment schedule's interim exchange date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative interim exchange date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The interim exchange date once the adjustement has been performed.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentScheduleRateSources
fielddef.descr: Number of swap schedule rate sources.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateSourceType
fielddef.descr: Rate source type.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleReferencePage
fielddef.descr:
Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source.
For FX, the reference page to the spot rate to be used for the reference FX spot rate.
When RateSource(1446) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStubs
fielddef.descr: Number of stubs in the repeating group

fielddef.name: PaymentStubType
fielddef.descr: Stub type.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubLength
fielddef.descr: Optional indication whether stub is shorter or longer than the regular swap period.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubRate
fielddef.descr: The agreed upon fixed rate for this stub.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: A fixed payment amount.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubFixedCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the fixed payment amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex
fielddef.descr: The stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexSource
fielddef.descr: The source of the stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexRateSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the payment stub index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The cap rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A floor rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndexFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2
fielddef.descr: The second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2Source
fielddef.descr: The source of the second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2CurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2CurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the second stub floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2RateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the second floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This element should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2RateSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from the second floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2RateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2RateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the second stub index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2CapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the second floating rate. The cap rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubIndex2FloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the second floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A floor rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: NoLegSettlRateFallbacks
fielddef.descr: Number of settlement rate fallbacks in the repeating group

fielddef.name: LegSettlRatePostponementMaximumDays
fielddef.descr: The maximum number of days to wait for a quote from the disrupted settlement rate option before proceding to this method.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlRateFallbackRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: LegSettlRatePostponementSurvey
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether to request a settlement rate quote from the market.

fielddef.name: LegSettlRatePostponementCalculationAgent
fielddef.descr: Used to identify the settlement rate postponement calculation agent.

fielddef.name: StreamEffectiveDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted effective date.

fielddef.name: StreamEffectiveDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The stream's effective, or relative effective, date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the DateAdjustment component within the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: StreamEffectiveDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the stream's effective, or relative effective, date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: StreamEffectiveDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the effective date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: StreamEffectiveDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative effective date offset.

fielddef.name: StreamEffectiveDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative effective date offset.

fielddef.name: StreamEffectiveDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative effective date offset.

fielddef.name: StreamEffectiveDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted effective date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlRateFallbackReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. When UnderlyingSettlRateFallbackRateSource(40904) = 3(ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: PaymentPriceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of price for PaymentPrice(40218).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: BusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for adjusting dates. The value defined here applies to all adjustable dates in the instrument unless specifically overridden.

fielddef.name: DateRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining a sequence of dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. The value defined here applies to all adjustable dates in the instrument unless specifically overridden. Additional values may be used by mutual agreement of the counterparties.

fielddef.name: NoLegBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for adjusting dates. The value defined here applies to all adjustable dates in the instrument leg unless specifically overridden.

fielddef.name: LegDateRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining a sequence of dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. The value defined here applies to all adjustable dates in the instrument leg unless specifically overridden.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamTerminationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessCenters

fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoProtectionTermEventNewsSources

fielddef.name: NoProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoProvisionCashSettlValueDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoProvisionOptionExerciseBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoProvisionOptionExpirationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoProvisionDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoStreamCalculationPeriodBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoStreamFirstPeriodStartDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoStreamEffectiveBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoStreamTerminationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for adjusting dates. The value defined here applies to all adjustable dates in the underlying instrument unless specifically overridden.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDateRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining a sequence of dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. The value defined here applies to all adjustable dates in the underlying instrument unless specifically overridden.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamResetDateBusinessCenters

fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegStreamTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegStreamText(40979) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegStreamText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegStreamText(40248) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegStreamText(40248) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegProvisionTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegProvisionText(40472) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegProvisionText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegProvisionText(40472) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegProvisionText(40472) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedStreamTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedStreamText(40983) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedStreamText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the StreamText(40056) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the StreamText(40056) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedPaymentTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedPaymentText(40985) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedPaymentText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the PaymentText(40229) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the PaymentText(40229) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedProvisionTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedProvisionText(40987) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedProvisionText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the ProvisionText(40113) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the ProvisionText(40113) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingStreamTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingStreamText(40989) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingStreamText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingStreamText(40547) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingStreamText(40547) field.

fielddef.name: ProvisionCashSettlQuoteReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the quote source.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlQuoteReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the quote source.

fielddef.name: EventMonthYear
fielddef.descr: Used with derivatives when an event is express as a month-year with optional day or month or week of month. Format: YYYYMM (e.g. 199903) YYYYMMDD (e.g. 20030323) YYYYMMwN (e.g. 200303w2) for week A specific date can be appended to the month-year. For instance, if multiple event types exist in the same Year and Month, but actually at a different time, a value can be appended, such as "w" or "w2" to indicate week. Likewise, the day of monty (0-31) can be appended to indicate a specific event date.

fielddef.name: LegEventMonthYear
fielddef.descr:
Used with derivatives when an event is express as a month-year with optional day or month or week of month. Format:
YYYYMM (e.g. 199903)
YYYYMMDD (e.g. 20030323)
YYYYMMwN (e.g. 200303w2) for week
A specific date can be appended to the month-year. For instance, if multiple event types exist in the same Year and Month, but actually at a different time, a value can be appended, such as "w" or "w2" to indicate week. Likewise, the day of monty (0-31) can be appended to indicate a specific event date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingEventMonthYear
fielddef.descr:
Used with derivatives when an event is express as a month-year with optional day or month or week of month. Format:
YYYYMM (e.g. 199903)
YYYYMMDD (e.g. 20030323)
YYYYMMwN (e.g. 200303w2) for week
A specific date can be appended to the month-year. For instance, if multiple event types exist in the same Year and Month, but actually at a different time, a value can be appended, such as "w" or "w2" to indicate week. Likewise, the day of monty (0-31) can be appended to indicate a specific event date.

fielddef.name: PreviousClearingBusinessDate
fielddef.descr: The date of the previous clearing business day.

fielddef.name: ValuationDate
fielddef.descr: The valuation date of the trade.

fielddef.name: ValuationTime
fielddef.descr: The valuation time of the trade.

fielddef.name: ValuationBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center whose calendar is used for valuation, e.g. "GLOB". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: MarginAmtFXRate
fielddef.descr: Foreign exchange rate used to compute the MarginAmt(1645) from the MarginAmtCcy(1646) and the Currency(15).

fielddef.name: MarginAmtFXRateCalc
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether or not MarginAmtFXRate(2088) should be multipled or divided.

fielddef.name: CollateralFXRate
fielddef.descr: Foreign exchange rate used to compute the CurrentCollateralAmount(1704) from the CollateralCurrency(1646) and the Currency(15).

fielddef.name: CollateralFXRateCalc
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether or not CollateralFXRate(2090) should be multipled or divided.

fielddef.name: CollateralAmountMarketSegmentID
fielddef.descr: Market segment associated with the collateral amount.

fielddef.name: CollateralAmountMarketID
fielddef.descr: Market associated with the collateral amount.

fielddef.name: PayCollectFXRate
fielddef.descr: Foreign exchange rate used to compute the PayAmount(1710) or CollectAmount(1711) from the PayCollectCurrency(1709) and the Currency(15).

fielddef.name: PayCollectFXRateCalc
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether or not PayCollectFXRate(2094) should be multipled or divided.

fielddef.name: PosAmtStreamDesc
fielddef.descr: Corresponds to the value in StreamDesc(40051) in the StreamGrp component.

fielddef.name: PositionFXRate
fielddef.descr: Foreign exchange rate used to compute the PosAmt(708) from the PositionCurrency(1055) and the Currency (15).

fielddef.name: PositionFXRateCalc
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether or not PositionFXRate(2097) should be multipled or divided.

fielddef.name: PosAmtMarketSegmentID
fielddef.descr: Market segment associated with the position amount.

fielddef.name: PosAmtMarketID
fielddef.descr: Market associated with the position amount.

fielddef.name: TerminatedIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates if the position has been terminated.

descr.p: Indicates whether the originating account is exempt (Y) from marking orders as short or not (N). This designation may be used on both buy and sell orders

fielddef.name: RelatedRegulatoryTradeIDSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the identifier of the reporting entity as assigned by regulatory agency.

fielddef.name: NoAttachments
fielddef.descr: The number of attached files.

fielddef.name: AttachmentName
fielddef.descr: Specifies the file name of the attachment.

fielddef.name: AttachmentMediaType
fielddef.descr: The MIME media type (and optional subtype) of the attachment. The values used are those assigned, listed and maintained by IANA (www.iana.org) [RFC2046]. See http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/index.html for available types.

fielddef.name: AttachmentClassification
fielddef.descr: Specifies semantically the type of the attached document from a business perspective. The default classification scheme reuses the FIX standard classification scheme of a high level section (pretrade, trade, posttrade, etc.) and a category, then a specific application or document type. The expression follows {"section/category/application type"}. The goal here is to map the attachment into the sections and categories of the FIX business messages if possible. The classification scheme can be expanded or replaced by counterparty agreement. This approach permits the introduction and reference to other business ontologies.

fielddef.name: AttachmentExternalURL
fielddef.descr: Used to specify an external URL where the attachment can be obtained.

fielddef.name: AttachmentEncodingType
fielddef.descr: The encoding type of the content provided in EncodedAttachment(2112). The AttachmentEncodingType is a distinct and separate concept from MessageEncoding(347) that defines how FIX fields of type Data are encoded. The MessageEncoding(347) is used embed text in another character set (e.g. Unicode or Shift-JIS) within FIX.

fielddef.name: UnencodedAttachmentLen
fielddef.descr: Unencoded content length in bytes. Can be used to validate successful unencoding.

fielddef.name: EncodedAttachmentLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded the EncodedAttachment(2112) fied

fielddef.name: EncodedAttachment
fielddef.descr: The content of the attachment in the encoding format specified in the AttachmentEncodingType(2109) field.

fielddef.name: NoAttachmentKeywords
fielddef.descr: The number of attachment keywords.

fielddef.name: AttachmentKeyword
fielddef.descr: Can be used to provide data or keyword tagging of the content of the attachment.

fielddef.name: NegotiationMethod
fielddef.item: The spot price for the reference or benchmark security is to be negotiated via phone or voice.

descr.p: Specifies the negotiation method to be used.
Values 100 and above are reserved for custom values.

fielddef.name: NextAuctionTime
fielddef.descr: The time of the next auction.

valblockdef.name: SwapSubClass
valblockdef.descr: The sub-classification or notional schedule type of the swap.

valblockdef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType
valblockdef.item: Hour of the day (Applicable for electricity contracts. Time value is expressed as an integer hour of the day (1-24). The delivery start/end hour is specified as the end of the included hour. For example, a start hour of ":4" begins at 3 a.m.; an end hour of "20" ends at 8 p.m.; a start hour of "1" and an end hour of "24" indicates midnight to midnight delivery)
HH:MM time format (Applicable for gas contracts. Time is expressed using a 24- hour time format. For example, a time value of "13:30" is 1:30 p.m.)

valblockdef.name: DeliveryStreamDeliveryRestriction
valblockdef.item: Interruptable or non-firm (Excused when interrupted for any reason or for no reason without liability)
Force majeure (Excused when prevented by force majeure)
System firm (Must be supplied from the owned or controlled generation or pre-existing purchased power assets of the system specified)
Unit firm (Must be supplied from the generation asset specified)

valblockdef.name: DeliveryStreamTitleTransferCondition
valblockdef.item: Does not transfer with risk of loss

valblockdef.name: PaymentStreamSettlLevel
valblockdef.item: Average (The cumulative number of weather index units for each day in the calculation period divided by the number of days in the calculation period)
Maximum (The maximum number of weather index units for any day in the calculaiton period)
Minimum (The minimum number of weather index units for any day in the calculaiton period)
Cumulative (The cumulative number of weather index units for each day in the calculaiton period)

valblockdef.name: PaymentStreamPricingDayOfWeek
valblockdef.item: Every day (the default if not specified)

valblockdef.name: StreamCommodityDataSourceIDType
valblockdef.item: Weather station WBAN (Weather Bureau Army Navy)

fielddef.name: NoAssetAttributes
fielddef.descr: The number of asset attribute entries in the group.

fielddef.name: AssetAttributeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the name of the attribute. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Asset_Attribute_Types for code list of applicable asset attribute types.

fielddef.name: AssetAttributeValue
fielddef.descr: Specifies the value of the asset attribute.

fielddef.name: AssetAttributeLimit
fielddef.descr: Limit or lower acceptable value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: CommRate
fielddef.descr: The commission rate when Commission(12) is based on a percentage of quantity, amount per unit or a factor of "unit of measure". If the rate is a percentage, use the decimalized form, e.g. "0.05" for a 5% commission or "0.005" for 50 basis points.

fielddef.name: CommUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The commission rate unit of measure.

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventAveragingObservations
fielddef.descr: The number of averaging observations in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventAveragingObservationNumber
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to the ordinal observation as specified either in the ComplexEventScheduleGrp or ComplexEventPeriodDateGrp components.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventAveragingWeight
fielddef.descr: The weight factor to be applied to the observation.

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventCreditEvents
fielddef.descr: The number of credit events specified in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of credit event. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Types for code list of applicable event types.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventValue
fielddef.descr: The credit event value appropriate to ComplexEventCreditEventType(40998). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Types for applicable event type values.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the applicable currency when ComplexEventCreditEventValue(40999) is an amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for complex credit events.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with complex credit events.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type for the credit events that specify a period and unit.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information used for credit events. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Rate_Source for code list of applicable sources.

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventCreditEventQualifiers
fielddef.descr: The number of qualifiers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventQualifier
fielddef.descr: Specifies a complex event qualifier. Used to further qualify ComplexEventCreditEventType(40998).

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventPeriodDateTimes
fielddef.descr: The number of entries in the date-time repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventPeriodDate
fielddef.descr: Averaging date for an Asian option. Trigger date for a Barrier or Knock option.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventPeriodTime
fielddef.descr: Averaging time for an Asian option.

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventPeriods
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventPeriodType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the period type.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center for adjusting dates and times in the schedule or date-time group. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventRateSources
fielddef.descr: The number of rate sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventRateSourceType
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the rate source specified is a primary or secondary source.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference page from the rate source. For FX, the reference page to the spot rate is to be used for the reference FX spot rate. When ComplexEventRateSource(41014) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventReferencePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: The number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted complex event date (For example, the second expiration date for a calendar spread option strategy).

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the complex event date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative date offset.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative date offset.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of day for the complex event.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Date adjustment business day convention. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted complex event date.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventFixingTime
fielddef.descr: Local market time of fixing.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventFixingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center for determining the actual fixing times. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventCreditEventSources
fielddef.descr: Number of event sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventSource
fielddef.descr: A newspaper or electronic news service that may publish relevant information used in the determination of whether or not a credit event has occurred.

fielddef.name: ComplexOptPayoutPaySide
fielddef.descr: Trade side of payout payer.

fielddef.name: ComplexOptPayoutReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: Trade side of payout receiver.

fielddef.name: ComplexOptPayoutUnderlier
fielddef.descr: Reference to the underlier whose payments are being passed through.

fielddef.name: ComplexOptPayoutPercentage
fielddef.descr: Percentage of observed price for calculating the payout associated with the event.

fielddef.name: ComplexOptPayoutTime
fielddef.descr: Specifies when the payout is to occur.

fielddef.name: ComplexOptPayoutCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the payout amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventPricePercentage
fielddef.descr: Specifies the price percentage at which the complex event takes effect. Impact of the event price is determined by the ComplexEventType(1484).

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCurrencyOne
fielddef.descr: Specifies the first or only reference currency of the trade. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCurrencyTwo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the second reference currencyof the trade. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventQuoteBasis
fielddef.descr: For foreign exchange Quanto option feature.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventFixedFXRate
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fixed FX rate alternative for FX Quantro options.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method according to which an amount or a date is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCalculationAgent
fielddef.descr: Used to identify the calculation agent.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: Upper strike price for Asian option feature. Strike percentage for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventStrikeFactor
fielddef.descr: Strike factor for Asian option feature. Upper strike percentage for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventStrikeNumberOfOptions
fielddef.descr: Upper string number of options for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventsXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to credit event table elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventNotifyingParty
fielddef.descr: The notifying party is the party that notifies the other party when a credit event has occurred by means of a credit event notice. If more than one party is referenced as being the notifying party then either party may notify the other of a credit event occurring.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Specifies the local business center for which the credit event is to be determined. The inclusion of this business center implies that Greenwich Mean Time in Section 3.3 of the 2003 ISDA Credit Derivatives Definitions is replaced by the local time of the specified business center. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventStandardSources
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', indicates that ISDA defined Standard Public Sources are applicable.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventCreditEventMinimumSources
fielddef.descr: The minimum number of the specified public information sources that must publish information that reasonably confirms that a credit event has occurred. The market convention is two.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this complex event for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to a complex event elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: NoComplexEventSchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventScheduleStartDate
fielddef.descr: Start date of the schedule.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventScheduleEndDate
fielddef.descr: End date of the schedule.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventScheduleFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the schedule date frequency.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventScheduleFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the schedule date frequency.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventScheduleRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. This should only be used to override the roll convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument.

fielddef.name: NoDeliverySchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of delivery schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of delivery schedule.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier for this instance of delivery schedule for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleNotional
fielddef.descr: Physical delivery quantity.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery quantity unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleNotionalCommodityFrequency
fielddef.descr: The frequency of notional delivery.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the negative tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in DeliveryScheduleToleranceType(41046). Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: DeliverySchedulePositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the positive tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in DeliveryScheduleToleranceType(41046). Value may exceed agreed upon value. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleToleranceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value's unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleToleranceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value type.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlCountry
fielddef.descr: Specifies the country where delivery takes place. Uses ISO 3166 2-character country code.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlTimeZone
fielddef.descr: Delivery timezone specified as "prevailing" rather than "standard" or "daylight". See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Prevailing_Timezones for code list of applicable prevailing timezones.

descr.p: Specifies the commodity delivery flow type

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlHolidaysProcessingInstruction
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether holidays are included in the settlement periods. Required for electricity contracts.

fielddef.name: NoDeliveryScheduleSettlDays
fielddef.descr: Number of delivery schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlDay
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day or group of days for delivery.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlTotalHours
fielddef.descr: The sum of the total hours specified in the DeliveryScheduleSettlTimeGrp component.

fielddef.name: NoDeliveryScheduleSettlTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of hour ranges in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlStart
fielddef.descr: Specifies the scheduled start time for the delivery of the commodity where delivery occurs over specified times. The format of the time value is specified in DeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType(41057).

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlEnd
