fielddef.descr: Specifies the scheduled end time for the delivery of the commodity where delivery occurs over specified times. The format of the time value is specified in DeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType(41057).

fielddef.name: DeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the format of the delivery start and end time values.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of delivery stream.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamPipeline
fielddef.descr: The name of the oil delivery pipeline.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamEntryPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity will enter the delivery mechanism or pipeline.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamWithdrawalPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity product will be withdrawn prior to delivery.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity product will be delivered and received. Value specified should follow market convention appropriate for the commodity product. For bullion, see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/bullion-delivery-location for values.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamDeliveryRestriction
fielddef.descr: Specifies under what conditions the buyer and seller should be excused of their delivery obligations.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamDeliveryContingency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the electricity delivery contingency. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/electricity-transmission-contingency for values.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamDeliveryContingentPartySide
fielddef.descr: The trade side value of the party responsible for electricity delivery contingency.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamDeliverAtSourceIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', delivery of the coal product is to be at its source.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamRiskApportionment
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the parties to the trade apportion responsibility for the delivery of the commodity product. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Risk_Apportionment for the details of the external code list.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamRiskApportionmentSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the source or legal framework for the risk apportionment. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Risk_Apportionment_Source for the details of the external code list.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamTitleTransferLocation
fielddef.descr: Specifies the title transfer location.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamTitleTransferCondition
fielddef.descr: Specifies the condition of title transfer.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamImporterOfRecord
fielddef.descr: A party, not necessarily of the trade, who is the Importer of Record for the purposes of paying customs duties and applicable taxes or costs related to importation.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the negative tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in DeliveryStreamToleranceType(41074). Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamPositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the positive tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in DeliveryStreamToleranceType(41074). Value may exceed agreed upon value. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamToleranceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value's unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamToleranceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value type.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamToleranceOptionSide
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the tolerance is at the seller's or buyer's option.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamTotalPositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: The positive percent tolerance which applies to the total quantity delivered over all shipment periods. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%.).

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamTotalNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: The negative percent tolerance which applies to the total quantity delivered over all shipment periods. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%.).

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamNotionalConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: If the notional quantity is specified in a unit that does not match the unit in which the commodity reference price is quoted, the scaling or conversion factor used to convert the commodity reference price unit into the notional quantity unit should be stated here. If there is no conversion, this field is not intended to be used.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamTransportEquipment
fielddef.descr: The transportation equipment with which the commodity product will be delivered and received.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamElectingPartySide
fielddef.descr: A reference to the party able to choose whether the gas is delivered for a particular period as found in a swing or interruptible contract.

fielddef.name: NoDeliveryStreamCycles
fielddef.descr: Number of delivery cycles in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamCycleDesc
fielddef.descr: The delivery cycles during which the oil product will be transported in the pipeline.

fielddef.name: EncodedDeliveryStreamCycleDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedDeliveryStreamCycleDesc(41084) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedDeliveryStreamCycleDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the DeliveryStreamCycleDesc(41082) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the DeliveryStreamCycleDesc(41082) field.

fielddef.name: NoDeliveryStreamCommoditySources
fielddef.descr: Number of commodity sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamCommoditySource
fielddef.descr: The SCoTA coal cargo origin, mining region, mine(s), mining complex(es), loadout(s) or river dock(s) or other point(s) of origin that seller and buyer agree are acceptable origins for the coal product. For international coal transactions, this is the origin of the coal product. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-coal-product-source for values.

fielddef.name: DocumentationText
fielddef.descr: A sentence or phrase pertenant to the trade, not a reference to an external document. E.g. "To be registered with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, Acid Rain Division, SO2 Allowance Tracking System"

fielddef.name: EncodedDocumentationTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedDocumentationText(1527) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedDocumentationText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the DocumentationText(1513) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the DocumentationText(1513) field.

fielddef.name: SwapSubClass
fielddef.descr: The subclassification or subtype of swap.

fielddef.name: SettlRateIndex
fielddef.descr: In an outright or forward commodity trade that is cash settled this is the index used to determine the cash payment.

fielddef.name: SettlRateIndexLocation
fielddef.descr: This is an optional qualifying attribute of SettlRateIndex(1577) such as the delivery zone for an electricity contract.

fielddef.name: OptionExpirationDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the option expiration.

fielddef.name: EncodedOptionExpirationDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedOptionExpirationDesc(1697) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedOptionExpirationDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the OptionExpirationDesc(1581) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the OptionExpirationDesc(1581).

fielddef.name: StrikeUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Used to express the unit of measure (UOM) of the price if different from the contract.

fielddef.name: StrikeIndex
fielddef.descr: Specifies the index used to calculate the strike price.

fielddef.name: StrikeIndexSpread
fielddef.descr: Specifies the strike price offset from the named index.

fielddef.name: ValuationSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the source of trade valuation data.

fielddef.name: ValuationReferenceModel
fielddef.descr: Specifies the methodology and/or assumptions used to generate the trade value.

fielddef.name: StrategyType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of trade strategy.

fielddef.name: CommonPricingIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', it indicates that common pricing applies. Common pricing may be relevant for a transaction that references more than one commodity reference price.

fielddef.name: SettlDisruptionProvision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the consequences of bullion settlement disruption events.

fielddef.name: InstrumentRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction if not overridden elsewhere.

fielddef.name: InstrumentRoundingPrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: LegSettleOnOpenFlag
fielddef.descr: Indicator to determine if the instrument is to settle on open.

fielddef.name: LegInstrmtAssignmentMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method under which assignment was conducted.

fielddef.name: LegSecurityStatus
fielddef.descr: Used for derivatives. Denotes the current state of the InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: LegRestructuringType
fielddef.descr: A category of CDS credit event in which the underlying bond experiences a restructuring. Used to define a CDS instrument.

fielddef.name: LegSeniority
fielddef.descr: Specifies which issue (underlying bond) will receive payment priority in the event of a default. Used to define a CDS instrument.

fielddef.name: LegNotionalPercentageOutstanding
fielddef.descr: Indicates the notional percentage of the deal that is still outstanding based on the remaining components of the index. Used to calculate the true value of a CDS trade or position.

fielddef.name: LegOriginalNotionalPercentageOutstanding
fielddef.descr: Used to reflect the Original value prior to the application of a credit event. See LegNotionalPercentageOutstanding(2151).

fielddef.name: LegAttachmentPoint
fielddef.descr: Lower bound percentage of the loss that the tranche can endure.

fielddef.name: LegDetachmentPoint
fielddef.descr: Upper bound percentage of the loss the tranche can endure.

fielddef.name: LegObligationType
fielddef.descr: Type of reference obligation for credit derivatives contracts.

fielddef.name: LegSwapSubClass
fielddef.descr: The sub-classification or notional schedule type of the swap.

fielddef.name: LegNthToDefault
fielddef.descr: The Nth reference obligation in a CDS reference basket. If specified without LegMthToDefault(2158) the default will trigger a CDS payout. If LegMthToDefault(2158) is also present then payout occurs between the Nth and Mth obligations to default.

fielddef.name: LegMthToDefault
fielddef.descr: The Mth reference obligation to default in a CDS reference basket. When an NthToDefault(2157) to MthToDefault(2158) are represented then the CDS payout occurs between the Nth and Mth obligations to default.

fielddef.name: LegSettledEntityMatrixSource
fielddef.descr: Relevant settled entity matrix source.

fielddef.name: LegSettledEntityMatrixPublicationDate
fielddef.descr: Specifies the publication date of the applicable version of the matrix. When this element is omitted, the Standard Terms Supplement defines rules for which version of the matrix is applicable.

fielddef.name: LegCouponType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the coupon type of the bond.

fielddef.name: LegTotalIssuedAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the total amount of the issue. Corresponds to the par value multiplied by the number of issued security.

fielddef.name: LegCouponFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of the bond's coupon payment.

fielddef.name: LegCouponFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of the bond's coupon payment.

fielddef.name: LegCouponDayCount
fielddef.descr: The day count convention used in interest calculations for a bond or an interest bearing security.

fielddef.name: LegConvertibleBondEquityID
fielddef.descr: Identifies the equity in which a convertible bond can be converted to.

fielddef.name: LegConvertibleBondEquityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies class or source of the LegConvertibleBondEquitySecurityID(2166) value.

fielddef.name: LegContractPriceRefMonth
fielddef.descr: Reference month if there is no applicable LegMaturityMonthYear(610) value for the contract or security.

fielddef.name: LegLienSeniority
fielddef.descr: Indicates the seniority level of the lien in a loan.

fielddef.name: LegLoanFacility
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of loan when the credit default swap's reference obligation is a loan.

descr.p: Specifies the type of reference entity for first-to-default CDS basket contracts.

fielddef.name: LegIndexSeries
fielddef.descr: The series identifier of a credit default swap index.

fielddef.name: LegIndexAnnexVersion
fielddef.descr: The version of a credit default swap index annex.

fielddef.name: LegIndexAnnexDate
fielddef.descr: The date of a credit default swap index series annex.

fielddef.name: LegIndexAnnexSource
fielddef.descr: The source of a credit default swap series annex.

fielddef.name: LegSettlRateIndex
fielddef.descr: In an outright or forward commodity trade that is cash settled this is the index used to determine the cash payment.

fielddef.name: LegSettlRateIndexLocation
fielddef.descr: This is an optional qualifying attribute of LegSettlementRateIndex(2176) such as the delivery zone for an electricity contract.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExpirationDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the option expiration.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegOptionExpirationDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegOptionExpirationDesc(2180) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegOptionExpirationDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegOptionExpirationDesc(2178) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegOptionExpirationDesc(2178).

fielddef.name: LegStrikeMultiplier
fielddef.descr: Used for derivatives. Multiplier applied to the strike price for the purpose of calculating the settlement value.

fielddef.name: LegStrikeValue
fielddef.descr: The number of shares/units for the financial instrument involved in the option trade. Used for derivatives.

fielddef.name: LegStrikeUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Used to express the unit of measure (UOM) of the price if different from the contract.

fielddef.name: LegStrikeIndex
fielddef.descr: Specifies the index used to calculate the strike price.

fielddef.name: LegStrikeIndexSpread
fielddef.descr: Specifies the strike price offset from the named index.

fielddef.name: LegStrikePriceDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the strike price is determined at the point of option exercise. The strike may be fixed throughout the life of the option, set at expiration to the value of the underlying, set to the average value of the underlying , or set to the optimal value of the underlying.

fielddef.name: LegStrikePriceBoundaryMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the boundary condition to be used for the strike price relative to the underlying price at the point of option exercise.

fielddef.name: LegStrikePriceBoundaryPrecision
fielddef.descr: Used in combination with StrikePriceBoundaryMethod(2187) to specify the percentage of the strike price in relation to the underlying price. The percentage is generally 100 or greater for puts and 100 or less for calls.

fielddef.name: LegUnderlyingPriceDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the underlying price is determined at the point of option exercise. The underlying price may be set to the current settlement price, set to a special reference, set to the optimal value of the underlying during the defined period ("Look-back") or set to the average value of the underlying during the defined period ("Asian option").

fielddef.name: LegMinPriceIncrement
fielddef.descr: Minimum price increment for a given exchange-traded instrument. Could also be used to represent tick value.

fielddef.name: LegMinPriceIncrementAmount
fielddef.descr: Minimum price increment amount associated with the LegMinPriceIncrement(2190). For listed derivatives, the value can be calculated by multiplying LegMinPriceIncrement(2190) by LegContractMultiplier(614).

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethod
fielddef.descr: Settlement method for a contract or instrument. Additional values may be used with bilateral agreement.

fielddef.name: LegOptPayoutType
fielddef.descr: Indicates the type of valuation method or trigger payout for an in-the-money option.

fielddef.name: LegOptPayoutAmount
fielddef.descr: Cash amount indicating the pay out associated with an option. For binary options this is a fixed amount.

fielddef.name: LegPriceQuoteMethod
fielddef.item: Standard, money per unit of a physical
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method for price quotation.

fielddef.name: LegValuationMethod
fielddef.item: futures style with an attached cash
CDS style collateralization of market to market and coupon
CDS in delivery - use recovery rate to calculate obligation
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of valuation method applied.

fielddef.name: LegValuationSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the source of trade valuation data.

fielddef.name: LegValuationReferenceModel
fielddef.descr: Specifies the methodology and/or assumptions used to generate the trade value.

fielddef.name: LegListMethod
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether instruments are pre-listed only or can also be defined via user request.

fielddef.name: LegCapPrice
fielddef.descr: Used to express the ceiling price of a capped call.

fielddef.name: LegFloorPrice
fielddef.descr: Used to express the floor price of a capped put.

fielddef.name: LegFlexibleIndicator
fielddef.descr: Used to indicate a derivatives security that can be defined using flexible terms. The terms commonly permitted to be defined by market participants are expiration date and strike price. FlexibleIndicator is an alternative to LegCFICode(608) Standard/Non-standard attribute.

fielddef.name: LegFlexProductEligibilityIndicator
fielddef.descr: Used to indicate if a product or group of product supports the creation of flexible securities.

fielddef.name: LegPositionLimit
fielddef.descr: Position Limit for a given exchange-traded product.

fielddef.name: LegNTPositionLimit
fielddef.descr: Position limit in the near-term contract for a given exchange-traded product.

fielddef.name: LegCPProgram
fielddef.descr: The program under which a commercial paper is issued.

fielddef.name: LegCPRegType
fielddef.descr: The registration type of a commercial paper issuance.

fielddef.name: LegShortSaleRestriction
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether a restriction applies to short selling a security.

fielddef.name: LegStrategyType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of trade strategy.

fielddef.name: LegCommonPricingIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', it indicates that common pricing applies. Common pricing may be relevant for a transaction that references more than one commodity reference price.

fielddef.name: LegSettlDisruptionProvision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the consequences of bullion settlement disruption events.

fielddef.name: LegInstrumentRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction if not overridden elsewhere.

fielddef.name: LegInstrumentRoundingPrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionProvision
fielddef.descr: The consequences of market disruption events.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackProvision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the location of the fallback provision documentation.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionMaximumDays
fielddef.descr: Specifies the maximum number of market disruption days (commodity or bullion business days) in a contract or confirmation. If none are specified, the maximum number of market disruption days is five (5).

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionMaterialityPercentage
fielddef.descr: Used when a price materiality percentage applies to the price source disruption event and this event has been specified (Applicable to 2005 Commodity Definitions only).

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionMinimumFuturesContracts
fielddef.descr: Specifies the minimum futures contracts level that dictates whether or not a 'De Minimis Trading' event has occurred (Applicable to 1993 Commodity Definitions only).

fielddef.name: NoMarketDisruptionEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of disruption events in the repeating group.

descr.p: Specifies the market disruption event. For commodities see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-market-disruption for values. For foreign exchange, see http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Market_Disruption_Event for code list of applicable event types.
Create a new external code list with the following:

ul.li: PXMATERIAL - Price materiality is applicable. Value is the primary rate option
PXMATERIAL2 - Price materiality is applicable. Value is the secondary rate option. Multiple values are supported.

UNSCHEDHOL - Unscheduled Holiday. When present indicates that if the valuation date is not a business day and the market was not aware of such fact until 9am at the principal financial center(s) of the reference currency two business days prior, and if as a result the valuation date has not occurred on or before the next consecutive day after the deferral period then the next day after the deferral period that would have been a business day but for the unscheduled holiday shall be deemed to be the valuation date. Value is the maximum deferral period expressed as a Tenor, e.g. D30 means 30 days, M3 means 3 months

PSTPNMNT - Valuation Postponement. For the purposes of obtaining a settlement rate, the spot rate will be determined on the business day first succeeding the day on which the price source disruption ceases to exist, unless the disruption continues for consecutive calendar days equal to the maximum postponement. In such event, the spot rate will be determined on the next business day after the maximum days of postponement. Value is the maximum postponement period expressed as a Tenor, e.g. D30 means 30 days, M3 means 3 months

CUMEVNTS - Cumulative Events. In no event shall the total number of consecutive calendar days of deferral or postponement exceed the maximum days of postponement. Value is the maximum postponement period expressed as a Tenor, e.g. D30 means 30 days, M3 means 3 months.

fielddef.name: NoMarketDisruptionFallbacks
fielddef.descr: Number of fallbacks in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of disruption fallback. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-market-disruption-fallback for values.

fielddef.name: NoMarketDisruptionFallbackReferencePrices
fielddef.descr: Number of fallback reference securities in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierType
fielddef.descr: The type of reference price underlier.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityID
fielddef.descr: Specifies the identifier value of the security.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the class or source scheme of the security identifier.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc
fielddef.descr: Specifies the description of the underlying security.

fielddef.name: EncodedMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc(41102) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the MarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc(41100) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the MarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc(41100) field.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackOpenUnits
fielddef.descr: If there are multiple underlying assets, this specifies the number of units (index or securities) that constitute the underlier of the swap. In the case of a basket swap, this is used to reference both the number of basket units, and the number of each asset components of the basket when these are expressed in absolute terms.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackBasketCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency if the underlier is a basket. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackBasketDivisor
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basket divisor amount. This value is normally used to adjust the constituent weight for pricing or to adjust for dividends, or other corporate actions.

fielddef.name: MiscFeeRate
fielddef.descr: The fee rate when MiscFeeAmt(137) is a percentage of trade quantity.

fielddef.name: MiscFeeAmountDue
fielddef.descr: The fee amount due if different from MiscFeeAmt(137).

fielddef.name: ExerciseDesc
fielddef.descr: A description of the option exercise.

fielddef.name: EncodedExerciseDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedExerciseDesc(41102) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedExerciseDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the ExerciseDesc(41106) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the ExerciseDesc(41106) field.

fielddef.name: AutomaticExerciseIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates (when 'Y') that exercise is automatic when the strike price is crossed or the underlying trade is in the money.

fielddef.name: AutomaticExerciseThresholdRate
fielddef.descr: The threshold rate for triggering automatic exercise.

fielddef.name: ExerciseConfirmationMethod
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether follow-up confirmation of exercise (written or electronic) is required following telephonic notice by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent.

fielddef.name: ManualNoticeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center used for adjusting the time for manual exercise notice. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: FallbackExerciseIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the notional amount of the underlying swap, not previously exercised under the option, will be automatically exercised at the expiration time on the expiration date if at such time the buyer is in-the-money, provided that the difference between the settlement rate and the fixed rate under the relevant underlying swap is not less than one tenth of a percentage point (0.10% or 0.001).

fielddef.name: LimitedRightToConfirmIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the Seller may request the Buyer to confirm its intent to exercise if not done on or before the expiration time on the expiration date. If true ("Y") specific rules will apply in relation to the settlement mode.

fielddef.name: ExerciseSplitTicketIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates in physical settlement of bond and convertible bond options whether the party required to deliver the bonds will divide those to be delivered as notifying party desires to facilitate delivery obligations.

fielddef.name: NoOptionExerciseBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the option exercise dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseEarliestDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative earliest option exercise date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseEarliestDatePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative exercise date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseEarliestDateUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative exercise earliest date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of exercise dates.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of exercise dates.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted start date for calculating periodic exercise dates.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option exercise start date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Adjusted start date for calculating periodic exercise dates.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseSkip
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the referenced date schedule that are between each date in the relative date schedule. Thus a skip of 2 would mean that dates are relative to every second date in the referenced schedule. If present this should have a value greater than 1.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseNominationDeadline
fielddef.descr: Last date (adjusted) for establishing the option exercise terms.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseFirstDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted first exercise date.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseLastDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted last exercise date.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseEarliestTime
fielddef.descr: The earliest time at which notice of exercise can be given by the buyer to the seller (or seller's agent) (i) on the expriation date, in the case of a European style option, (ii) on each Bermuda option exercise date and the expiration date, in the case of a Bermuda style option, (iii) the commencement date to, and including, the expiration date, in the case of an American option.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseLatestTime
fielddef.descr: Latest exercise time. See also OptionExerciseEarliestTime(41134).

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center used to determine the locale for option exercise time, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values

fielddef.name: NoOptionExerciseDates
fielddef.descr: Number of dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseDate
fielddef.descr: An option exercise fixed date, unadjusted or adjusted depending on OptionExerciseDateType(41139).

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: NoOptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the option exercise expiration dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option exercise expiration date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of exercise expiration dates.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of exercise expiration dates.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of exercise expiration dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. This should only be used to override the roll convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative option exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationTime
fielddef.descr: The option exercise expiration time.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center used to determine the locale for option exercise expiration time, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoOptionExerciseExpirationDates
fielddef.descr: Number of fixed exercise expiration dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed option exercise expiration date.

fielddef.name: OptionExerciseExpirationDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of option exercise expiration date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: PaymentUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Used to express the unit of measure (UOM) of the payment amount if not in the currency of the trade.

fielddef.name: PaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative payment date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentForwardStartType
fielddef.descr: Forward start premium type.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentScheduleFixingDays
fielddef.descr: Number of fixing days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDayOfWeek
fielddef.descr: The day of the week on which fixing will take place.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDayNumber
fielddef.descr: The occurrence of the day of week on which fixing takes place.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this PaymentSchedule for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to payment schedule elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the schedule rate. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The schedule rate unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: The number to be multiplied by the derived floating rate of the payment schedule in order to arrive at the payment rate. If omitted, the schedule rate conversion factor is 1.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleRateSpreadType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is an absolute value to be added to the index rate or a percentage of the index rate.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPrice
fielddef.descr: The schedule settlement period price.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the schedule settlement period price. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPriceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The settlement period price unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleStepUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The schedule step unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDayDistribution
fielddef.descr: The distribution of fixing days.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDayCount
fielddef.descr: The number of days over which fixing should take place.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingLagPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the fixing lag duration.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingLagUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the fixing lag duration.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFlatRateIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', the Flat Rate is the New Worldwide Tanker Nominal Freight Scale for the Freight Index Route taken at the Trade Date of the transaction "Fixed". If 'N' it is taken on each Pricing Date "Floating".

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFlatRateAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the actual monetary value of the flat rate when PaymentStreamFlatRateIndicator(41180) = 'Y'.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFlatRateCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the actual flat rate. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamMaximumPaymentAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the limit on the total payment amount.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamMaximumPaymentCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of total payment amount limit. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamMaximumTransactionAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the limit on the payment amount that goes out in any particular calculation period.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamMaximumTransactionCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the period payment amount limit. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixedAmountUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fixed payment amount unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamTotalFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the total fixed payment amount.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamWorldScaleRate
fielddef.descr: The number of Worldscale points for purposes of the calculation of a fixed amount for a wet voyage charter commodity swap.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamContractPrice
fielddef.descr: The price per relevant unit for purposes of the calculation of a fixed amount for a dry voyage charter or time charter commodity swap.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamContractPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of PaymentStreamContractPrice(41190). Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamPricingBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexCurvePeriod2
fielddef.descr: Specifies the secondary time unit multiplier for the payment stream's floating rate index curve (Maye be used for a Forward Rate Agreement (FRA) with an average rate between two curve points).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexCurveUnit2
fielddef.descr: Specifies the secondary time unit associated with the payment stream's floating rate index curve.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexLocation
fielddef.descr: Specifies the location of the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexLevel
fielddef.descr: This is the weather Cooling Degree Days (CDD), Heating Degree Days (HDD) or HDD index level specified as the number of (amount of) weather index units specified by the parties in the related confirmation.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the rate index level.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamSettlLevel
fielddef.descr: Specifies how weather index units are to be calculated.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamReferenceLevel
fielddef.descr: This is the weather Cooling Degree Days (CDD), Heating Degree Days (HDD) or HDD reference level specified as the number of (amount of) weather index units specified by the parties in the related confirmation.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamReferenceLevelUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the rate reference level.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamReferenceLevelEqualsZeroIndicator
fielddef.descr: When set to 'Y', it indicates the weather reference level equals zero.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateSpreadCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the floating rate spread. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateSpreadUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Species the unit of measure (UOM) of the floating rate spread.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: The number to be multiplied by the derived floating rate of the payment stream in order to arrive at the payment rate. If omitted, the floating rate conversion factor is 1.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateSpreadType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is an absolute value to be added to the index rate or a percentage of the index rate.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLastResetRate
fielddef.descr: The floating rate determined at the most recent reset. The rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalRate
fielddef.descr: The floating rate determined at the final reset. The rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCalculationLagPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the calculation lag duration.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCalculationLagUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the calculation lag duration.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity pricing day type.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingDayDistribution
fielddef.descr: The distribution of pricing days.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingDayCount
fielddef.descr: The number of days over which pricing should take place.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingBusinessCalendar
fielddef.descr: Specifies the business calendar to use for pricing. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-business-calendar for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the pricing dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamPaymentDates
fielddef.descr: Number of payment dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed stream payment date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPaymentDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of payment date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamMasterAgreementPaymentDatesIndicator
fielddef.descr: When set to 'Y', it indicates that payment dates are specified in the relevant master agreement.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamPricingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of pricing dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed stream pricing date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of pricing date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamPricingDays
fielddef.descr: Number of pricing days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingDayOfWeek
fielddef.descr: The day of the week on which pricing takes place.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamPricingDayNumber
fielddef.descr: The occurrence of the day of week on which pricing takes place.

fielddef.name: NoPricingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PricingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PricingDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted pricing or fixing date.

fielddef.name: PricingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Pricing or fixing date adjustment business day convention. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument.

fielddef.name: PricingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted pricing or fixing date.

fielddef.name: PricingTime
fielddef.descr: Specifies the local market time of the pricing or fixing.

fielddef.name: PricingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Specifies the business center for determining the pricing or fixing time. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoStreamAssetAttributes
fielddef.descr: Number of asset attribute entries in the group.

fielddef.name: StreamAssetAttributeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the name of the attribute. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Asset_Attribute_Types for code list of applicable asset attribute types.

fielddef.name: StreamAssetAttributeValue
fielddef.descr: Specifies the value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: StreamAssetAttributeLimit
fielddef.descr: Limit or lower acceptable value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: NoStreamCalculationPeriodDates
fielddef.descr: Number of calculation period dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: StreamCalculationPeriodDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed calculation period date.

fielddef.name: StreamCalculationPeriodDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of fixed calculation period date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: StreamCalculationPeriodDatesXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this calculation period for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: StreamCalculationPeriodDatesXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another calculation period for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: StreamCalculationBalanceOfFirstPeriod
fielddef.descr: When specified and set to 'Y', it indicates that the first calculation period should run from the effective date to the end of the calendar period in which the effective date falls (e.g. Jan 15 - Jan 31 if the calculation periods are one month long and effective date is Jan 15.). If 'N' or not specified, it indicates that the first calculation period should run from the effective date for one whole period (e.g. Jan 15 to Feb 14 if the calculation periods are one month long and the effective date is Jan 15.).

fielddef.name: StreamCalculationCorrectionPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the length of time after the publication of the data when corrections can be made.

fielddef.name: StreamCalculationCorrectionUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the length of time after the publication of the data when corrections can be made.

fielddef.name: NoStreamCommoditySettlBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityBase
fielddef.descr: Specifies the general base type of the commodity traded. Where possible, this should follow the naming convention used in the 2005 ISDA Commodity Definitions (Examples of general commodity base types include: Metal, Bullion, Oil, Natural Gas, Coal, Electricity, Inter-Energy, Grains, Oils Seeds, Dairy, Livestock, Forestry, Softs, Weather, Emissions).

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of commodity product. For coal see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-coal-product-type for values. For metals see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-metal-product-type for values. For bullion see http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Bullion_Types for the external code list of bullion types.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySecurityID
fielddef.descr: Specifies the market identifier for the commodity.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySecurityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of the StreamCommoditySecurityIDSource(41253) value.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the commodity asset.

fielddef.name: EncodedStreamCommodityDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedStreamCommodityDesc(41257) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedStreamCommodityDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the StreamCommodityDesc(41255) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the StreamCommodityDesc(41255) field.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the commodity asset.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityCurrency
fielddef.descr: Identifies the currency of the commodity asset. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityExchange
fielddef.descr: Identifies the exchange where the commodity is traded.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information used for commodities. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Commodity_Rate_Source for code list of applicable sources.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityRateReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityRatePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: StreamDataProvider
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity data or information provider. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-information-provider for values.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityPricingType
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the pricing or rate setting of the trade is to be determined or based upon. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Commodity_Rate_Pricing_Type for code list of applicable commodity pricing types.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityNearbySettlDayPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the nearby settlement day (When the commodity transaction references a futures contract, the delivery or settlement dates are a nearby month or week. For example, for eighth nearby month use Period=8 and Unit=Mo).

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityNearbySettlDayUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the nearby settlement day.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted commodity delivery date.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the commodity delivery date. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted commodity delivery date.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlMonth
fielddef.descr: Specifies a fixed single month for commodity delivery (Use 1 for January, 2 for February, etc.).

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlDateRollPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the commodity delivery date roll (For a commodity transaction that references a listed future via the delivery dates, this is the day offset on which the specified future will roll to the next nearby month when the referenced future expires).

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlDateRollUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the commodity delivery date roll.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity delivery roll day type.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this stream commodity for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to a stream commodity elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: NoStreamCommodityAltIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of alternate security identifers.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityAltID
fielddef.descr: Alternate security identifier value for the commodity.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityAltIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of the alternate commodity security identifier.

fielddef.name: NoStreamCommodityDataSources
fielddef.descr: Number of data sources in the repeating group. The order of entry determines priority - first is the main source, second is fallback, third is second fallback.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityDataSourceID
fielddef.descr: Data source identifier.

fielddef.name: StreamCommodityDataSourceIDType
fielddef.descr: Type of data source identifier.

fielddef.name: NoStreamCommoditySettlDays
fielddef.descr: Number of days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlDay
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day or group of days for delivery.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlTotalHours
fielddef.descr: Sum of the hours specified in StreamCommoditySettlTimeGrp.

fielddef.name: NoStreamCommoditySettlTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of hour ranges in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlStart
fielddef.descr: Specifies the start time for commodities settlement where delivery occurs over time. The time format is specified by the settlement time type.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlEnd
fielddef.descr: Specifies the end time for commodities settlement where delivery occurs over time. The time format is specified by the settlement time type.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the format of the commodities settlement start and end times.

fielddef.name: NoStreamCommoditySettlPeriods
fielddef.descr: Number of commodity settlement periods in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlCountry
fielddef.descr: Specifies the country where delivery takes place. Uses ISO 3166 2-character country code.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlTimeZone
fielddef.descr: Commodity delivery timezone specified as "prevailing" rather than "standard" or "daylight". See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Prevailing_Timezones for code list of applicable prevailing timezones.

descr.p: Specifies the commodity delivery flow type.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodNotional
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery quantity associated with this settlement period.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unit of measure (UOM) of the delivery quantity associated with this settlement period.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the settlement period frequency.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the settlement period frequency.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodPrice
fielddef.descr: The settlement period price.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodPriceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the settlement period price unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the settlement period price. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlHolidaysProcessingInstruction
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether holidays are included in the settlement periods. Required for electricity contracts.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this settlement period for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: StreamCommoditySettlPeriodXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another settlement period for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: StreamXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this Stream for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: StreamNotionalXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another Stream notional for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: StreamNotionalFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the swap stream's notional frequency.

fielddef.name: StreamNotionalFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the swap stream's notional frequency.

fielddef.name: StreamNotionalCommodityFrequency
fielddef.descr: The commodity's notional or quantity delivery frequency.

fielddef.name: StreamNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery stream quantity unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: StreamTotalNotional
fielddef.descr: Total notional or delivery quantity over the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: StreamTotalNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unit of measure (UOM) for the total notional or delivery quantity over the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: NoMandatoryClearingJurisdictions
fielddef.descr: Number of mandatory clearing jurisdictions.

fielddef.name: MandatoryClearingJurisdiction
fielddef.descr: Identifier of the regulatory jurisdiction requiring the trade to be cleared.

fielddef.name: LastQtyChanged
fielddef.descr: The positive or negative change in quantity when this report is a trade correction or continuation.

fielddef.name: TradeVersion
fielddef.descr: Specifies the version of a trade or contract. This is used by systems or trading platforms in conjunction with TradeID(1003) to uniquely identify the version of a trade or contract. If used the conditions for a change of version are subject to bilateral agreement. It is recommended to change the version only for significant updates to the business entity rather than for minor changes to trade details or systematic distribution of reports. Examples where the version would change are trade quantity modification, customer account assignment or trade novation.

fielddef.name: HistoricalReportIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates that the trade or event being reported occurred in the past and the trade is terminated or no longer active.

fielddef.name: NoLegAdditionalTermBondRefs
fielddef.descr: Number of bonds in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondSecurityID
fielddef.descr: Security identifier of the bond.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondSecurityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source scheme of the LegAdditionalTermBondSecurityID(41317) value.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the bond.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegAdditionalTermBondDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegAdditionalTermBondDesc(41321) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegAdditionalTermBondDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegAdditionalTermBondDesc(41319) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegAdditionalTermBondDesc(41319) field.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the bond value is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondIssuer
fielddef.descr: Issuer of the bond.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegAdditionalTermBondIssuerLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegAdditionalTermBondIssuer(41325) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegAdditionalTermBondIssuer
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegAdditionalTermBondIssuer(41323) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegAdditionalTermBondIssuer(41323) field.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondSeniority
fielddef.descr: Specifies the bond's payment priority in the event of a default.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondCouponType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the coupon type of the bond.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondCouponRate
fielddef.descr: Coupon rate of the bond. See also CouponRate(223).

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondMaturityDate
fielddef.descr: Maturity date of the bond.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondParValue
fielddef.descr: Par value of the bond.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondCurrentTotalIssuedAmount
fielddef.descr: Total issued amount of the bond.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondCouponFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of the bond's coupon payment.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondCouponFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of the bond's coupon payment.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermBondDayCount
fielddef.descr: The day count convention used in interest calculations for a bond or an interest bearing security.

fielddef.name: NoLegAdditionalTerms
fielddef.descr: Number of additional terms in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermConditionPrecedentBondIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the condition precedent bond is applicable. The swap contract is only valid if the bond is issued and if there is any dispute over the terms of fixed stream then the bond terms would be used.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalTermDiscrepancyClauseIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the discrepancy clause is applicable.

fielddef.name: NoLegAssetAttributes
fielddef.descr: Number of asset attribute entries in the group.

fielddef.name: LegAssetAttributeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the name of the attribute. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Asset_Attribute_Types for code list of applicable asset attribute types.

fielddef.name: LegAssetAttributeValue
fielddef.descr: Specifies the value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: LegAssetAttributeLimit
fielddef.descr: Limit or lower acceptable value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: NoLegCashSettlDealers
fielddef.descr: Number of dealers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDealer
fielddef.descr: Identifies the dealer from whom price quotations for the reference obligation are obtained for the purpose of cash settlement valuation calculation.

fielddef.name: NoLegCashSettlTerms
fielddef.descr: Number of elements in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the LegCashSettlAmount(41357) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegCasSettlValuationFirstBusinessDayOffset
fielddef.descr: The number of business days after settlement conditions have been satisfied, when the calculation agent is to obtain a price quotation on the reference obligation for purposes of cash settlement. Associated with ISDA 2003 Term: Valuation Date.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlValuationSubsequentBusinessDaysOffset
fielddef.descr: The number of business days between successive valuation dates when multiple valuation dates are applicable for cash settlement.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlNumOfValuationDates
fielddef.descr: Where multiple valuation dates are specified as being applicable for cash settlement, this element specifies the number of applicable valuation dates. Associated with ISDA 2003 Term: Valuation Date

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlValuationTime
fielddef.descr: Time of valuation.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used at valuation time for cash settlement purposes e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlQuoteMethod
fielddef.descr: The type of quote used to determine the cash settlement price.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlQuoteAmount
fielddef.descr: When determining the cash settlement amount, if weighted average price quotes are to be obtained for the reference obligation, this is the upper limit to the outstanding principal balance of the reference obligation for which the quote should be obtained. If not specifed, the ISDA definitions provide for a fallback amount equal to floating rate payer calculation amount (ISDA 2003 Term: Quotation Amount).

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlQuoteCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the LegCashSettlQuoteAmount(41352) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 Currency Code.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlMinimumQuoteAmount
fielddef.descr: When determining the cash settlement amount, if weighted average price quotes are to be obtained for the reference obligation, this is the minimum intended threshold amount of outstanding principal balance of the reference obligation for which the quote should be obtained. If not specified, the ISDA definitions provide for a fallback amount of the lower of either USD1,000,000 (or its equivalent in the relevent obligation currency) or the (minimum) quoted amount (ISDA 2003 Term: Minimum Quotation Amount).

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlMinimumQuoteCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the LegCashSettlQuoteMinimumAmount(41354) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 Currency Code.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlBusinessDays
fielddef.descr: The number of business days used in the determination of the cash settlement payment date (If a cash settlement amount is specified, the cash settlement payment date will be this number of business days following the calculation of the final price. If a cash settlement amount is not specified, the cash settlement payment date will be this number of business days after all conditions to settlement are satisfied. ISDA 2003 Term: Cash Settlement Date).

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlAmount
fielddef.descr: The amount paid between the trade parties, seller to the buyer, for cash settlement on the cash settlement date (If not specified this would typically be calculated as ((100 or the reference price) - reference obligation price) x floating rate payer calculation amount. Price values are all expressed as a percentage. ISDA 2003 Term: Cash Settlement Amount).

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlRecoveryFactor
fielddef.descr: Used for fixed recovery, this specifies the recovery level as determined at contract inception, to be applied in the event of a default. The factor is used to calculate the amount paid by the seller to the buyer for cash settlement on the cash settlement date. The amount calculated is (1 - LegCashSettlRecoveryFactor(41358)) x floating rate payer calculation amount. The currency is derived from the floating rate payer calculation amount.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlFixedTermIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether fixed settlement is applicable or not applicable in a recovery lock.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlAccruedInterestIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether accrued interest is included or not in the value provided in LegCashSettlAmount(41357). For cash settlement this specifies whether quotations should be obtained inclusive or not of accrued interest. For physical settlement this specifies whether the buyer should deliver the obligation with an outstanding principal balance that includes or excludes accrued interest. ISDA 2003 Term: Include/Exclude Accrued Interest.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlValuationMethod
fielddef.descr: The ISDA defined methodology for determining the final price of the reference obligation for purposes of cash settlement. ISDA 2003 Term: Valuation Method.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlTermXID
fielddef.descr: A named string value referenced by UnderlyingSettlTermXIDRef(41315).

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventAveragingObservations
fielddef.descr: The number of averaging observations in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventAveragingObservationNumber
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to the ordinal observation as specified either in the LegComplexEventScheduleGrp or LegComplexEventPeriodDateGrp components.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventAveragingWeight
fielddef.descr: The weight factor to be applied to the observation.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventCreditEvents
fielddef.descr: The number of credit events specified in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of credit event. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Types for code list of applicable event types.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventValue
fielddef.descr: The credit event value appropriate to LegComplexEventCreditEventType(41367). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Types for applicable event type values.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the applicable currency when LegComplexEventCreditEventCurrency(41368) is an amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time uinit multiplier for complex credit events.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with complex credit events.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type for the credit events that specify a period and unit.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information used for credit events. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Rate_Source for code list of applicable sources.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventCreditEventQualifiers
fielddef.descr: Number of qualifiers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventQualifier
fielddef.descr: Specifies a complex event qualifier. Used to further qualify LegComplexEventCreditEventType(41367).

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventPeriodDateTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the date-time repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPeriodDate
fielddef.descr: Averaging date for an Asian option. Trigger date for a Barrier or Knock option.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPeriodTime
fielddef.descr: Averaging time for an Asian option.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventPeriods
fielddef.descr: Number of periods in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPeriodType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the period type.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center for adjusting dates and times in the schedule or date-time group. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventRateSources
fielddef.descr: Number of rate sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information. For FX, the reference source to be used for the FX spot rate.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventRateSourceType
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the rate source specified is a primary or secondary source.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference page from the rate source. For FX, the reference page to the spot rate is to be used for the reference FX spot rate. When LegComplexEventRateSource(41383) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEvenReferencePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted complex event date (For example, the second expiration date for a calendar spread option strategy).

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the complex event date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative date offset.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative date offset.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of day for the complex event.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Date adjustment business day convention. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted complex event date.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventFixingTime
fielddef.descr: Local market time of fixing.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventFixingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center for determining the actual fixing times. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventCreditEventSources
fielddef.descr: Number of event sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventSource
fielddef.descr: A newspaper or electronic news service that may publish relevant information used in the determination of whether or not a credit event has occurred.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of complex events in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of complex event.

fielddef.name: LegComplexOptPayoutPaySide
fielddef.descr: Trade side of payout payer.

fielddef.name: LegComplexOptPayoutReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: Trade side of payout receiver.

fielddef.name: LegComplexOptPayoutUnderlier
fielddef.descr: Reference to the underlier whose payments are being passed through.

fielddef.name: LegComplexOptPayoutAmount
fielddef.descr: Cash amount indicating the pay out associated with an event. For binary options this is a fixed amount.

fielddef.name: LegComplexOptPayoutPercentage
fielddef.descr: Percentage of observed price for calculating the payout associated with the event.

fielddef.name: LegComplexOptPayoutTime
fielddef.descr: Specifies when the payout is to occur.

fielddef.name: LegComplexOptPayoutCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the payout amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPrice
fielddef.descr: Specifies the price at which the complex event takes effect. Impact of the event price is determined by the LegComplexEventType(2219).

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPricePercentage
fielddef.descr: Specifies the price percentage at which the complex event takes effect. Impact of the event price is determined by the LegComplexEventType(2219).

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPriceBoundaryMethod
fielddef.item: Less than or equal to ComplexEventPrice(1486)
Greater than or equal to ComplexEventPrice(1486)
fielddef.descr: Specifies the boundary condition to be used for the event price relative to the complex event price at the point the complex event outcome takes effect as determined by the LegComplexEventPriceTimeType(2231).

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPriceBoundaryPrecision
fielddef.descr: Used in combination with LegComplexEventPriceBoundaryMethod(2229) to specify the percentage of the strike price in relation to the underlying price. The percentage is generally 100 or greater for puts and 100 or less for calls.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPriceTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies when the complex event outcome takes effect. The outcome of a complex event is a payout or barrier action as specified by the LegComplexEventType(2219).

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCondition
fielddef.descr: Specifies the condition between complex events when more than one event is specified. Multiple barrier events would use an "or" condition since only one can be effective at a given time. A set of digital range events would use an "and" condition since both conditions must be in effect for a payout to result.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCurrencyOne
fielddef.descr: Specifies the first or only reference currency of the trade. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCurrencyTwo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the second reference currency of the trade. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventQuoteBasis
fielddef.descr: For foreign exchange Quanto option feature.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventFixedFXRate
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fixed FX rate alternative for FX Quantro options.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method according to which an amount or a date is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCalculationAgent
fielddef.descr: Used to identify the calculation agent.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: Upper strike price for Asian option feature. Strike percentage for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventStrikeFactor
fielddef.descr: Strike factor for Asian option feature. Upper strike percentage for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventStrikeNumberOfOptions
fielddef.descr: Upper string number of options for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventsXIDRef
