fielddef.descr: Reference to credit event table elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventNotifyingParty
fielddef.descr: The notifying party is the party that notifies the other party when a credit event has occurred by means of a credit event notice. If more than one party is referenced as being the notifying party then either party may notify the other of a credit event occurring.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Specifies the local business center for which the credit event is to be determined. The inclusion of this business center implies that Greenwich Mean Time in Section 3.3 of the 2003 ISDA Credit Derivatives Definitions is replaced by the local time of the specified business center. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventStandardSources
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', indicates that ISDA defined Standard Public Sources are applicable.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventCreditEventMinimumSources
fielddef.descr: The minimum number of the specified public information sources that must publish information that reasonably confirms that a credit event has occurred. The market convention is two.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this complex event for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to a complex event elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventDates
fielddef.descr: Number of complex event dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventStartDate
fielddef.descr: Specifies the start date of the date range on which a complex event is effective. The start date will be set equal to the end date for single day events such as Bermuda options. The start date must always be less than or equal to end date.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventEndDate
fielddef.descr: Specifies the end date of the date range on which a complex event is effective. The start date will be set equal to the end date for single day events such as Bermuda options. The end date must always be greater than or equal to start date.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of complex event times in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventStartTime
fielddef.descr: Specifies the start time of the time range on which a complex event date is effective. The start time must always be less than or equal to the end time.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventEndTime
fielddef.descr: Specifies the end time of the time range on which a complex event date is effective. The end time must always be greater than or equal to the start time.

fielddef.name: NoLegComplexEventSchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventScheduleStartDate
fielddef.descr: Start date of the schedule.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventScheduleEndDate
fielddef.descr: End date of the schedule.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventScheduleFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the schedule date frequency.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventScheduleFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the schedule date frequency.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventScheduleRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. This should only be used to override the roll convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: NoLegDeliverySchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of delivery schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of delivery schedule.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier for this instance of delivery schedule for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleNotional
fielddef.descr: Physical delivery quantity.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery quantity unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleNotionalCommodityFrequency
fielddef.descr: The frequency of notional delivery.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the negative tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in LegDeliveryScheduleToleranceType(41417). Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: LegDeliverySchedulePositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the positive tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in LegDeliveryScheduleToleranceType(41417). Value may exceed agreed upon value. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleToleranceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value's unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleToleranceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value type.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlCountry
fielddef.descr: Specifies the country where delivery takes place. Uses ISO 3166 2-character country code.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeZone
fielddef.descr: Delivery timezone specified as "prevailing" rather than "standard" or "daylight". See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Prevailing_Timezones for code list of applicable prevailing timezones.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlFlowType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery flow type.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlHolidaysProcessingInstruction
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether holidays are included in the settlement periods. Required for electricity contracts.

fielddef.name: NoLegDeliveryScheduleSettlDays
fielddef.descr: Number of delivery schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlDay
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day or group of days for delivery.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlTotalHours
fielddef.descr: The sum of the total hours specified in the LegDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeGrp component.

fielddef.name: NoLegDeliveryScheduleSettlTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of hour ranges in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlStart
fielddef.descr: Specifies the scheduled start time for the delivery of the commodity where delivery occurs over specified times. The format of the time value is specified in LegDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType(41428).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlEnd
fielddef.descr: Specifies the scheduled end time for the delivery of the commodity where delivery occurs over specified times. The format of the time value is specified in LegDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType(41428).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the format of the delivery start and end time values.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of delivery stream.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamPipeline
fielddef.descr: The name of the oil delivery pipeline.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamEntryPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity will enter the delivery mechanism or pipeline.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamWithdrawalPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity product will be withdrawn prior to delivery.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity product will be delivered and received. Value specified should follow market convention appropriate for the commodity product. For bullion, see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/bullion-delivery-location for values.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamDeliveryRestriction
fielddef.descr: Specifies under what conditions the buyer and seller should be excused of their delivery obligations.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamDeliveryContingency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the electricity delivery contingency. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/electricity-transmission-contingency for values.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamDeliveryContingentPartySide
fielddef.descr: The trade side value of the party responsible for electricity delivery contingency.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamDeliverAtSourceIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', delivery of the coal product is to be at its source.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamRiskApportionment
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the parties to the trade apportion responsibility for the delivery of the commodity product. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Risk_Apportionment for the details of the external code list.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamRiskApportionmentSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the source or legal framework for the risk apportionment. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Risk_Apportionment_Source for the details of the external code list.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamTitleTransferLocation
fielddef.descr: Specifies the title transfer location.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamTitleTransferCondition
fielddef.descr: Specifies the condition of title transfer.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamImporterOfRecord
fielddef.descr: A party, not necessarily of the trade, who is the Importer of Record for the purposes of paying customs duties and applicable taxes or costs related to importation.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the negative tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in LegDeliveryStreamToleranceType(41445). Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamPositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the positive tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in LegDeliveryStreamToleranceType(41445). Value may exceed agreed upon value. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamToleranceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value's unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamToleranceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value type.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamToleranceOptionSide
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the tolerance is at the seller's or buyer's option.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamTotalPositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: The positive percent tolerance which applies to the total quantity delivered over all shipment periods. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%.).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamTotalNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: The negative percent tolerance which applies to the total quantity delivered over all shipment periods. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%.).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamNotionalConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: If the notional quantity is specified in a unit that does not match the unit in which the commodity reference price is quoted, the scaling or conversion factor used to convert the commodity reference price unit into the notional quantity unit should be stated here. If there is no conversion, this field is not intended to be used.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamTransportEquipment
fielddef.descr: The transportation equipment with which the commodity product will be delivered and received (Examples of transportation equipment or mode are barge, truck, railcar, etc.).

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamElectingPartySide
fielddef.descr: A reference to the party able to choose whether the gas is delivered for a particular period e.g. a swing or interruptible contract.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamAssetAttributes
fielddef.descr: Number of asset attribute entries in the group.

fielddef.name: LegStreamAssetAttributeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the name of the attribute. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Asset_Attribute_Types for code list of applicable asset attribute types.

fielddef.name: LegStreamAssetAttributeValue
fielddef.descr: Specifies the value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: LegStreamAssetAttributeLimit
fielddef.descr: Limit or lower acceptable value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: NoLegDeliveryStreamCycles
fielddef.descr: Number of commodity sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamCycleDesc
fielddef.descr: The delivery cycles during which the oil product will be transported in the pipeline.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegDeliveryStreamCycleDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegDeliveryStreamCycleDesc(41459) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegDeliveryStreamCycleDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegDeliveryStreamCycleDesc(41457) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegLeg DeliveryStream(41457) field.

fielddef.name: NoLegDeliveryStreamCommoditySources
fielddef.descr: Number of commodity sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamCommoditySource
fielddef.descr: The SCoTA coal cargo origin, mining region, mine(s), mining complex(es), loadout(s) or river dock(s) or other point(s) of origin that seller and buyer agree are acceptable origins for the coal product. For international coal transactions, this is the origin of the coal product. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-coal-product-source for values.

fielddef.name: NoLegInstrumentParties
fielddef.descr: Number of parties in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegInstrumentPartyID
fielddef.descr: Used to identify party id related to instrument.

fielddef.name: LegInstrumentPartyIDSource
fielddef.descr: Used to identify source of instrument party id.

fielddef.name: LegInstrumentPartyRole
fielddef.descr: Used to identify the role of instrument party id.

fielddef.name: NoLegInstrumentPartySubIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of parties sub-IDs in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegInstrumentPartySubID
fielddef.descr: PartySubID value within an instrument party repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegInstrumentPartySubIDType
fielddef.descr: Type of LegInstrumentPartySubID (2259) value.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionProvision
fielddef.descr: The consequences of market disruption events.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackProvision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the location of the fallback provision documentation.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionMaximumDays
fielddef.descr: Specifies the maximum number of market disruption days (commodity or bullion business days) in a contract or confirmation. If none are specified, the maximum number of market disruption days is five (5) (ISDA 2005 Commodity Definition).

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionMaterialityPercentage
fielddef.descr: Used when a price materiality percentage applies to the price source disruption event and this event has been specified (Applicable to 2005 Commodity Definitions only).

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionMinimumFuturesContracts
fielddef.descr: Specifies the minimum futures contracts level that dictates whether or not a 'De Minimis Trading' event has occurred (Applicable to 1993 Commodity Definitions only).

fielddef.name: NoLegMarketDisruptionEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of disruption events in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionEvent
fielddef.descr: Specifies the market disruption event. For commodities see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-market-disruption for values. For foreign exchange, http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Market_Disruption_Event see for code list of applicable event types.

fielddef.name: NoLegMarketDisruptionFallbacks
fielddef.descr: Number of fallbacks in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of disruption fallback. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-market-disruption-fallback for values.

fielddef.name: NoLegMarketDisruptionFallbackReferencePrices
fielddef.descr: Number of fallback reference securities in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierType
fielddef.descr: The type of reference price underlier.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityID
fielddef.descr: Specifies the identifier value of the security.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the class or source scheme of the security identifier.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc
fielddef.descr: Specifies the description of the underlying security.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc (41477) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc(41475) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc(41475) field.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackOpenUnits
fielddef.descr: If there are multiple underlying assets, this specifies the number of units (index or securities) that constitute the underlier of the swap. In the case of a basket swap, this is used to reference both the number of basket units, and the number of each asset components of the basket when these are expressed in absolute terms.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackBasketCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency if the underlier is a basket. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackBasketDivisor
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basket divisor amount. This value is normally used to adjust the constituent weight for pricing or to adjust for dividends, or other corporate actions.

fielddef.name: LegExerciseDesc
fielddef.descr: A description of the option exercise.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegExerciseDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegExerciseDesc(41483) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegExerciseDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegExerciseDesc(41481) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegExerciseDesc(41481) field.

fielddef.name: LegAutomaticExerciseIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates (when 'Y') that exercise is automatic when the strike price is crossed or the underlying trade is in the money.

fielddef.name: LegAutomaticExerciseThresholdRate
fielddef.descr: The threshold rate for triggering automatic exercise.

fielddef.name: LegExerciseConfirmationMethod
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether follow-up confirmation of exercise (written or electronic) is required following telephonic notice by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent.

fielddef.name: LegManualNoticeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center used for adjusting the time for manual exercise notice. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegFallbackExerciseIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the notional amount of the underlying swap, not previously exercised under the option, will be automatically exercised at the expiration time on the expiration date if at such time the buyer is in-the-money, provided that the difference between the settlement rate and the fixed rate under the relevant underlying swap is not less than one tenth of a percentage point (0.10% or 0.001).

fielddef.name: LegLimitRightToConfirmIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the Seller may request the Buyer to confirm its intent to exercise if not done on or before the expiration time on the expiration date. If true ("Y") specific rules will apply in relation to the settlement mode.

fielddef.name: LegExerciseSplitTicketIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates in physical settlement of bond and convertible bond options whether the party required to deliver the bonds will divide those to be delivered as notifying party desires to facilitate delivery obligations.

fielddef.name: NoLegOptionExerciseBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the option exercise dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseEarliestDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative earliest exercise date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseEarliestDatePeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the relative exercise date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseEarliestDateUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the relative exercise earliest date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the frequency of exercise dates.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the frequency of exercise dates.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted start date for calculating periodic exercise dates.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option exercise start date is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the relative exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the relative exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted start date for calculating periodic exercise dates.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseSkip
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the referenced date schedule that are between each date in the relative date schedule. Thus a skip of 2 would mean that dates are relative to every second date in the referenced schedule. If present this should have a value greater than 1.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseNominationDeadline
fielddef.descr: The last date (adjusted) for establishing the option exercise terms.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseFirstDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted first exercise date.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseLastDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted last exercise date.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseEarliestTime
fielddef.descr: The earliest time at which notice of exercise can be given by the buyer to the seller (or seller's agent) (i) on the expriation date, in the case of a European style option, (ii) on each Bermuda option exercise date and the expiration date, in the case of a Bermuda style option, (iii) the commencement date to, and including, the expiration date, in the case of an American option.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseLatestTime
fielddef.descr: The latest exercise time. See also LegOptionExerciseEarliestTime(41509).

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center used to determine the locale for option exercise time, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegOptionExerciseDates
fielddef.descr: Number of dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted option exercise fixed date.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of option exercise date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: NoLegOptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the option exercise expiration dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option exercise expiration is relative to an anchor date.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the relative exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the relative exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the frequency of exercise expiration dates.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the frequency of exercise expiration dates.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of exercise expiration dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. This should only be used to override the roll convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative option exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationTime
fielddef.descr: The option exercise expiration time.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center used to determine the locale for option exercise expiration time, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegOptionExerciseExpirationDates
fielddef.descr: Number of fixed exercise expiration dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted option exercise expiration fixed date.

fielddef.name: LegOptionExerciseExpirationDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of option exercise expiration date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentScheduleFixingDays
fielddef.descr: Number of fixing days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDayOfWeek
fielddef.descr: The day of the week on which fixing takes place.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDayNumber
fielddef.descr: The occurrence of the day of week on which fixing takes place.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this LegPaymentSchedule for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to payment schedule elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the schedule rate. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The schedule rate unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: The number multipled by the derived floating rate of the leg's payment schedule in order to arrive at the payment rate. If omitted, the schedule rate conversion factor is 1.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleRateSpreadType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is an absolute value to be added to the index rate or a percentage of the index rate.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPrice
fielddef.descr: The schedule settlement period price.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the schedule settlement period price. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPriceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The settlement period price unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleStepUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The schedule step unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDayDistribution
fielddef.descr: The distribution of fixing days.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDayCount
fielddef.descr: The number of days over which fixing should take place.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingLagPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the fixing lag duration.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingLagUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the fixing lag duration.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFlatRateIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', the Flat Rate is the New Worldwide Tanker Nominal Freight Scale for the Freight Index Route taken at the trade date of the transaction "Fixed". If 'N' it is taken on each pricing date "Floating".

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFlatRateAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the actual monetary value of the flat rate when LegPaymentStreamFlatRateIndicator(41549) = 'Y'.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFlatRateCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the actual flat rate. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegStreamMaximumPaymentAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the limit on the total payment amount.

fielddef.name: LegStreamMaximumPaymentCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of total payment amount limit. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegStreamMaximumTransactionAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the limit on the payment amount that goes out in any particular calculation period.

fielddef.name: LegStreamMaximumTransactionCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the period payment amount limit. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixedAmountUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The fixed payment amount unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamTotalFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the total fixed payment amount.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamWorldScaleRate
fielddef.descr: The number of Worldscale points for purposes of the calculation of a fixed amount for a wet voyage charter commodity swap.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamContractPrice
fielddef.descr: The price per relevant unit for purposes of the calculation of a fixed amount for a dry voyage charter or time charter commodity swap.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamContractPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of LegPaymentStreamContractPrice(41559). Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStreamPricingBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexCurveUnit2
fielddef.descr: Specifies the secondary time unit associated with the payment stream's floating rate index curve.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexCurvePeriod2
fielddef.descr: Specifies the secondary time unit multiplier for the payment stream's floating rate index curve (May be used for a Forward Rate Agreement (FRA) with an average rate between two curve points).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexLocation
fielddef.descr: Specifies the location of the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexLevel
fielddef.descr: This is the weather Cooling Degree Days (CDD), Heating Degree Days (HDD) or HDD index level specified as the number of (amount of) weather index units specified by the parties in the related confirmation.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the rate index level.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamSettlLevel
fielddef.descr: Specifies how weather index units are to be calculated.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamReferenceLevel
fielddef.descr: This is the weather Cooling Degree Days (CDD), Heating Degree Days (HDD) or HDD reference level specified as the number of (amount of) weather index units specified by the parties in the related confirmation.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamReferenceLevelUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the rate reference level.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamReferenceLevelEqualsZeroIndicator
fielddef.descr: When set to 'Y', it indicates that the weather reference level equals zero.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateSpreadCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the floating rate spread. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateSpreadUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unit of measure (UOM) of the floating rate spread.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: The number to be multiplied by the derived floating rate of the leg's payment stream in order to arrive at the payment rate. If omitted, the floating rate conversion factor is 1.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateSpreadType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is an absolute value to be added to the index rate or a percentage of the index rate.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLastResetRate
fielddef.descr: The floating rate determined at the most recent reset. The rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalRate
fielddef.descr: The floating rate determined at the final reset. The rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCalculationLagPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the calculation lag duration.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCalculationLagUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the calculation lag duration.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity pricing day type.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingDayDistribution
fielddef.descr: The distribution of pricing days.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingDayCount
fielddef.descr: The number of days over which pricing should take place.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingBusinessCalendar
fielddef.descr: Specifies the business calendar to use for pricing. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-business-calendar for values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the pricing dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStreamPaymentDates
fielddef.descr: Number of payment dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed stream payment date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of payment date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamMasterAgreementPaymentDatesIndicator
fielddef.descr: When set to 'Y', it indicates that payment dates are specified in the relevant master agreement.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStreamPricingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of pricing dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadusted fixed stream pricing date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of pricing date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStreamPricingDays
fielddef.descr: Number of pricing days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingDayOfWeek
fielddef.descr: The day of the week on which pricing takes place..

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamPricingDayNumber
fielddef.descr: The occurrence of the day of week on which pricing takes place (For example, a pricing day of the 3rd Friday would be DayOfWk=5 DayNum=3).

fielddef.name: NoLegPhysicalSettlTerms
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPhysicalSettlTermXID
fielddef.descr: A named string value referenced by UnderlyingSettlTermXIDRef(41315).

fielddef.name: LegPhysicalSettlCurency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of physical settlement. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPhysicalSettlBusinessDays
fielddef.descr: The number of business days used in the determination of physical settlement. Its precise meaning is dependant on the context in which this is used (ISDA 2003 Term: Business Day).

fielddef.name: LegPhysicalSettlMaximumBusinessDays
fielddef.descr: A maximum number of business days. Its precise meaning is dependant on the context in which this element is used. Intended to be used to limit a particular ISDA fallback provision.

fielddef.name: NoLegPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligations
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of delivery obligation applicable for physical settlement. See http://www.fixptradingcommunity.org/codelists#Deliverable_Obligation_Types for code list for applicable deliverable obligation types.

fielddef.name: LegPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationValue
fielddef.descr: Physical settlement delivery obligation value appropriate to LegPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationType(41605). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Deliverable_Obligation_Types for code list for applicable deliverable obligation types.

fielddef.name: NoLegPricingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPricingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPricingDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted pricing or fixing date.

fielddef.name: LegPricingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Specifies the pricing or fixing date adjustment business day convention. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: LegPricingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted pricing or fixing date.

fielddef.name: LegPricingTime
fielddef.descr: Specifies the local market time of the pricing or fixing.

fielddef.name: LegPricingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Specifies the business center for determining the pricing or fixing time. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegProtectionTermEventNewsSources
fielddef.descr: Number of event sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventNewsSource
fielddef.descr: A newspaper or electronic news service that may publish relevant information used in the determination of whether or not a credit event has occurred.

fielddef.name: NoLegProtectionTerms
fielddef.descr: Number of protection terms in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermXID
fielddef.descr: A named string value referenced from UnderlyingLegProtectionTermXIDRef(41314).

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermNotional
fielddef.descr: The notional amount of protection coverage (ISDA 2003 Term: Floating Rate Payer Calculation Amount).

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of LegProtectionTermNotional(41618). Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermSellerNotifies
fielddef.descr: The notifying party is the party that notifies the other party when a credit event has occurred by means of a credit event notice. If more than one party is referenced as being the notifying party then either party may notify the other of a credit event occurring. LegProtectionTermSellerNotifies(41620)=Y indicates that the seller notifies (ISDA 2003 Term: Notifying Party).

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermBuyerNotifies
fielddef.descr: The notifying party is the party that notifies the other party when a credit event has occurred by means of a credit event notice. If more than one party is referenced as being the notifying party then either party may notify the other of a credit event occurring. LegProtectionTermBuyerNotifies(41621)=Y indicates that the buyer notifies (ISDA 2003 Term: Notifying Party).

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: When used, the business center indicates the local time of the business center that replaces the Greenwich Mean Time in Section 3.3 of the 2003 ISDA Credit Derivatives Definitions. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermStandardSources
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether ISDA defined Standard Public Sources are applicable (LegProtectionTermStandardSources(41623)=Y) or not.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventMinimumSources
fielddef.descr: The minimum number of the specified public information sources that must publish information that reasonably confirms that a credit event has occurred. The market convention is two (ISDA 2003 Term: Specified Number).

fielddef.name: NoLegProtectionTermEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of protection term events in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of credit event applicable to the protection terms. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Protection_Term_Event_Types for code list of applicable event types.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventValue
fielddef.descr: Specifies the protection term event value appropriate to LegProtectionTermEventType(41626). See http:///www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Protection_Term_Event_Types for applicable event type values.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventCurrency
fielddef.descr: Applicable currency if the event value is an amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the event.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the event.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventDayType
fielddef.descr: Day type for events that specify a period and unit.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventRateSource
fielddef.descr: Rate source for events that specify a rate source, e.g. floating rate interest shortfall.

fielddef.name: NoLegProtectionTermEventQualifiers
fielddef.descr: Number of qualifiers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermEventQualifier
fielddef.descr: Specifies the protection term event qualifier. Used to further qualify LegProtectionTermEventType(41626).

fielddef.name: NoLegProtectionTermObligations
fielddef.descr: Number of obligations in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermObligationType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of obligation applicable to the protection terms. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Protection_Term_Obligation_Types for code list of applicable obligation types.

fielddef.name: LegProtectionTermObligationValue
fielddef.descr: The value associated with the protection term obligation specified in LegProtectionTermObligationType(41636). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Protection_Term_Obligation_Types for applicable obligation type values.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamCalculationPeriodDates
fielddef.descr: Number of calculation period dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationPeriodDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed calculation period date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationPeriodDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of fixed calculation period date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationPeriodDatesXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this calculation period for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationPeriodDatesXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another calculation period for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationBalanceOfFirstPeriod
fielddef.descr: When specified and set to 'Y', it indicates that the first calculation period should run from the effective date to the end of the calendar period in which the effective date falls (e.g. Jan 15 - Jan 31 if the calculation periods are one month long and effective date is Jan 15.). If 'N' or not specified, it indicates that the first calculation period should run from the effective date for one whole period (e.g. Jan 15 to Feb 14 if the calculation periods are one month long and the effective date is Jan 15.).

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationCorrectionPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the length of time after the publication of the data when corrections can be made.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCalculationCorrectionUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the length of time after the publication of the data when corrections can be made.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamCommoditySettlBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityBase
fielddef.descr: Specifies the general base type of the commodity traded. Where possible, this should follow the naming convention used in the 2005 ISDA Commodity Definitions. Examples of general commodity base types include: Metal, Bullion, Oil, Natural Gas, Coal, Electricity, Inter-Energy, Grains, Oils Seeds, Dairy, Livestock, Forestry, Softs, Weather, Emissions.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of commodity product. For coal see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-coal-product-type for values. For metals see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-metal-product-type for values. For bullion see http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Bullion_Types for the external code list of bullion types.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySecurityID
fielddef.descr: Specifies the market identifier for the commodity.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySecurityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of the LegStreamCommoditySecurityIDSource(41650) value.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the commodity asset.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegStreamCommodityDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegStreamCommodityDesc(41654) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegStreamCommodityDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegStreamCommodityDesc(41652) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegStreamCommodityDesc(41652) field.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the commodity asset.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityCurrency
fielddef.descr: Identifies the currency of the commodity asset. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityExchange
fielddef.descr: Identifies the exchange where the commodity is traded.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information used for commodities. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Commodity_Rate_Source for code list of applicable sources.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityRateReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityRatePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: LegStreamDataProvider
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity data or information provider. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-information-provider for values.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityPricingType
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the pricing or rate setting of the trade is to be determined or based upon. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Commodity_Rate_Pricing_Type for code list of applicable commodity pricing types.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityNearbySettlDayPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the nearby settlement day (When the commodity transaction references a futures contract, the delivery or settlement dates are a nearby month or week. For example, for eighth nearby month use Period=8 and Unit=Mo).

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityNearbySettlDayUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the nearby settlement day.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted commodity delivery date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the commodity delivery date. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted commodity delivery date.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlMonth
fielddef.descr: Specifies a fixed single month for commodity delivery.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlDateRollPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the commodity delivery date roll (For a commodity transaction that references a listed future via the delivery dates, this is the day offset on which the specified future will roll to the next nearby month when the referenced future expires).

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlDateRollUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the commodity delivery date roll.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity delivery roll day type.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this stream commodity for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to a stream commodity elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamCommodityAltIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of alternate security identifers.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityAltID
fielddef.descr: Alternate security identifier value for the commodity.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityAltIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of the alternate commodity security identifier.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamCommodityDataSources
fielddef.descr: Number of data sources in the repeating group. The order of entry determines priority - first is the main source, second is fallback, third is second fallback.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityDataSourceID
fielddef.descr: Specifies the data source identifier.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommodityDataSourceIDType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of data source identifier.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamCommoditySettlDays
fielddef.descr: Number of days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlDay
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day or group of days for delivery.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlTotalHours
fielddef.descr: Sum of the hours specified in LegStreamCommoditySettlTimeGrp.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamCommoditySettlTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of hour ranges in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlStart
fielddef.descr: Specifies the start time for commodity settlement where delivery occurs over time. The time format is specified by the settlement time type.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlEnd
fielddef.descr: Specifies the end time for commodity settlement where delivery occurs over time. The time format is specified by the settlement time type.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the format of the commodity settlement start and end times.

fielddef.name: NoLegStreamCommoditySettlPeriods
fielddef.descr: Number of commodity settlement periods in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlCountry
fielddef.descr: Specifies the country where delivery takes place. Uses ISO 3166 2-character country code.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlTimeZone
fielddef.descr: Commodity delivery timezone specified as "prevailing" rather than "standard" or "daylight". See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Prevailing_Timezones for code list of applicable prevailing timezones.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlFlowType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity delivery flow type.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodNotional
fielddef.descr: Delivery quantity associated with this settlement period.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unit of measure (UOM) of the delivery quantity associated with this settlement period.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the settlement period frequency.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the settlement period frequency.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodPrice
fielddef.descr: The settlement period price.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodPriceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The settlement period price unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the settlement period price. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlHolidaysProcessingInstruction
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether holidays are included in the settlement periods. Required for electricity contracts.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this settlement period for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegStreamCommoditySettlPeriodXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another settlement period for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: LegStreamXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this LegStream for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: LegStreamNotionalXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another LegStream notional for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: LegStreamNotionalFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the swap stream's notional frequency.

fielddef.name: LegStreamNotionalFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the swap stream's notional frequency.

fielddef.name: LegStreamNotionalCommodityFrequency
fielddef.descr: The commodity's notional or quantity delivery frequency.

fielddef.name: LegStreamNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery quantity unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: LegStreamTotalNotional
fielddef.descr: Specifies the total notional or delivery quantity over the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: LegStreamTotalNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unit of measure (UOM) for the total notional or delivery quantity over the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingAssetAttributes
fielddef.descr: Number of asset attribute entries in the group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAssetAttributeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the name of the attribute. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Asset_Attribute_Types for code list of applicable asset attribute types.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAssetAttributeValue
fielddef.descr: Specifies the value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAssetAttributeLimit
fielddef.descr: Limit or lower acceptable value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventAveragingObservations
fielddef.descr: The number of averaging observations in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventAveragingObservationNumber
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to the ordinal observation as specified either in the UnderlyingComplexEventScheduleGrp or UnderlyingComplexEventPeriodDateGrp components.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventAveragingWeight
fielddef.descr: The weight factor to be applied to the observation.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventCreditEvents
fielddef.descr: The number of credit events specified in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of credit event. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Types for code list of applicable event types.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventValue
fielddef.descr: The credit event value appropriate to UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventType(41717). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Types for applicable event type values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the applicable currency when UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventValue(41718) is an amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for complex credit events.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with complex credit events.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type for the credit events that specify a period and unit.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information used for credit events. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Credit_Event_Rate_Source for code list of applicable sources.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventQualifiers
fielddef.descr: Number of qualifiers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventQualifier
fielddef.descr: Specifies a complex event qualifier. Used to further qualify UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventType(41717).

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventPeriodDateTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the date-time repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventPeriodDate
fielddef.descr: Averaging date for an Asian option. Trigger date for a Barrier or Knock option.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventPeriodTime
fielddef.descr: Averaging time for an Asian option.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventPeriods
fielddef.descr: Number of periods in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventPeriodType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the period type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center for adjusting dates and times in the schedule or date-time group. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventRateSources
fielddef.descr: Number of rate sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventRateSourceType
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the rate source specified is a primary or secondary source.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference page from the rate source. For FX, the reference page to the spot rate is to be used for the reference FX spot rate. When UnderlyingComplexEventRateSource(41733) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEvenReferencePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted complex event date (For example, the second expiration date for a calendar spread option strategy).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the complex event date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative date offset

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of day for the complex event.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Date adjustment business day convention. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted complex event date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventFixingTime
fielddef.descr: Local market time of fixing.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventFixingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center for determining the actual fixing times. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventSources
fielddef.descr: Number of event sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventSource
fielddef.descr: A newspaper or electronic news service that may publish relevant information used in the determination of whether or not a credit event has occurred.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexOptPayoutPaySide
fielddef.descr: Trade side of payout payer.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexOptPayoutReceiveSide
fielddef.descr: Trade side of payout receiver.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexOptPayoutUnderlier
fielddef.descr: Reference to the underlier whose payments are being passed through.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexOptPayoutPercentage
fielddef.descr: Percentage of observed price for calculating the payout associated with the event.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexOptPayoutTime
fielddef.descr: Specifies when the payout is to occur.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexOptPayoutCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the payout amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventPricePercentage
fielddef.descr: Specifies the price percentage at which the complex event takes effect. Impact of the event price is determined by the UnderlyingComplexEventType(2046).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCurrencyOne
fielddef.descr: Specifies the first or only reference currency of the trade. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCurrencyTwo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the second reference currency of the trade. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventQuoteBasis
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency pairing for the quote.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventFixedFXRate
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fixed FX rate alternative for FX Quantro options.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method according to which an amount or a date is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCalculationAgent
fielddef.descr: Used to identify the calculation agent.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: Upper strike price for Asian option feature. Strike percentage for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventStrikeFactor
fielddef.descr: Strike factor for Asian option feature. Upper strike percentage for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventStrikeNumberOfOptions
fielddef.descr: Upper string number of options for a Strike Spread.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventsXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to credit event table elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventNotifyingParty
fielddef.descr: The notifying party is the party that notifies the other party when a credit event has occurred by means of a credit event notice. If more than one party is referenced as being the notifying party then either party may notify the other of a credit event occurring.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Specifies the local business center for which the credit event is to be determined. The inclusion of this business center implies that Greenwich Mean Time in Section 3.3 of the 2003 ISDA Credit Derivatives Definitions is replaced by the local time of the specified business center. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventStandardSources
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', indicates that ISDA defined Standard Public Sources are applicable.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventCreditEventMinimumSources
fielddef.descr: The minimum number of the specified public information sources that must publish information that reasonably confirms that a credit event has occurred. The market convention is two.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this complex event for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to a complex event elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingComplexEventSchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventScheduleStartDate
fielddef.descr: Start date of the schedule.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventScheduleEndDate
fielddef.descr: End date of the schedule.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventScheduleFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the schedule date frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventScheduleFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the schedule date frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventScheduleRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. This should only be used to override the roll convention defined in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component in UnderlyingInstrument.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDeliverySchedules
fielddef.descr: Number of delivery schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of delivery schedule.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier for this instance of delivery schedule for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleNotional
fielddef.descr: Physical delivery quantity.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery quantity unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleNotionalCommodityFrequency
fielddef.descr: The frequency of notional delivery.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the negative tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleToleranceType(41765). Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliverySchedulePositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the positive tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleToleranceType(41765). Value may exceed agreed upon value. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleToleranceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value's unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleToleranceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlCountry
fielddef.descr: Specifies the country where delivery takes place. Uses ISO 3166 2-character country code.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeZone
fielddef.descr: Delivery timezone specified as "prevailing" rather than "standard" or "daylight". See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Prevailing_Timezones for code list of applicable prevailing timezones.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlFlowType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery flow type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlHolidaysProcessingInstruction
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether holidays are included in the settlement periods. Required for electricity contracts.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlDays
fielddef.descr: Number of delivery schedules in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlDay
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day or group of days for delivery.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlTotalHours
fielddef.descr: The sum of the total hours specified in the UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeGrp component.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of hour ranges in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlStart
fielddef.descr: Specifies the scheduled start time for the delivery of the commodity where delivery occurs over specified times. The format of the time value is specified in UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType(41776).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlEnd
fielddef.descr: Specifies the scheduled end time for the delivery of the commodity where delivery occurs over specified times. The format of the time value is specified in UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType(41776).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryScheduleSettlTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the format of the delivery start and end time values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of delivery stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamPipeline
fielddef.descr: The name of the oil delivery pipeline.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamEntryPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity will enter the delivery mechanism or pipeline.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamWithdrawalPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity product will be withdrawn prior to delivery.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint
fielddef.descr: The point at which the commodity product will be delivered and received. Value specified should follow market convention appropriate for the commodity product. For bullion see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/bullion-delivery-location for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamDeliveryRestriction
fielddef.descr: Specifies under what conditions the buyer and seller should be excused of their delivery obligations.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamDeliveryContingency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the electricity delivery contingency. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/electricity-transmission-contingency for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamDeliveryContingentPartySide
fielddef.descr: The trade side value of the party responsible for electricity delivery contingency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamDeliverAtSourceIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', delivery of the coal product is to be at its source.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamRiskApportionment
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the parties to the trade apportion responsibility for the delivery of the commodity product. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Risk_Apportionment for the details of the external code list.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamRiskApportionmentSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the source or legal framework for the risk apportionment. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Risk_Apportionment_Source for the details of the external code list.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamTitleTransferLocation
fielddef.descr: Specifies the title transfer location.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamTitleTransferCondition
fielddef.descr: Specifies the title transfer condition.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamImporterOfRecord
fielddef.descr: A party, not necessarily of the trade, who is the Importer of Record for the purposes of paying customs duties and applicable taxes or costs related to importation.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the negative tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in UnderlyingDeliveryStreamToleranceType(41793). Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamPositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: Specifies the positive tolerance value. The value may be an absolute quantity or a percentage, as specified in UnderlyingDeliveryStreamToleranceType(41793). Value may exceed agreed upon value. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamToleranceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value's unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamToleranceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the tolerance value type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamToleranceOptionSide
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the tolerance is at the seller's or buyer's option.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamTotalPositiveTolerance
fielddef.descr: The positive percent tolerance which applies to the total quantity delivered over all shipment periods. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%.).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamTotalNegativeTolerance
fielddef.descr: The negative percent tolerance which applies to the total quantity delivered over all shipment periods. Percentage value is to be expressed relative to "1.0" representing 100% (e.g. a value of "0.0575" represents 5.75%.).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamNotionalConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: If the notional quantity is specified in a unit that does not match the unit in which the commodity reference price is quoted, the scaling or conversion factor used to convert the commodity reference price unit into the notional quantity unit should be stated here. If there is no conversion, this field is not intended to be used.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamTransportEquipment
fielddef.descr: The transportation equipment with which the commodity product will be delivered and received (Examples of transportation equipment or mode are barge, truck, railcar, etc.).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamElectingPartySide
fielddef.descr: A reference to the party able to choose whether the gas is delivered for a particular period e.g. a swing or interruptible contract.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreamAssetAttributes
fielddef.descr: Number of asset attribute entries in the group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamAssetAttributeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the name of the attribute. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Asset_Attribute_Types for code list of applicable asset attribute types.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamAssetAttributeValue
fielddef.descr: Specifies the value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamAssetAttributeLimit
fielddef.descr: The limit or lower acceptable value of the attribute.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDeliveryStreamCycles
fielddef.descr: Number of delivery cycles in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamCycleDesc
fielddef.descr: The delivery cycles during which the oil product will be transported in the pipeline.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingDeliveryStreamCycleDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingDeliveryStreamCycleDesc(41807) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingDeliveryStreamCycleDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingDeliveryStreamCycleDesc(41805) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingDeliveryStreamCycleDesc(41805) field.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDeliveryStreamCommoditySources
fielddef.descr: Number of commodity sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamCommoditySource
fielddef.descr: The SCoTA coal cargo origin, mining region, mine(s), mining complex(es), loadout(s) or river dock(s) or other point(s) of origin that seller and buyer agree are acceptable origins for the coal product. For international coal transactions, this is the origin of the coal product. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-coal-product-source for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExerciseDesc
fielddef.descr: A description of the option exercise.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingExerciseDescLen
