fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingExerciseDesc(41812) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingExerciseDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingExerciseDesc(41810) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingExerciseDesc(41810) field.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAutomaticExerciseIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates (when 'Y') that exercise is automatic when the strike price is crossed or the underlying trade is in the money.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAutomaticExerciseThresholdRate
fielddef.descr: The threshold rate for triggering automatic exercise.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExerciseConfirmationMethod
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether follow-up confirmation of exercise (written or electronic) is required following telephonic notice by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingManualNoticeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center used for adjusting the time for manual exercise notice. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingFallbackExerciseIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the notional amount of the underlying swap, not previously exercised under the option, will be automatically exercised at the expiration time on the expiration date if at such time the buyer is in-the-money, provided that the difference between the settlement rate and the fixed rate under the relevant underlying swap is not less than one tenth of a percentage point (0.10% or 0.001).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingLimitedRightToConfirmIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the Seller may request the Buyer to confirm its intent to exercise if not done on or before the expiration time on the Expiration date. If true ("Y") specific rules will apply in relation to the settlement mode.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExerciseSplitTicketIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates in physical settlement of bond and convertible bond options whether the party required to deliver the bonds will divide those to be delivered as notifying party desires to facilitate delivery obligations.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingOptionExerciseBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the option exercise dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component in UnderlyingInstrument.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseEarliestDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative earliest exercise date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseEarliestDatePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative exercise date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseEarliestDateUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative exercise earliest date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of exercise dates.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of exercise dates.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted start date for calculating periodic exercise dates.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option exercise start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Adjusted start date for calculating periodic exercise dates.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseSkip
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the referenced date schedule that are between each date in the relative date schedule. Thus a skip of 2 would mean that dates are relative to every second date in the referenced schedule. If present this should have a value greater than 1.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseNominationDeadline
fielddef.descr: Last date (adjusted) for establishing the option exercise terms.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseFirstDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted first exercise date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseLastDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Unadjusted last exercise date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseEarliestTime
fielddef.descr: The earliest time at which notice of exercise can be given by the buyer to the seller (or seller's agent) (i) on the expriation date, in the case of a European style option, (ii) on each Bermuda option exercise date and the expiration date, in the case of a Bermuda style option, (iii) the commencement date to, and including, the expiration date, in the case of an American option.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseLatestTime
fielddef.descr: Latest exercise time. See also UnderlyingOptionExerciseEarliestTime(41838).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center used to determine the locale for option exercise time, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingOptionExerciseDates
fielddef.descr: Number of dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted option exercise fixed date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of option exercise date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the option exercise expiration dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component in UnderlyingInstrument.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option exercise expiration date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of exercise expiration dates.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of exercise expiration dates.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of exercise expiration dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency. This should only be used to override the roll convention defined in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component in UnderlyingInstrument.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative option exercise expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationTime
fielddef.descr: The option exercise expiration time.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center used to determine the locale for option exercise expiration time, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDates
fielddef.descr: Number of fixed exercise expiration dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted option exercise expiration fixed date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExerciseExpirationDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of option exercise expiration date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlRateIndex
fielddef.descr: In an outright or forward commodity trade that is cash settled this is the index used to determine the cash payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlRateIndexLocation
fielddef.descr: This is an optional qualifying attribute of UnderlyingSettlementRateIndex(2284) such as the delivery zone for an electricity contract.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionExpirationDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the option expiration.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingOptionExpirationDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingOptionExpirationDesc(2288) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingOptionExpirationDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingOptionExpirationDesc(2286) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingOptionExpirationDesc(2286).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSwapSubClass
fielddef.descr: The sub-classification or notional schedule type of the swap.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStrikeUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Used to express the unit of measure (UOM) of the price if different from the contract.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStrikeIndex
fielddef.descr: Specifies the index used to calculate the strike price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStrikeIndexSpread
fielddef.descr: Specifies the strike price offset from the named index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingValuationSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the source of trade valuation data.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingValuationReferenceModel
fielddef.descr: Specifies the methodology and/or assumptions used to generate the trade value.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStrategyType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of trade strategy.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCommonPricingIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', it indicates that common pricing applies. Common pricing may be relevant for a transaction that references more than one commodity reference price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlDisruptionProvision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the consequences of settlement disruption events.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingInstrumentRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction if not overridden elsewhere.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingInstrumentRoundingPrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionProvision
fielddef.descr: The consequences of market disruption events.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackProvision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the location of the fallback provision documentation.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionMaximumDays
fielddef.descr: Specifies the maximum number of market disruption days (commodity or bullion business days) in a contract or confirmation. If none are specified, the maximum number of market disruption days is five (5) (ISDA 2005 Commodity Definition2).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionMaterialityPercentage
fielddef.descr: Used when a price materiality percentage applies to the price source disruption event and this event has been specified (Applicable to 2005 Commodity Definitions only).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionMinimumFuturesContracts
fielddef.descr: Specifies the minimum futures contracts level that dictates whether or not a 'De Minimis Trading' event has occurred (Applicable to 1993 Commodity Definitions only).

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingMarketDisruptionEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of disruption events in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionEvent
fielddef.descr: Specifies the market disruption event. For commodities see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-market-disruption for values. For foreign exchange, http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Market_Disruption_Event see for code list of applicable event types.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbacks
fielddef.descr: Number of fallbacks in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of disruption fallback. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-market-disruption-fallback for values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackReferencePrices
fielddef.descr: Number of fallback reference securities in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierType
fielddef.descr: The type of reference price underlier.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityID
fielddef.descr: Specifies the identifier value of the security.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Specifies the class or source scheme of the security identifier.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc
fielddef.descr: Specifies the description of underlying security.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc(41874) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc(41872) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackUnderlierSecurityDesc(41872).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackOpenUnits
fielddef.descr: If there are multiple underlying assets, this specifies the number of units (index or securities) that constitute the underlier of the swap. In the case of a basket swap, this is used to reference both the number of basket units, and the number of each asset components of the basket when these are expressed in absolute terms.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackBasketCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency if the underlier is a basket. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackBasketDivisor
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basket divisor amount. This value is normally used to adjust the constituent weight for pricing or to adjust for dividends, or other corporate actions.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDays
fielddef.descr: Number of fixing days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDayOfWeek
fielddef.descr: The day of the week on which fixing takes place.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDayNumber
fielddef.descr: The occurrence of the day of week on which fixing takes place.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this UnderlyingPaymentSchedule for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to payment schedule elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the schedule rate. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The schedule rate unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: The number to be multiplied by the derived floating rate of the underlying's payment schedule in order to arrive at the payment rate. If ommitted, the schedule rate conversion factor is 1.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleRateSpreadType
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the rate spread is an absolute value to be added to the index rate or a percentage of the index rate.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPrice
fielddef.descr: The schedule settlement period price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the schedule settlement period price. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleSettlPeriodPriceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The settlement period price unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleStepUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The schedule step unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDayDistribution
fielddef.descr: The distribution of fixing days.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingDayCount
fielddef.descr: The number of days over which fixing should take place.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingLagPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the fixing lag duration.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingLagUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the fixing lag duration.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFlatRateIndicator
fielddef.descr: When this element is specified and set to 'Y', the Flat Rate is the New Worldwide Tanker Nominal Freight Scale for the Freight Index Route taken at the Trade Date of the transaction "Fixed". If 'N' it is taken on each Pricing Date "Floating".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFlatRateAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the actual monetary value of the flat rate when UnderlyingPaymentStreamFlatRateIndicator(41897) = 'Y'.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFlatRateCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the actual flat rate. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamMaximumPaymentAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the limit on the total payment amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamMaximumPaymentCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of total payment amount limit. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamMaximumTransactionAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the limit on the payment amount that goes out in any particular calculation period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamMaximumTransactionCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the period payment amount limit. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixedAmountUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Fixed payment amount unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamTotalFixedAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the total fixed payment amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamWorldScaleRate
fielddef.descr: The number of Worldscale points for purposes of the calculation of a fixed amount for a wet voyage charter commodity swap.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamContractPrice
fielddef.descr: The price per relevant unit for purposes of the calculation of a fixed amount for a dry voyage charter or time charter commodity swap.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamContractPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of UnderlyingPaymentStreamContractPrice(41907). Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexCurveUnit2
fielddef.descr: Specifies the secondary time unit associated with the payment stream's floating rate index curve.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexCurvePeriod2
fielddef.descr: Specifies the secondary time unit multiplier for the payment stream's floating rate index curve (May be used for a Forward Rate Agreement (FRA) with an average rate between two curve points).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexLocation
fielddef.descr: Specifies the location of the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexLevel
fielddef.descr: This is the weather Cooling Degree Days (CDD), Heating Degree Days (HDD) or HDD index level specified as the number of (amount of) weather index units specified by the parties in the related confirmation.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the rate index level.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamSettlLevel
fielddef.descr: Specifies how weather index units are to be calculated.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamReferenceLevel
fielddef.descr: This is the weather Cooling Degree Days (CDD), Heating Degree Days (HDD) or HDD reference level specified as the number of (amount of) weather index units specified by the parties in the related confirmation.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamReferenceLevelUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the rate reference level.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamReferenceLevelEqualsZeroIndicator
fielddef.descr: When set to 'Y', it indicates that the weather reference level equals zero.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateSpreadCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the floating rate spread. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateSpreadUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unit of measure (UOM) of the floating rate spread.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateConversionFactor
fielddef.descr: The number to be multiplied by the derived floating rate of the underlying's payment stream in order to arrive at the payment rate. If omitted, the floating rate conversion factor is 1.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateSpreadType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is an absolute value to be added to the index rate or a percentage of the index rate.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLastResetRate
fielddef.descr: The floating rate determined at the most recent reset. The rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalRate
fielddef.descr: The floating rate determined at the final reset. The rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as 0.05.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCalculationLagPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the calculation lag duration.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCalculationLagUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the calculation lag duration.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative first observation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity pricing day type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDayDistribution
fielddef.descr: The distribution of pricing days.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDayCount
fielddef.descr: The number of days over which pricing should take place.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingBusinessCalendar
fielddef.descr: Specifies the business calendar to use for pricing. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-business-calendar for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the pricing dates. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component in UnderlyingInstrument.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDates
fielddef.descr: Number of payment dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed stream payment date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPaymentDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of payment date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamMasterAgreementPaymentDatesIndicator
fielddef.descr: When set to 'Y', it indicates that payment dates are specified in the relevant master agreement.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of pricing dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed pricing date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of pricing date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDays
fielddef.descr: Number of pricing days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDayOfWeek
fielddef.descr: The day of the week on which pricing takes place.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamPricingDayNumber
fielddef.descr: The occurrence of the day of week on which pricing takes place.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPricingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPricingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPricingDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted pricing or fixing date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPricingDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Specifies the pricing or fixing date adjustment business day convention. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component in UnderlyingInstrument.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPricingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted pricing or fixing date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPricingTime
fielddef.descr: Specifies the local market time of the pricing or fixing.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPricingTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Specifies the business center for determining the pricing or fixing time. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreamCalculationPeriodDates
fielddef.descr: Number of calculation period dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationPeriodDate
fielddef.descr: An adjusted or unadjusted fixed calculation period date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationPeriodDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of fixed calculation period date. When specified it applies not only to the current date but to all subsequent dates in the group until overridden with a new type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationPeriodDatesXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this calculation period for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationPeriodDatesXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another calculation period for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationBalanceOfFirstPeriod
fielddef.descr: When specified and set to 'Y', it indicates that the first calculation period should run from the effective date to the end of the calendar period in which the effective date falls (e.g. Jan 15 - Jan 31 if the calculation periods are one month long and effective date is Jan 15.). If 'N' or not specified, it indicates that the first calculation period should run from the effective date for one whole period (e.g. Jan 15 to Feb 14 if the calculation periods are one month long and the effective date is Jan 15.).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationCorrectionPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time unit multiplier for the length of time after the publication of the data when corrections can be made.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCalculationCorrectionUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the length of time after the publication of the data when corrections can be made.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: A business center whose calendar is used to for date adjustment, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityBase
fielddef.descr: Specifies the general base type of the commodity traded. Where possible, this should follow the naming convention used in the 2005 ISDA Commodity Definitions. eExamples of general commodity base types include: Metal, Bullion, Oil, Natural Gas, Coal, Electricity, Inter-Energy, Grains, Oils Seeds, Dairy, Livestock, Forestry, Softs, Weather, Emissions.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of commodity product. For coal see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-coal-product-type for values. For metals see http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-metal-product-type for values. For bullion see http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Bullion_Types for the external code list of bullion types.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySecurityID
fielddef.descr: Specifies the market identifier for the commodity.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySecurityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of the UnderlyingStreamCommoditySecurityIDSource(41966) value.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the commodity asset.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingStreamCommodityDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingStreamCommodityDesc(41970) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingStreamCommodityDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingStreamCommodityDesc(41968) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingStreamCommodityDesc(41968) field.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The unit of measure (UOM) of the commodity asset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityCurrency
fielddef.descr: Identifies the currency of the commodity asset. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityExchange
fielddef.descr: Identifies the exchange where the commodity is traded.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityRateSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information used for commodities. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Commodity_Rate_Source for code list of applicable sources.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityRateReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityRatePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamDataProvider
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity data or information provider. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/commodity-information-provider for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityPricingType
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the pricing or rate setting of the trade is to be determined or based upon. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Commodity_Rate_Pricing_Type for code list of applicable commodity pricing types.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityNearbySettlDayPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the nearby settlement day (When the commodity transaction references a futures contract, the delivery or settlement dates are a nearby month or week. For example, for eighth nearby month use Period=8 and Unit=Mo).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityNearbySettlDayUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the nearby settlement day.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unadjusted commodity delivery date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the commodity delivery date. This should only be used to override the business day convention defined in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component in UnderlyingInstrument.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: Specifies the adjusted commodity delivery date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlMonth
fielddef.descr: Specifies a fixed single month for commodity delivery (Use 1 for January, 2 for February, etc.).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlDateRollPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the commodity delivery date roll (For a commodity transaction that references a listed future via the delivery dates, this is the day offset on which the specified future will roll to the next nearby month when the referenced future expires).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlDateRollUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the commodity delivery date roll.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity delivery roll day type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this stream commodity for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to a stream commodity elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreamCommodityAltIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of alternate security identifers.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityAltID
fielddef.descr: Alternate security identifier value for the commodity.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityAltIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of the alternate commodity security identifier.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreamCommodityDataSources
fielddef.descr: Number of commodity data sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityDataSourceID
fielddef.descr: Data source identifier.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommodityDataSourceIDType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of data source identifier.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlDays
fielddef.descr: Number of days in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlDay
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day or group of days for delivery.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlTotalHours
fielddef.descr: Sum of the hours specified in UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlTimeGrp.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlTimes
fielddef.descr: Number of hour ranges in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlStart
fielddef.descr: Specifies the start time for commodity settlement where delivery occurs over time. The time format is specified by the settlement time type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlEnd
fielddef.descr: Specifies the end time for commodity settlement where delivery occurs over time. The time format is specified by the settlement time type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the format of the commodity settlement start and end times.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriods
fielddef.descr: Number of commodity settlement periods in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlCountry
fielddef.descr: Specifies the country where delivery takes place. Uses ISO 3166 2-character country code.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlTimeZone
fielddef.descr: Commodity delivery timezone specified as "prevailing" rather than "standard" or "daylight". See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Prevailing_Timezones for code list of applicable prevailing timezones.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlFlowType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the commodity delivery flow type.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodNotional
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery quantity associated with this settlement period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unit of measure (UOM) of the delivery quantity associated with this settlement period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the settlement period frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the settlement period frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodPrice
fielddef.descr: The settlement period price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodPriceUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the settlement period price unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodPriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of the settlement period price. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlHolidaysProcessingInstruction
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether holidays are included in the settlement periods. Required for electricity contracts.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this settlement period for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamCommoditySettlPeriodXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another settlement period for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of this UnderlyingStream for cross referencing elsewhere in the message.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamNotionalXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another UnderlyingStream notional for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamNotionalFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the swap stream's notional frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamNotionalFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the swap stream's notional frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamNotionalCommodityFrequency
fielddef.descr: The commodity's notional or quantity delivery frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the delivery quantity unit of measure (UOM).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTotalNotional
fielddef.descr: Specifies the total notional or delivery quantity over the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamTotalNotionalUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: Specifies the unit of measure (UOM) for the total notional or delivery quantity over the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: AllocGrossTradeAmt
fielddef.descr: Total amount traded for this account (i.e. quantity * price) expressed in units of currency

fielddef.name: RiskLimitReportStatus
fielddef.descr: Status of risk limit report.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitReportRejectReason
fielddef.descr: The reason for rejecting the Party Risk Limits Report (35=CM) or Party Risk Limits Update Report (35=CR).

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckRequestID
fielddef.descr: The unique identifier of the Party Risk Limit Check Request (35=DF) message.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckID
fielddef.descr: The unique and static identifier, at the business entity level, of a risk limit check request.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckTransType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the transaction type of the risk limit check request.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of limit check message.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckRequestRefID
fielddef.descr: Specifies the message reference identifier of the risk limit check request message.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckRequestType
fielddef.item: All or none (default if not specified).
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of limit amount check being requested.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the amount being requested for approval.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckRequestStatus
fielddef.descr: Indicates the status of the risk limit check request.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckRequestResult
fielddef.item: Requested amount exceeds clip size limit
Request exceeds maximum notional order amount
fielddef.descr: Result of the credit limit check request.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitApprovedAmount
fielddef.descr: The credit/risk limit amount approved.

fielddef.name: PartyActionRequestID
fielddef.descr: The unique identifier of the Party Action Request (35=DH) message.

fielddef.name: PartyActionType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of action to take or was taken for a given party.

fielddef.name: ApplTestMessageIndicator
fielddef.descr: Used to indicate whether the message being sent is to test the receiving application's availability to process the message. When set to "Y" the message is a test message. If not specified, the message is by default not a test message.

fielddef.name: PartyActionReportID
fielddef.descr: The unique identifier of the Party Action Report (35=DI) message as assigned by the message sender.

fielddef.name: PartyActionResponse
fielddef.descr: Specifies the action taken as a result of the PartyActionType(2239) of the Party Action Request (35=DH) message.

fielddef.name: PartyActionRejectReason
fielddef.descr: Specifies the reason the Party Action Request (35=DH) was rejected.

fielddef.name: RefRiskLimitCheckID
fielddef.descr: The reference identifier of the PartyRiskLimitCheckRequest(35=DF) message, or a similar out of band message, that contained the approval for the risk/credit limit check request.

fielddef.name: RefRiskLimitCheckIDType
fielddef.descr: Specifies which type of identifier is specified in RefRiskLimitCheckID(2334) field.

fielddef.name: RiskLimitVelocityPeriod
fielddef.descr: The time interval for which the clip size limit applies. The velocity time unit is expressed in RiskLimitVelocityUnit(2337).

fielddef.name: RiskLimitVelocityUnit
fielddef.descr: Unit of time in which RiskLimitVelocityPeriod(2336) is expressed.

fielddef.name: RequestingPartyRoleQualifier
fielddef.descr: Qualifies the value of RequestingPartyRole(1660).

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckModelType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of credit limit check model workflow to apply for the specified party.

valblockdef.name: RiskLimitCheckStatus
valblockdef.item: Accepted by credit hub (Indicates that a credit hub accepted the trade. An ID identifier assigned by the credit hub may appear in the appropriate RefRiskLimitCheckID(2334) field.)
Rejected by credit hub (Indicates that a credit hub rejected the trade.)
Pending credit hub check (Indicates that a check is pending at a credit hub.)
Accepted by execution venue (Indicates acceptance by an execution venue, such as a SEF.)
Rejected by execution venue (Indicates that the trade was rejected by an execution venue, such as a SEF.)

fielddef.name: RiskLimitCheckStatus
fielddef.descr: Indicates the status of the risk limit check performed on a trade

fielddef.name: SideRiskLimitCheckStatus
fielddef.descr: Indicates the status of the risk limit check performed on the side of a trade

descr.p: Number of entitlement types
Leg Mid price/rate

fielddef.name: RegulatoryTransactionType
fielddef.item: None (Default if not specified) (Elaboration: The transaction does not fall under any special regulatory rule or mandate.)

Swap Execution Facility (SEF) Required Transaction (Elaboration: The transaction is a Required transaction under DoddFrank Act SEF Rules. Required transactions are subject to the trade execution mandate under section 2(h)(8) of the CEA and are not block trades)

Swap Execution Facility (SEF) Permitted Transaction (Elaboration: The transaction is a Permitted transaction under Dodd-Frank Act SEF Rules. Permitted transactions are not subject to the clearing and trade execution mandates, illiquid or bespoke swaps, or block trades)

descr.p: Specifies the regulatory mandate or rule that the transaction complies with
Identifier of the collateral portfolio when reporting on a portfolio basis.
Indicates the number of contract periods associated with the minimum trading unit for a given contract duration resulting in the number of total traded contracts.
Indicates the number of contract periods associated with the minimum trading unit for a given contract duration resulting in the number of total traded contracts.
Expresses the total quantity traded over the life of the contract when LegLastQty(1418) is to be repeated periodically over the term of the contract.
Expresses the quantity bought/sold when LastQty is expressed in contracts.
Expresses the full total monetary value of the traded contract.
Expresses the total trade quantity in units where LegContractMultiplier(614) is not 1.
Indicates the number of contract periods associated with the minimum trading unit for a given contract duration resulting in the number of total traded contracts.
Indicates action that triggered the Position Report.
FX forward points added to SettlPrice(730). The value is expressed in decimal form and may be negative.
Specifies whether LastPx(31) [TradeCaptureReport] or SettlPrice(730) [PositionReport] should be multiplied or divided
Expresses the total quantity traded over the life of the contract when LastQty(32) is repeated periodically over the term of the contract.
Expresses the quantity bought or sold when LastQty(32) is expressed in number of contracts. Used in addition to LastQty(32).
Expresses the full total monetary value of the traded contract.
Expresses the total trade quantity in units where ContractMultiplier(231) is not 1.

Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the TradeContinuationText(2374) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the TradeContinuationText(2374) field
Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedTradeContinuationText(2371) field.

fielddef.name: IntraFirmTradeIndicator
fielddef.item: Trade or position is not an intra-firm transaction
Trade or position is an intra-firm transaction

descr.p: Indicates whether the trade or position was entered into as an intra-group transaction, i.e. between two units of the same parent entity having majority ownership interest in both counterparties.

fielddef.name: TradeContinuationText
fielddef.descr: Free form text to specify additional trade continuation information or data.

fielddef.name: TaxonomyType
fielddef.item: ISIN or Alternate instrument identifier plus CFI

descr.p: The type of identification taxonomy used to identify the security.
Used to further qualify the value of PartyRole(452).
Used to further qualify the value of DerivativeInstrumentPartyRole(1295)
Used to further qualify the value of InstrumentPartyRole(1051).
Used to further qualify the value of LegInstrumentPartyRole(2257).
Used to further qualify the value of LegProvisionPartyRole(40536)
Used to further qualify the value of Nested2PartyRole(759).
Used to further qualify the value of Nested3PartyRole(951).
Used to further qualify the value of Nested4PartyRole(1417).
Used to further qualify the value of NestedPartyRole(538).
Used to further qualify the value of ProvisionPartyRole(40177).
Used to further qualify the value of RequestedPartyRole(1509).
Used to further qualify the value of RootPartyRole(1119).
Used to further qualify the value of SettlPartyRole(784).
Used to further qualify the value of UnderlyingInstrumentPartyRole(1061).
Identifies the class or source of DeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint(41062).
Description of the delivery point identified in DeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint(41062).
Identifies the class or source of LegDeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint(41433).
Description of the delivery point identified in LegDeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint(41433).
Identifies the class or source of UnderlyingDeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint(41781).
Description of the delivery point identified in UnderlyingDeliveryStreamDeliveryPoint(41781).
The reference identifier to the PartyRiskLimitCheckRequest(35=DF), or a similar out of band message, message that contained the approval or rejection for risk/credit limit check for this allocation.
Specifies which type of identifier is specified in AllocRefRiskLimitCheckID(2392) field. Uses enums from RefRiskLimitCheckIDType(2335)

The total amount of the limit that has been drawn down against the counterparty. This includes the amount for prior trades. It may or may not include the amount for the given trade, specified in LastLimitAmt(1632), depending upon whether the given trade is considered pending.
The limit for the counterparty. This represents the total limit amount, independent of any amount already utilized.
Indicates the scope of the limit by role. (Elaboration: Used to indicate whether this is a customer account limit, a clearing firm limit, etc.)
Uses enums from PartyRole(452).
Identifies the leg of the trade the entry applies to by referencing the leg's LegID(1788).
Identifies the leg of the trade the entry applies to by referencing the leg's LegID(1788).
Identifies the leg of the trade the entry applies to by referencing the leg's LegID(1788).

Specifies the scope to which the RegulatoryTradeID(1903) applies. Used when a trade must be assigned more than one identifier, e.g. one for the clearing member and another for the client on a cleared trade as with the principal model in Europe.

Specifies the scope to which the SideRegulatoryTradeID(1972) applies. Used when a trade must be assigned more than one identifier, e.g. one for the clearing member and another for the client on a cleared trade as with the principal model in Europe.

Specifies the scope to which the AllocRegulatoryTradeID(1909) applies. Used when a trade must be assigned more than one identifier, e.g. one for the clearing member and another for the client on a cleared trade as with the principal model in Europe.

fielddef.name: EffectiveBusinessDate
fielddef.descr: Specifies an explicit business date for associated reference data or transaction. Used when an implicit date is not sufficiently specific.

descr.p: Indicates if the list of orders was initially received manually (as opposed to electronically) or if it was entered manually (as opposed to entered by automated trading software).

fielddef.name: EntitlementSubType
fielddef.item: Order Entry(Entitle to enter new orders)
View indicative prices (Entitle to subscribe to indicative prices)
View executable prices (Entitle to subscribe to executable prices)
Single quote (Entitle to submit quote request for a single quote)
Streaming quotes (Entitle to submit quote request for streaming quotes)
Single broker (Entitle to submit quote request for a single broker)
Multi brokers (Entitle to submit quote request for multiple brokers)
fielddef.descr: Subtype of an entitlement specified in EntitlementType(1775). Values of 1000+ are reserved

fielddef.name: QuoteModelType
fielddef.item: Quote Entry (New quote is entered or previously submitted quote is updated in full without regard to amount executed when a subsequent quote (e.g. with the same QuoteID reference) is received by the Recipient of the quote message.)

Quote Modification (Previously submitted quote must be present and is updated, taking into consideration the amount already executed when a subsequent quote (e.g. with the same QuoteID reference) is received by the Recipient of the quote message.)
fielddef.descr: Quote model type

fielddef.name: ComplianceText
fielddef.descr: Free text for compliance information required for regulatory reporting

descr.p: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedComplianceText (2352) field

Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the ComplianceText (2404) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the InstrumentScopeSecurityDesc field.

fielddef.name: ExecMethod
fielddef.item: Manual (The transaction was executed in a manual or other non-automated manner e.g. by voice directly between the counterparties. Also used to identify MTT code M "Off Book Non-Automated".)

Automated (The transaction was executed on an automated execution platform such as an automated systematic internaliser system, broker crossing network, broker crossing system, dark pool trading, "direct to capital" systems, broker position unwind mechanisms, etc.)
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the transaction was executed, e.g. via an automated execution platform or other method.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventSpotRate
fielddef.descr: FX spot rate.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventForwardPoints
fielddef.descr: FX forward points added to spot rate. May be a negative value.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventSpotRate
fielddef.descr: FX spot rate.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventForwardPoints
fielddef.descr: FX forward points added to spot rate. May be a negative value.

fielddef.name: RateSourcePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: RelatedToSecurityID
fielddef.descr: The security identifier of the instrument, instrument leg or underlying instrument with which the related instrument has correlation.

fielddef.name: RelatedToSecurityIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies class or source of the RelatedToSecurityID(2413) value.

fielddef.name: RelatedToStreamXIDRef
fielddef.descr: StreamXID(41303), LegStreamXID(41700) or UnderlyingStreamXID(42016) of the stream with which the related instrument has correlation.

fielddef.name: FirmTradeEventID
fielddef.descr: An identifier created by the trading party for the life cycle event associated with this report.

fielddef.name: LegMarketDisruptionFallbackValue
fielddef.descr: Applicable value for LegMarketDisruptionFallbackType(41470).

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionValue
fielddef.descr: Applicable value for MarketDisruptionEvent(41093).

fielddef.name: MarketDisruptionFallbackValue
fielddef.descr: Applicable value for MarketDisruptionFallbackType(41095).

fielddef.name: PaymentSubType
fielddef.descr: Used to further clarify the value of PaymentType(40213).

fielddef.name: PaymentLegRefID
fielddef.descr: Identifies the instrument leg in which this payment applies to by referencing the leg's LegID(1788).

descr.p: Specifies the price decimal precision of the instrument.

For FX, this Sspecifies the pip size in which forward points are calculated. Point (pip) size varies by currency pair. Major currencies are all traded in points of 0.0001, with the exception of JPY which has a point size of 0.01

fielddef.name: TradeContingency
fielddef.item: Does not apply (default if not specified) (The trade is for an asset classes that areis not traded with contingency)
Contingent trade (The trade is terminated as soon as its paired trade is cleared or denied clearing)
Non-contingent trade (Identifies a trade that is not contingent but is for an asset class that may be contingent)
fielddef.descr: Indicates the contingency attribute for a trade in an asset class that may be contingent on the clearing of a corresponding paired trade (for example Exchange for Physical (EFP), Exchange for Swap (EFS), Exchange for Related (EFR) or Exchange for Option (EFO), collectively called EFRPs). Once the paired trade clears or fails to clear, the related trade (the trade which carries this attribute) ceases to exist.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingAdditionalTermBondRefs
fielddef.descr: Number of bonds in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondCouponFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of the bond's coupon payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondCouponFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of the bond's coupon payment. Uses values from CouponFrequencyUnit(1949)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondCouponType
fielddef.descr: Coupon type of the bond. Uses values from CouponType(1946)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondCouponRate
fielddef.descr: Coupon rate of the bond. See also CouponRate(223).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the bond value is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondCurrentTotalIssuedAmount
fielddef.descr: Total issued amount of the bond.

descr.p: The day count convention used in interest calculations for a bond or an interest bearing security.
Uses values from CouponDayCount(1950). 100+ reserved for bilaterally agreed values

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the bond.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingAdditionalTermBondDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingAdditionalTermBondDesc(41711) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingAdditionalTermBondDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondDesc(41709) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondDesc(41709) field.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondIssuer
fielddef.descr: Issuer of the bond.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingAdditionalTermBondIssuerLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingAdditionalTermBondIssuer(42026) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingAdditionalTermBondIssuer
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondIssuer(42017) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondIssuer(42017) field.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondSeniority
fielddef.descr: Specifies the bond's payment priority in the event of a default. Uses values from Seniority(1450)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondMaturityDate
fielddef.descr: Maturity date of the bond.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondParValue
fielddef.descr: Par value of the bond.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondSecurityID
fielddef.descr: Security identifier of the bond.

descr.p: Identifies the source scheme of the UnderlyingAdditionalTermBondSecurityID(41341) value.
Uses values from SecurityIDSource(22). 100+ reserved for bilaterally agreed values

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingAdditionalTerms
fielddef.descr: Number of additional terms in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermConditionPrecedentBondIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the condition precedent bond is applicable. The swap contract is only valid if the bond is issued and if there is any dispute over the terms of fixed stream then the bond terms would be used.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalTermDiscrepancyClauseIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the discrepancy clause is applicable.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingCashSettlDealers
fielddef.descr: Number of dealers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDealer
fielddef.descr: Identifies the dealer from whom price quotations for the reference obligation are obtained for the purpose of cash settlement valuation calculation. (ISDA 2003 Term: Dealer.)

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingCashSettlTerms
fielddef.descr: Number of elements in the repeating group.

descr.p: Indicates whether accrued interest is included or not in the value provided in UnderlyingCashSettlAmount(42054).
For cash settlement this specifies whether quotations should be obtained inclusive or not of accrued interest.
For physical settlement this specifies whether the buyer should deliver the obligation with an outstanding principal balance that includes or excludes accrued interest.
Elaboration: ISDA 2003 Term: Include/Exclude Accrued Interest
The number of business days used in the determination of the cash settlement payment date.

Elaboration: If a cash settlement amount is specified, the cash settlement payment date will be this number of business days following the calculation of the final price. If a cash settlement amount is not specified, the cash settlement payment date will be this number of business days after all conditions to settlement are satisfied.
ISDA 2003 Term: Cash Settlement Date
The amount paid between the trade parties, seller to the buyer, for cash settlement on the cash settlement date.

Elabroation: If not specified this would typically be calculated as ((100 or the reference price) - reference obligation price) x floating rate payer calculation amount. Price values are all expressed as a percentage. ISDA 2003 Term: Cash Settlement Amount

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used at valuation time for cash settlement purposes e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the UnderlyingCashSettlAmount(42054) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlFixedTermIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether fixed settlement is applicable or not applicable in a recovery lock.

descr.p: When determining the cash settlement amount, if weighted average price quotes are to be obtained for the reference obligation, this is the minimum intended threshold amount of outstanding principal balance of the reference obligation for which the quote should be obtained. If not specified, the ISDA definitions provide for a fallback amount of the lower of either USD 1,000,000 (or its equivalent in the relevent obligation currency) or the (minimum) quoted amount.
Elaboration: ISDA 2003 Term: Minimum Quotation Amount

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlMinimumQuoteCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the UnderlyingCashSettlQuoteAmount(42049) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

descr.p: When determining the cash settlement amount, if weighted average price quotes are to be obtained for the reference obligation, this is the upper limit to the outstanding principal balance of the reference obligation for which the quote should be obtained. If not specifed, the ISDA definitions provide for a fallback amount equal to floating rate payer calculation amount.
Elaboration: ISDA 2003 Term: Quotation Amount

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlQuoteCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the UnderlyingCashSettlQuoteAmount(42049) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlQuoteMethod
fielddef.descr: The type of quote used to determine the cash settlement price. Uses values from CashSettlQuoteMethod(40027)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlRecoveryFactor
fielddef.descr: Used for fixed recovery, this specifies the recovery level as determined at contract inception, to be applied in the event of a default. The factor is used to calculate the amount paid by the seller to the buyer for cash settlement on the cash settlement date. The amount is calculated is (1 - UnderlyingCashSettlRecoveryFactor(42055)) x floating rate payer calculation amount. The currency is derived from the floating rate payer calculation amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlTermXID
fielddef.descr: Name referenced from UnderlyingSettlementTermXIDRef(41315).

descr.p: The number of business days after settlement conditions have been satisfied, when the calculation agent is to obtain a price quotation on the reference obligation for purposes of cash settlement.
Elaboration: Associated with ISDA 2003 Term: Valuation Date.
The number of business days between successive valuation dates when multiple valuation dates are applicable for cash settlement.
Elaboration: Associated with ISDA 2003 Term: Valuation Date.)
Where multiple valuation dates are specified as being applicable for cash settlement, this element specifies the number of applicable valuation dates.
Elaboration: Associated with ISDA 2003 Term: Valuation Date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlValuationMethod
fielddef.descr: The ISDA defined methodology for determining the final price of the reference obligation for purposes of cash settlement. Uses values from CashSettlValuationMethod(40038)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlValuationTime
fielddef.descr: Time of valuation.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventSpotRate
fielddef.descr: FX spot rate.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventForwardPoints
fielddef.descr: FX forward points added to spot rate. May be a negative value.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionValue
fielddef.descr: Applicable value for UnderlyingMarketDisruptionEvent(41865).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackValue
fielddef.descr: Applicable value for UnderlyingMarketDisruptionFallbackType(41867).

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligations
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of delivery obligation applicable for physical settlement. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Deliverable_Obligation_Types for code list for applicable deliverable obligation types.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationValue
fielddef.descr: Physical settlement delivery obligation value appropriate to UnderlyingPhysicalSettlDeliverableObligationType(42066). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Deliverable_Obligation_Types for applicable obligation type values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPhysicalSettlTerms
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPhysicalSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Currency of physical settlement. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

descr.p: A number of business days. Its precise meaning is dependent on the context in which this element is used.
ISDA 2003 Term: Business Day

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPhysicalSettlMaximumBusinessDays
fielddef.descr: A maximum number of business days. Its precise meaning is dependent on the context in which this element is used. Intended to be used to limit a particular ISDA fallback provision.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPhysicalSettlTermXID
fielddef.descr: A named string value referenced by UnderlyingSettlementTermXIDRef(41315).

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProtectionTermEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of protection term events in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventCurrency
fielddef.descr: Applicable currency if UnderlyingProtectionTermEventValue(42079) is an amount. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventDayType
fielddef.descr: Day type for events that specify a period and unit. Uses values from PaymentStreamInflationLagDayType (40810)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for protection term events.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventRateSource
fielddef.descr: Rate source for events that specify a rate source, e.g. Floating rate interest shortfall.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of credit event applicable to the protection terms. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Protection_Term_Event_Types for code list of applicable event types.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with protection term events.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventValue
fielddef.descr: Protection term event value appropriate to UnderlyingProtectionTermEventType(42078). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Protection_Term_Event_Types for applicable event type values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProtectionTermEventNewsSources
fielddef.descr: Number of event news sources in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventNewsSource
fielddef.descr: Newspaper or electronic news service or source that may publish relevant information used in the determination of whether or not a credit event has occurred.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProtectionTermEventQualifiers
fielddef.descr: Number of qualifiers in the repeating group.

descr.p: Protection term event qualifier. Used to further qualify UnderlyingProtectionTermEventType(43078).
Uses values from ProtectionTermEventQualifier(40200)

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProtectionTerms
fielddef.descr: Number of protection terms in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermNotional
fielddef.descr: The notional amount of protection coverage for a floating rate. Elaboration: ISDA 2003 Term: Floating Rate Payer Calculation Amount

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency of UnderlyingProtectionTermNotional(42069). Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

descr.p: The notifying party is the party that notifies the other party when a credit event has occurred by means of a credit event notice. If more than one party is referenced as being the notifying party then either party may notify the other of a credit event occurring. UnderlyingProtectionTermSellerNotifies(42071)=Y indicates that the seller notifies.
Elaboration: ISDA 2003 Term: Notifying Party

The notifying party is the party that notifies the other party when a credit event has occurred by means of a credit event notice. If more than one party is referenced as being the notifying party then either party may notify the other of a credit event occurring. UnderlyingProtectionTermBuyerNotifies(42072)=Y indicates that the buyer notifies.
Elaboration: ISDA 2003 Term: Notifying Party

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: When used, the business center indicates the local time of the business center that replaces the Greenwich Mean Time in Section 3.3 of the 2003 ISDA Credit Derivatives Definitions. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermStandardSources
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether ISDA defined Standard Public Sources are applicable (UnderlyingProtectionTermStandardSources(42074)=Y) or not.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventMinimumSources
fielddef.descr: The minimum number of the specified public information sources that must publish information that reasonably confirms that a credit event has occurred. The market convention is two. Elaboration: ISDA 2003 Term: Specified Number

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermXID
fielddef.descr: A named string value referenced by UnderlyingProtectionTermXIDRef(41314).

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProtectionTermObligations
fielddef.descr: Number of obligations in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermObligationType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of obligation applicable to the protection terms. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Protection_Term_Obligation_Types for code list of applicable obligation types.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermObligationValue
fielddef.descr: Protection term obligation value appropriate to UnderlyingProtectionTermObligationType(42088). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Protection_Term_Obligation_Types for applicable obligation type values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the underlying provision's cash settlement payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Termination or relative termination date adjustement business day convention. Uses values from BusinessDayConvention(40921)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the cash settlement payment date is relative to an anchor date. Uses values from StreamEffectiveDateRelativeTo(40910). 100+ reserved for bilaterally agreed values

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative cash settlement payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative cash settlement payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative cash settlement payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateRangeFirst
fielddef.descr: First date in range when a settlement date range is provided.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateRangeLast
fielddef.descr: Last date in range when a settlement date range is provided.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDates
fielddef.descr: Number of UnderlyingProvision cash settlement payment dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDate
fielddef.descr: Cash settlement payment date, unadjusted or adjusted depending on UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateType(42101).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueTime
fielddef.descr: A time specified in 24-hour format, e.g. 11am would be represented as 11:00:00. The time of the cash settlement valuation date when the cash settlement amount will be determined according to the cash settlement method if the parties have not otherwise been able to agree to the cash settlement amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used with the provision's cash settlement valuation time. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of date (e.g. adjusted for holidays). Uses values from ProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateType(40173)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The cash settlement valuation date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component. Uses values from BusinessDayConvention(40921)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the cash settlement value date is relative to an anchor date. Uses values from StreamEffectiveDateRelativeTo(40910)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative cash settlement value date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative cash settlement value date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative cash settlement value date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted cash settlement value date.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlValueDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the cash settlement valuation date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisions
fielddef.descr: Number of provisions in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCalculationAgent
fielddef.descr: Used to identify the calculation agent. The calculation agent may be identified in UnderlyingProvisionCalculationAgent(42156) or in the underlying provision parties component. Uses values from ProvisionCalculationAgent(40098)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlMethod
fielddef.descr: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.3. Cash Settlement Methods, paragraph (e). Uses values from ProvisionCashSettlMethod(40108)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of settlement. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlCurrency2
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of settlement for a cross-currency provision. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlQuoteSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of quote information. Uses values from PaymentStreamRateIndexSource(40790)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlQuoteReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the quote source.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionCashSettlQuoteType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of quote to be used. Uses values from ProvisionCashSettlQuoteType(40111)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date of the provision.

descr.p: The underlying instrument's provision's date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustement component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.
Uses values from BusinessDayConvention(40921)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionDateAdjusted
