fielddef.descr: The adjusted date of the provision.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionDateTenorPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the provision's tenor period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionDateTenorUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the provision's tenor period. Uses values from ProvisionDateTenorUnit(40097)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseConfirmation
fielddef.descr: Used to indicate whether follow-up confirmation of exercise (written or electronic) is required following telephonic notice by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment association with the UnderlyingProvisions, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionSinglePartyBuyerSide
fielddef.descr: If optional early termination is not available to both parties then this component identifies the buyer of the option through its side of the trade. Uses values from ProvisionOptionSinglePartyBuyerSide(40099)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionSinglePartySellerSide
fielddef.descr: If optional early termination is not available to both parties then this component identifies the seller of the option through its side of the trade. Uses values from ProvisionOptionSinglePartyBuyerSide(40099)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseStyle
fielddef.descr: The instrument provision's exercise style. Uses values from ExerciseStyle(1194)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseMultipleNotional
fielddef.descr: A notional amount which restricts the amount of notional that can be exercised when partial exercise or multiple exercise is applicable. The integral multiple amount defines a lower limit of notional that can be exercised and also defines a unit multiple of notional that can be exercised, i.e. only integer multiples of this amount can be exercised.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseMinimumNotional
fielddef.descr: The minimum notional amount that can be exercised on a given exercise date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseMaximumNotional
fielddef.descr: The maximum notional amount that can be exercised on a given exercise date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionMinimumNumber
fielddef.descr: The minimum number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionMaximumNumber
fielddef.descr: The maximum number of options that can be exercised on a given exercise date. If the number is not specified, it means that the maximum number of options corresponds to the remaining unexercised options.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionType
fielddef.descr: Type of provision. Uses values from ProvisionType(40091)

descr.p: The instrument UnderlyingProvision's option exercise date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.
Uses values from BusinessDayConvention(40921)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseBoundsFirstDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The first date of a schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of exercise dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseBoundsLastDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The last date of a schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of exercise dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionText
fielddef.descr: Free form text to specify additional information or enumeration description when a standard value does not apply.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingProvisionTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedUnderlyingProvisionText(42712) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingProvisionText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingProvisionText(42170) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingProvisionText(42170) field.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the underlying instrument's provision's option exercise date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency of subsequent exercise dates in the exercise period following the earliest exercise date. An interval of 1 day should be used to indicate an American style exercise frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency of subsequent exercise dates in the exercise period following the earliest exercise date. Uses values from CouponFrequencyUnit(1949)

descr.p: The earliest time at which notice of exercise can be given by the buyer to the seller (or seller's agent)

ul.li: i) on the expriation date, in the case of a European style option,

(ii) on each bermuda option exercise date and the expiration date, in the case of a Bermuda style option the commencement date to, and including, the expiration date, in the case of an American option.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseEarliestTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used with the provision's earliest time for notice of exercise. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseLatestTime
fielddef.descr: For a Bermuda or American style option, the latest time on an exercise business day (excluding the expiration date) within the exercise period that notice can be given by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent. Notice of exercise given after this time will be deemed to have been given on the next exercise business day.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseLatestTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used with the provision's latest time for notice of exercise. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first day of the exercise period for an American style option.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option exercise start date is relative to an anchor date. Uses values from StreamEffectiveDateRelativeTo(40910). 100+ reserved for bilaterally agreed values

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative option exercise start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted first day of the exercise period for an American style option.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExercisePeriodSkip
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the referenced date schedule that are between each date in the relative date schedule. Thus a skip of 2 would mean that dates are relative to every second date in the referenced schedule. If present this should have a value greater than 1.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDates
fielddef.descr: Number of UnderlyingProvision option exercise fixed dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDate
fielddef.descr: A predetermined option exercise date, unadjusted or adjusted depending on UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDateType(42114).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of date (e.g. adjusted for holidays). Uses values from ProvisionOptionExerciseFixedDateType(40144)

descr.p: The underlying instrument's provision's option expiration date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.
Uses values from BusinessDayConvention(40921)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the option expiration date is relative to an anchor date. Uses values from StreamEffectiveDateRelativeTo(40910). 100+ reserved for bilaterally agreed values

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative option expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative option expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative option expiration date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted last day within an exercise period for an American style option. For a European style option it is the only day within the exercise period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadusted last day within an exercise period for an American style option. For a European style option it is the only day within the exercise period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationTime
fielddef.descr: The latest time for exercise on the expiration date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: Identifies the business center calendar used with the provision's latest exercise time on expiration date. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExpirationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the underlying instrument's provision's option expiration date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

descr.p: The underlying instrument provision's option underlying date adjustment business day convention. Used only to override the business day convention specified in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component within the UnderlyingInstrument component.
Uses values from BusinessDayConvention(40921)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted date on the underlying set by the exercise of an option. What this date is depends on the option (e.g. in a swaption it is the swap effective date, in an extendible/cancelable UnderlyingProvision it is the swap termination date).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date on the underlying set by the exercise of an option. What this date is depends on the option (e.g. in a swaption it is the swap effective date, in an extendible/cancelable provision it is the swap termination date).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the date relevant to the underlying trade on exercise is relative to an anchor date. Uses values from StreamEffectiveDateRelativeTo(40910). Values 100+ reserved for bilaterally agreed values

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative option relevant underlying date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative option relevant underlying date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the provision's relative option relevant underlying date offset.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionRelevantUnderlyingDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustement of the underlying instrument's provision's option underlying date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionPartyIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of parties identified in the contract provision.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionPartyID
fielddef.descr: The party identifier for the payment settlement party.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionPartyIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the class or source of the UnderlyingProvisionPartyID(42174) value. Uses values from PartyIDSource(447)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionPartyRole
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type or role of UnderlyingProvisionPartyID(42174) specified. Uses values from PartyRole(452)

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionPartyRoleQualifier
fielddef.descr: Used to further qualify the value of UnderlyingProvisionPartyRole(42176). Uses the same values as PartyDetailRoleQualifier(1674)

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingProvisionPartySubIDs
fielddef.descr: Number of sub-party IDs to be reported for the party.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionPartySubID
fielddef.descr: Underlying provision party sub-identifier, if applicable for UnderlyingProvisionPartyID(42174).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionPartySubIDType
fielddef.descr: The type of UnderlyingProvisionPartySubID(42178). Uses values from PartySubIDType(803). Values 4000+ reserved for bilaterally agreed values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseEarliestDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the interval to the first (and possibly only) exercise date in the exercise period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionOptionExerciseEarliestDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the interval to the first (and possibly only) exercise date in the exercise period.

fielddef.name: FillRefID
fielddef.descr: A reference to either the value of the FillExecID(1363) or an implicit position of a fills instance in the FillsGrp component.

fielddef.name: OrderRequestID
fielddef.descr: Unique message identifier for an order request as assigned by the submitter of the request.

fielddef.name: MassOrderRequestID
fielddef.descr: Unique message identifier for a mass order request as assigned by the submitter of the orders.

fielddef.name: MassOrderReportID
fielddef.descr: Unique message identifier for a mass order request as assigned by the receiver of the orders.

fielddef.name: MassOrderRequestStatus
fielddef.descr: Status of mass order request.

fielddef.name: MassOrderRequestResult
fielddef.descr: Request result of mass order request.

fielddef.name: OrderResponseLevel
fielddef.item: No acknowledgement (Responses are provided through one or more ExecutionReport(35=8) messages)

Minimum acknowledgement (The minimum is any information to explain why the requested transaction was refused or led to additional events, e.g. immediate execution of an order that was entered or modified)
Acknowledge each order (The number of entries in the response is identical to the number of entries in the request)
Summary acknowledgement (Responses are provided through a single MassOrderAck(35=DK) without entries and one or more ExecutionReport(35=8) messages)
fielddef.descr: The level of response requested from receiver of mass order messages. A default value should be bilaterally agreed.

fielddef.name: NoOrderEntries
fielddef.descr: Number of order entries.

fielddef.name: OrderEntryAction
fielddef.descr: Specifies the action to be taken for the given order.

fielddef.name: OrderEntryID
fielddef.descr: Unique identifier for an order within a single MassOrder(35=DJ) message that can be used as a reference in the MassOrderAck(35=DK) message.

fielddef.name: ExecTypeReason
fielddef.item: Order replaced with non-resting order upon request
fielddef.descr: The initiating event when an ExecutionReport(35=8) is sent. Values 100+ are reserved.

fielddef.name: TotNoOrderEntries
fielddef.descr: Totals number of orders for a mass order or its acknowledgment being fragmented across multiple messages.

descr.p: Number of Target Party Sub IDs in the repeating group
Party sub-identifier value within a target party repeating group.
Type of TargetPartySubID value. Uses enums from PartySubIDType. Values 4000+ are reserved.
Unique identifier for the transfer instruction assigned by the submitter.

The unique identifier assigned to the transfer entity once it is received, for example, by the CCP or the party governing the transfer process. Generally this same identifier for the transfer is used by all parties involved
Unique identifier for the transfer report message
Indicates the type of transfer transaction
Indicates the type of transfer requested
Indicates the type of transfer
Status of transfer
Reason the transfer instruction was rejected. Values of 100+ are reserved
Indicates the type of transfer report

fielddef.name: AggressorTime
fielddef.descr: Timestamp of aggressive order or quote resulting in match event.

fielddef.name: AggressorSide
fielddef.item: Undisclosed (valid for IOI and List Order messages only)
Cross (orders where counterparty is an exchange, valid for all messages except IOIs)
fielddef.descr: Side of aggressive order or quote resulting in match event.

descr.p: Indicates if the instrument is in "fast market" state.
A "fast market" is a state in which market rules are applied to instrument(s) or entire trading session when market events causes significant price movements due to public information

fielddef.name: LinkageHandlingIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicate whether linkage handling is in effect for an instrument or not.

fielddef.name: NumberOfBuyOrders
fielddef.descr: Number of buy orders involved in a trade.

fielddef.name: NumberOfSellOrders
fielddef.descr: Number of sell orders involved in a trade.

fielddef.name: SettlPriceDeterminationMethod
fielddef.item: Mid price (Average The price at the mid-point between last bid and last offer price)
Average of last trade prices (The Aaverage price across a bi-laterally agreed number of trades, e.g. last five trades)
Average of last trade period (Average price across bilaterally agreed time period, e.g. last minute of trading)
Underlying price (Based on price of underlying instrument)
Calculated price (Other calculation method,e.g. theoretical price)
fielddef.descr: Calculation method used to determine settlement price. Values "100" and above are reserved for bilaterally agreed upon user defined enumerations

descr.p: Message identifier for a statistics request.
Message identifier for a statistics report.
The short name or acronym for a set of statistic parameters.
Can be used to provide an optional textual description for a statistic.

fielddef.name: MDStatisticType
fielddef.item: Count (Simple count of entities or events, e.g. orders transactions during a period of time)
Average volume (Average quantity of entities, e.g. average size of incoming quotes or average trade size)
Total volume (Aggregated volume of entities across events, e.g. total trade volume during a period of time)
Distribution (Distribution of entities across entity types, e.g. percentage of limit orders amongst all order types)
Ratio (Pre-defined ratio between entities, e.g. ratio of trades triggered by buy orders)
Liquidity (Measurement of liquidity of an instrument, e.g. by providing the spread between bid and offer or the trade volume needed to move the price)
Volatility (Volatility of entities, e.g. price movements of incoming orders)
Duration (Time period of events, e.g. resting period of passive orders)
Tick (Price movement of an instrument in number of ticks)
Midpoint (Midpoint price between bid and offer)
Exchange best (Best price of a single venue regardless of volume)
Exchange best with volume (Best price of a single venue with volume at or above a pre-defined threshold)
Consolidated best (Best price across multiple venues regardless of volume)
Consolidated best with volume (Best price across multiple venues with volume at or above a pre-defined threshold)

descr.p: Type of statistic value. Values 100 and above are reserved for bilaterally agreed upon user defined enumerations
Entities used as basis for the statistics. Values 100 and above are reserved for bilaterally agreed upon user defined enumerations

fielddef.name: MDStatisticSubScope
fielddef.item: Visible (Only includes visible orders and/or quotes)
Hidden (Only includes hidden orders and/or quotes)
Indicative (Only includes IOIs and nontradable quotes)
Passive ( Only includes resting orders and tradeable quotes)
Market consensus (Only includes entities, e.g. trades, conforming to minimum requirements. Details to be defined out of band)

descr.p: Sub-scope of the statistics to further reduce the entities used as basis for the statistics. Values 100 and above are reserved for bilaterally agreed upon user defined enumerations

fielddef.item: Neither hidden nor large in scale

descr.p: Scope details of the statistics to reduce the number of events being used as basis for the statistics Values 100 and above are reserved for bilaterally agreed upon user defined enumerations
Dissemination frequency of statistics. Special meaning for a value of zero which represents an event-driven dissemination in real time (e.g. as soon as a new trade occurs)
Time unit for MDStatisticFrequencyPeriod (2460). Uses enums from OrderDelayUnit(1429)
Number of time units between the calculation of the statistic and its dissemination. Can be used to defer or delay publication.
Time unit for MDStatisticDelayPeriod (2460). Uses enums from OrderDelayUnit(1429)

fielddef.name: MDStatisticIntervalType
fielddef.item: Sliding window (Window is defined as an interval period up to the current time of dissemination, see MDStatisticIntervalPeriod (2466))
Sliding window peak (Highest value of all sliding windows across date and/or time range. Omission of date/time range represents current day)

Fixed date range (Interval may be open ended on either side, see MDStatisticStartDate MDStatStartDate(2468) and MDStatisticEndDate(2469). Starting/ending time of date fields only apply to the first/last day of the date range. Additional time range may be defined with MDStatisticStartTime(2470) and MDStatisticEndTime(2471) and applies to every business day within date range, i.e. to define an identical time slice across days.)
Fixed time range (Interval may be open ended on either side, see MDStatisticStartTime(2470) and MDStatisticEndTime(2471).)

Current time unit (Relative time unit which has not ended yet, e.g. current day. Interval ends with the time of dissemination of the statistic. Requires the definition of an actual unit, see MDStatisticIntervalTypeUnit(2465))
Previous time unit (Relative time unit which has ended in the past. Requires the definition of an actual unit, see MDStatisticIntervalTypeUnit(2465))
Maximum range (Use to convey record values over the lifetime of the system or venue.)

Maximum range up to previous time unit (Use to convey record values over the lifetime of the system or venue but does not include the most recent time unit as it has not completed yet. Requires the definition of an actual unit, see MDStatisticIntervalTypeUnit(2465))

descr.p: Type of interval over which statistic is calculated
Time unit for MDStatisticIntervalType (2464). Uses enums from OrderDelayUnit(1429)

Length of time over which the statistic is calculated. Special meaning for a value of zero to express that there is no aggregation over time. Can be used with other interval types expressing relative date and time ranges to combine them with sliding window peaks, e.g. highest volume across 1 minute intervals of the previous day
Time unit for MDStatisticIntervalPeriod (2466). Uses enums from OrderDelayUnit(1429)
First day of range for which statistical data is collected
Last day of range for which statistical data is collected
Start time of range for which statistical data is collected
End time of range for which statistical data is collected

fielddef.name: MDStatisticRatioType
fielddef.item: Upticks to downticks (Can also be used with a scope of multiple instruments representing an index)
Market maker to non-market maker (Use to identify share of market making activity)
Automated to non-automated (Use to identify ratio of orders and quotes resulting from automated trading)
Orders to trades (Use with scope of trades)
Quotes to trades (Use with scope of trades)
Orders and quotes to trades (Use with scope of trades)

descr.p: Ratios between various entities.

fielddef.item: Trade volume to total traded volume
Orders to total number of orders

fielddef.name: MDStatisticRequestResult
fielddef.item: Trade date out of supported range
Invalid or unknown trade input source

descr.p: Result returned in response to MarketDataStatisticsRequest (35=DO). Values "100" and above are reserved for bilaterally agreed upon user defined enumerations
Number of market data statistics.
Unique identifier for a statistic.
Time of calculation of a statistic.
Status for a statistic to indicate its availability
Statistical value
Type of statistical value
Unit of time of statistical value. Uses enums from OrderDelayUnit(1429)
Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedMDStatisticDesc(2482) field.

Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the MDStatisticDesc(2455) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the MDStatisticDesc(2455) field.

valblockdef.name: AssetGrp
valblockdef.item: Financials (A categorization which usually includes rates, foreign exchange, credit, bonds and equity products or assets)
Commodities (A categorization which usually includes hard commodities such as agricultural, metals, freight, energy products or assets.)
Alternative investments (A categorization which usually includes weather, housing, and commodity indices products or assets.)

descr.p: Indicates the status of the risk limit check performed on a trade for this allocation instance

Indicates the broad product or asset classification. May be used to provide grouping for the product taxonomy (Product(460), SecurityType(167), etc.) and/or the risk taxonomy (AssetClass(1938), AssetSubClass(1939), AssetType(1940), etc.).

Indicates the broad product or asset classification. May be used to provide grouping for the product taxonomy (Product(460), SecurityType(167), etc.) and/or the risk taxonomy (AssetClass(1938), AssetSubClass(1939), AssetType(1940), etc.).
Specifies which contract definition, such as those published by ISDA, will apply for the terms of the trade. See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/contractual-definitions for values
Number of financing definitions in the repeating group.
Specifies the publication date of the applicable version of the contract matrix. If not specified, the ISDA Standard Terms Supplement defines rules for which version of the matrix is applicable
Identifies the applicable contract matrix. See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/matrix-type-1-0.xml for values
Number of contractual matrices in the repeating group.

Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegDocumentationText(2505) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegDocumentationText(2494) field.
Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedLegDocumentationText(2493) field.
Contractual currency forming the basis of a financing agreement and associated transactions. Usually, but not always, the same as the trade currency.
A reference to the date the underlying agreement specified by LegAgreementID(2498) and LegAgreementDesc(2497) was executed.

The full name of the base standard agreement, annexes and amendments in place between the principals applicable to a financing transaction. See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/master-agreement-type for derivative values.
A common reference to the applicable standing agreement between the counterparties to a financing transaction.
The verison of master agreement.

Describes the type of broker confirmation executed between the parties. Can be used as an alternative to MasterConfirmationDesc(1962). See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/broker-confirmation-type for values.
The date of the ISDA Credit Support Agreement executed between the parties and intended to govern collateral arrangements for all OTC derivatives transactions between those parties.
The type of ISDA Credit Support Agreement. See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/credit-support-agreement-type for values.
A common reference or unique identifier to identify the ISDA Credit Support Agreement executed between the parties.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryType
fielddef.item: "Versus Payment": Deliver (if sell) or Receive (if buy) vs. (against) Payment
"Free": Deliver (if sell) or Receive (if buy) Free

descr.p: Identifies type of settlement.

A sentence or phrase pertenant pertinent to the trade, not a reference to an external document. E.g. "To be registered with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, Acid Rain Division, SO2 Allowance Tracking System".
End date of a financing deal, i.e. the date the seller reimburses the buyer and takes back control of the collateral.
Identification of the law governing the transaction. See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/governing-law for values

The fraction of the cash consideration that must be collateralized, expressed as a percent. A MarginRatio of 2% indicates that the value of the collateral (after deducting for "haircut") must exceed the cash consideration by 2%
The date that an annexation to the master confirmation was executed between the parties.
Alternative to broker confirmation. The date of the confirmation executed between the parties and intended to govern all relevant transactions between those parties.
The type of master confirmation executed between the parties. See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/master-confirmation-type for values.
The type of master confirmation annexation executed between the parties. See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/master-confirmation-annex-type for values.
Start date of a financing deal, i.e. the date the buyer pays the seller cash and takes control of the collateral.
Type of financing termination.
Specifies the publication date of the applicable version of the contractual supplement
Identifies the applicable contractual supplement. See http://www.fpml.org/codingscheme/contractual-supplement for values
Number of financing terms supplements in the repeating group.

Indicates the broad product or asset classification. May be used to provide grouping for the product taxonomy (Product(460), SecurityType(167), etc.) and/or the risk taxonomy (AssetClass(1938), AssetSubClass(1939), AssetType(1940), etc.).
The unique transaction entity identifier assigned by the firm.
The unique transaction entity identifier.

The reference to a wire transfer associated with the transaction. Wire references done via wire services such as Fedwire Output Message Accountabilitty Data "OMAD" or SWIFT Output Sequence Number "OSN".

fielddef.name: CollRptRejectReason
fielddef.item: Unacceptable or invalid type of collateral

descr.p: Reject reason code for rejecting the collateral report.
The status of the collateral report.
Identifier assigned to a collection of trades so that they can be analyzed as one atomic unit for risk assessment and clearing
Ordinal number of the trade within a series of related trades
Used for the calculated quantity of the other side of the currency trade applicable to the allocation instance.
An encoded collateral request processing instruction to the receiver.
A unique identifier to link together a set or group of requests.
Ordinal number of the request within a set or group of requests.
Total number of request messages within a set or group of requests.
Communicates the underlying condition when the request response indicates "warning".

Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the WarningText(2520) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the WarningText(2520) field.
Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedWarningtText(2521) field.

fielddef.name: AffiliatedFirmsTradeIndicator
fielddef.item: Transaction or position is not between two affiliated firms
Transaction or position is between two affiliated firms

descr.p: Indicates whether the transaction or position was entered into between two affiliated firms. I.e. one counterparty has an ownership interest in the other counterparty but less than the majority interest.
Identifies the swap trade as an "international" transaction.

Indicates a swap that does not have one easily identifiable primary underlying asset, but instead involves multiple underlying assets within one trade repository's jurisdiction that belong to different asset classes.
The delivery or pricing region associated with the commodity swap.
See http://www.ecfr.gov/cgi-bin/text-idx?SID=660d6a40f836aa6ddf213cba080c5b22&node=ap17.2.43_17.e&rgn=div9 for the external code list.
The delivery or pricing region associated with the commodity swap.
See http://www.ecfr.gov/cgi-bin/text-idx?SID=660d6a40f836aa6ddf213cba080c5b22&node=ap17.2.43_17.e&rgn=div9 for the external code list.
The delivery or pricing region associated with the commodity swap.
See http://www.ecfr.gov/cgi-bin/text-idx?SID=660d6a40f836aa6ddf213cba080c5b22&node=ap17.2.43_17.e&rgn=div9 for the external code list.
Number of relative value metrics entries in the repeating group.
Indicates the type of relative value measurement being specified.
The valuation of an instrument relative to a base measurement specified in RelativeValueType(2530). This value can be negative.
Specifies the side of the relative value.

Basis points relative to a benchmark curve on the bid side, such as LIBOR, or a known security, such as 10Y US Treasury bond. The benchmark security or curve name is specified in the SpreadOrBenchmarkCurveData component.

Basis points relative to a benchmark curve on the offer side, such as LIBOR, or a known security, such as 10Y US Treasury bond. The benchmark security or curve name is specified in the SpreadOrBenchmarkCurveData component.

fielddef.name: MDReportEvent
fielddef.descr: Technical event within market data feed.

fielddef.name: MDReportCount
fielddef.descr: Number of reference and market data messages in-between two MarketDataReport(35=DR) messages.

fielddef.name: TotNoMarketSegmentReports
fielddef.descr: Total number of reports related to market segments.

fielddef.name: TotNoInstrumentReports
fielddef.descr: Total number of reports related to instruments.

fielddef.name: TotNoPartyDetailReports
fielddef.descr: Total number of reports related to party detail information.

fielddef.name: TotNoEntitlementReports
fielddef.descr: Total number of reports related to party entitlement information.

fielddef.name: TotNoRiskLimitReports
fielddef.descr: Total number of reports related to party risk limit information.

fielddef.name: MarketSegmentStatus
fielddef.descr: Status of market segment.

fielddef.name: MarketSegmentType
fielddef.descr: Used to classify the type of market segment.

fielddef.name: MarketSegmentSubType
fielddef.descr: Used to further categorize market segments within a MarketSegmentType(2543).

fielddef.name: NoRelatedMarketSegments
fielddef.descr: Number of related market segments.

fielddef.name: RelatedMarketSegmentID
fielddef.descr: Identifies a related market segment.

fielddef.name: MarketSegmentRelationship
fielddef.descr: Type of relationship between two or more market segments.

fielddef.name: NoAuctionTypeRules
fielddef.descr: Number of auction order types.

fielddef.name: AuctionTypeProductComplex
fielddef.descr: Identifies an entire suite of products for which the auction order type rule applies.

fielddef.name: NoPriceRangeRules
fielddef.descr: Number of rules related to price ranges.

fielddef.name: StartPriceRange
fielddef.descr: Lower boundary for price range.

fielddef.name: EndPriceRange
fielddef.descr: Upper boundary for price range.

fielddef.name: PriceRangeValue
fielddef.descr: Maximum range expressed as absolute value.

fielddef.name: PriceRangePercentage
fielddef.descr: Maximum range expressed as percentage.

fielddef.name: PriceRangeProductComplex
fielddef.descr: Identifies an entire suite of products in the context of trading rules related to price ranges.

fielddef.name: PriceRangeRuleID
fielddef.descr: Identifier for a price range rule.

fielddef.name: FastMarketPercentage
fielddef.descr: The percentage factor to be applied to trading rule parameters (e.g. price ranges, size ranges, etc.) when fast market conditions are applicable.

fielddef.name: NoQuoteSizeRules
fielddef.descr: Number of rules related to quote sizes.

fielddef.name: QuoteSideIndicator
fielddef.item: Single sided quotes are not allowed
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether single sided quotes are allowed.

fielddef.name: NoFlexProductEligibilities
fielddef.descr: Number of eligibility indicators for the creation of flexible securities.

fielddef.name: FlexProductEligibilityComplex
fielddef.descr: Identifies an entire suite of products which are eligible for the creation of flexible securities.

fielddef.name: NumOfComplexInstruments
fielddef.descr: Represents the total number of multileg securities or user defined securities that make up the security.

fielddef.name: MarketDepthTimeInterval
fielddef.descr: Specifies the time interval used for netting market data in a price depth feed.

fielddef.name: MarketDepthTimeIntervalUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the time interval of the netting of market data in a price depth feed.

fielddef.name: MDRecoveryTimeInterval
fielddef.descr: Specifies the time interval between two repetitions of the same market data for cyclic recovery feeds.

fielddef.name: MDRecoveryTimeIntervalUnit
fielddef.descr: The time unit associated with the time interval between two cycles of the same market data in cyclic data recovery feeds.

fielddef.name: PrimaryServiceLocationID
fielddef.descr: Primary service location identifier.

fielddef.name: SecondaryServiceLocationID
fielddef.descr: Secondary or alternate service location identifier.

fielddef.name: MatchRuleProductComplex
fielddef.descr: Identifies an entire suite of products for which the matching rule applies.

fielddef.name: CustomerPriority
fielddef.descr: Specifies the kind of priority given to customers.

fielddef.name: TickRuleProductComplex
fielddef.descr: Identifies an entire suite of products for which the price tick rule applies.

fielddef.name: PreviousAdjustedOpenInterest
fielddef.descr: Previous day's adjusted open interest.

fielddef.name: PreviousUnadjustedOpenInterest
fielddef.descr: Previous day's unadjusted open interest.

fielddef.name: LowExercisePriceOptionIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates if a given option instrument permits low exercise prices (LEPO).

fielddef.name: BlockTradeEligibilityIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates if a given instrument is eligible for block trading.

fielddef.name: InstrumentPricePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the number of decimal places for instrument prices.

fielddef.name: StrikePricePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the number of decimal places for exercise price.

fielddef.name: OrigStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: Original exercise price, e.g. after corporate action requiring changes.

fielddef.name: SettlSubMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies a suitable settlement sub-method for a given settlement method.

fielddef.name: NoClearingPriceParameters
fielddef.descr: Number of parameter sets for clearing prices.

fielddef.name: BusinessDayType
fielddef.descr: Relative identification of a business day.

fielddef.name: ClearingPriceOffset
fielddef.descr: Constant value required for the calculation of the clearing price, e.g. for variance futures.

fielddef.name: VegaMultiplier
fielddef.descr: Constant value required for the calculation of the clearing quantity, e.g. for variance futures.

fielddef.name: AnnualTradingBusinessDays
fielddef.descr: Number of trading business days in a year.

fielddef.name: TotalTradingBusinessDays
fielddef.descr: Number of trading business days over the lifetime of an instrument.

fielddef.name: TradingBusinessDays
fielddef.descr: Number of actual trading business days of an instrument.

fielddef.name: RealizedVariance
fielddef.descr: Actual or realized variance of an instrument used to calculate settlement prices, e.g. for variance futures.

fielddef.name: StandardVariance
fielddef.descr: Standard variance (over the lifetime of an instrument) or initial variance used to calculate settlement prices, e.g. for variance futures.

fielddef.name: RelatedClosePrice
fielddef.descr: Closing price of the underlying required to calculate the RealizedVariance(2587).

fielddef.name: OvernightInterestRate
fielddef.descr: Overnight interest rate.

fielddef.name: AccumulatedReturnModifiedVariationMargin
fielddef.descr: The economic cost of the variation margin from one trading day to the next.

fielddef.name: CalculationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies how the calculation will be made.

fielddef.name: NoMiscFeeSubTypes
fielddef.descr: Specifies the number of miscellaneous fee sub-types.

fielddef.name: MiscFeeSubType
fielddef.descr: Used to provide more granular fee types related to a value of MiscFeeType(139). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Misc_Fee_Sub_Types for code list of applicable fees. Other fee sub-types may be used by mutual agreement of the counterparties.

fielddef.name: MiscFeeSubTypeAmt
fielddef.descr: The amount of the specified MiscFeeSubType(2634).

fielddef.name: MiscFeeSubTypeDesc
fielddef.descr: Can be used to provide an optional textual description of the fee sub-type.

fielddef.name: EncodedMiscFeeSubTypeDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedMiscFeeSubTypeDesc(2638) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedMiscFeeSubTypeDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the MiscFeeSubTypeDesc(2636) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding (347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the MiscFeeSubTypeDesc(2636) field.

fielddef.name: CollateralAmountType
fielddef.item: Portfolio value before processing pledge request
Value confirmed as "locked-up" for processing a pledge request
Credit value of collateral at CCP processing a pledge request
fielddef.descr: The type of value in CurrentCollateralAmount(1704).

fielddef.name: PositionID
fielddef.descr: Unique identifier for a position entity. Refer to PosMaintRptID(721) for a unique identifier of a position report message.

fielddef.name: PaymentDesc
fielddef.descr: A short descriptive name given to the payment, e.g. Premium, Upfront, etc. The description has no intrinsic meaning but should be arbitrarily chosen by the remitter as reference.

fielddef.name: NoCommissions
fielddef.descr: Number of commissions in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: CommissionAmount
fielddef.descr: The commission amount.

fielddef.name: CommissionAmountType
fielddef.descr: Indicates what type of commission is being expressed in CommissionAmount(2640).

fielddef.name: CommissionBasis
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basis or unit used to calculate the commission.

fielddef.name: CommissionCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency denomination of the commission amount if different from the trade's currency. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: CommissionUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The commission rate unit of measure.

fielddef.name: CommissionUnitOfMeasureCurrency
fielddef.descr: Indicates the currency of the unit of measure. Conditionally required when CommissionUnitOfMeasure(2644) = Ccy (Amount of currency).

fielddef.name: CommissionRate
fielddef.descr: The commission rate when CommissionAmount(2640) is based on a percentage of quantity, amount per unit or a factor of "unit of measure". If the rate is a percentage or expressed in basis points, use the decimalized form, e.g. "0.05" for a 5% commission or "0.005" for 50 basis points.

fielddef.name: CommissionSharedIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the amount in CommissionAmount(2640) is to be shared with a third party, e.g. as part of a directed brokerage commission sharing arrangement.

fielddef.name: CommissionAmountShared
fielddef.descr: Commission amount to be shared with a third party, e.g. as part of a directed brokerage commission sharing arrangement. If specified, this amount should not exceed the amount in CommissionAmount(2640).

fielddef.name: CommissionLegRefID
fielddef.descr: Identifies the leg of the trade the entry applies to by referencing the leg's LegID(1788).

fielddef.name: CommissionDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the commission.

fielddef.name: EncodedCommissionDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of the encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedCommissionDesc(2652) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedCommissionDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the CommissionDesc(2650) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the CommissionDesc(2650) field.

fielddef.name: NoAllocCommissions
fielddef.descr: Number of commissions in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionAmount
fielddef.descr: The commission amount.

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionAmountType
fielddef.descr: Indicates what type of commission is being expressed in AllocCommissionAmount(2654).

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionBasis
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basis or unit used to calculate the commission.

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency denomination of the commission amount if different from the trade's currency. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionUnitOfMeasure
fielddef.descr: The commission rate unit of measure.

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionUnitOfMeasureCurrency
fielddef.descr: Indicates the currency of the unit of measure. Conditionally required when AllocCommissionUnitOfMeasure(2658) = Ccy (Currency).

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionRate
fielddef.descr: The commission rate when AllocCommissionAmount(2654) is based on a percentage of quantity, amount per unit or a factor of "unit of measure". If the rate is a percentage or expressed in basis points, use the decimalized form, e.g. "0.05" for a 5% commission or "0.005" for 50 basis points.

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionSharedIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the amount in AllocCommissionAmount(2654) is to be shared with a third party, e.g. as part of a directed brokerage commission sharing arrangement.

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionAmountShared
fielddef.descr: Commission amount to be shared with a third party, e.g. as part of a directed brokerage commission sharing arrangement. If specified, this amount should not exceed the amount in AllocCommissionAmount(2654).

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionLegRefID
fielddef.descr: Identifies the leg of the trade the entry applies to by referencing the leg's LegID(1788).

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionDesc
fielddef.descr: Description of the commission.

fielddef.name: EncodedAllocCommissionDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of the encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedAllocCommissionDesc(2666) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedAllocCommissionDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the AllocCommissionDesc(2664) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the AllocCommissionDesc(2664) field.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding dates are relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation dates are relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: DeltaCrossed
fielddef.descr: Indicates that the party has taken a position on both a put and a call on the same underlying asset.

fielddef.name: CashSettlDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted cash settlement date.

fielddef.name: CashSettlDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the cash settlement provision's date. Used only to override the business day convention defined in the Instrument component.

fielddef.name: CashSettlDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the cash settlement date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: CashSettlDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: CashSettlDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: CashSettlDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: CashSettlDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted cash settlement date.

fielddef.name: NoCashSettlDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: CashSettlDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the cash settlement unadjusted or relative date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: CashSettlPriceSource
fielddef.descr: The source from which the settlement price is to be obtained. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-price-source for values.

fielddef.name: CashSettlPriceDefault
fielddef.descr: The default election for determining settlement price.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventFuturesPriceValuation
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the official settlement price as announced by the related exchange is applicable, in accordance with the ISDA 2002 definitions. Applicable only to futures contracts.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventOptionsPriceValuation
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the official settlement price as announced by the related exchange is applicable, in accordance with the ISDA 2002 definitions. Applicable only to options contracts.

fielddef.name: ComplexEventPVFinalPriceElectionFallback
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fallback provisions for the hedging party in the determination of the final settlement price.

fielddef.name: DividendFloatingRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The dividend accrual floating rate index.

fielddef.name: DividendFloatingRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the dividend accrual floating rate index curve.

fielddef.name: DividendFloatingRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the dividend accrual floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: DividendFloatingRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: DividendFloatingRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The basis points spread from the index specified in DividendFloatingRateIndex(42218).

fielddef.name: DividendFloatingRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: DividendFloatingRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: DividendCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. It is only required where the floating rate is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: DividendCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: DividendCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: DividendFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate. The rate is expressed as a decimal, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: DividendFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: DividendFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: DividendInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. This is assumed to be the first required reset rate for the first regular calculation period. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. The initial rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: DividendFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction of the final rate.

fielddef.name: DividendFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision of the final rate in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: DividendAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: When averaging is applicable, used to specify whether a weighted or unweighted average method of calculation is to be used.

fielddef.name: DividendNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: The specification of any provisions for calculating payment obligations when a floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: NoDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the DividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenterGrp.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's dividend accrual payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the accrual payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted accrual payment date.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualPaymeentDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Accrual payment date adjustment business day convention.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualPaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted accrual payment date.

fielddef.name: DividendReinvestmentIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the dividend will be reinvested.

fielddef.name: DividendEntitlementEvent
fielddef.descr: Defines the contract event which the receiver of the derivative is entitled to the dividend.

fielddef.name: DividendAmountType
fielddef.descr: Indicates how the gross cash dividend amount per share is determined.

fielddef.name: DividendUnderlierRefID
fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: ExtraordinaryDividendPartySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the party through its side in the trade who makes the determination whether dividends are extraordinary in relation to normal levels.

fielddef.name: ExtraordinaryDividendAmountType
fielddef.descr: Indicates how the extraordinary gross cash dividend per share is determined.

fielddef.name: ExtraordinaryDividendCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency in which the excess dividend is denominated. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: ExtraordinaryDividendDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method in which the excess amount is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: DividendAccrualFixedRate
fielddef.descr: The dividend accrual fixed rate per annum expressed as a decimal. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: DividendCompoundingMethod
fielddef.descr: The compounding method to be used when more than one dividend period contributes to a single payment.

fielddef.name: DividendNumOfIndexUnits
fielddef.descr: The number of index units applicable to dividends.

fielddef.name: DividendCashPercentage
fielddef.descr: Declared cash dividend percentage. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: DividendCashEquivalentPercentage
fielddef.descr: Declared cash-equivalent dividend percentage. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: NonCashDividendTreatment
fielddef.descr: Defines the treatment of non-cash dividends.

fielddef.name: DividendComposition
fielddef.descr: Defines how the composition of dividends is to be determined.

fielddef.name: SpecialDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether special dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: MaterialDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether material non-cash dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: OptionsExchangeDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether option exchange dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: AdditionalDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether additional dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: AllDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Represents the European Master Confirmation value of 'All Dividends' which, when applicable, signifies that, for a given Ex-Date, the daily observed share price for that day is adjusted (reduced) by the cash dividend and/or the cash value of any non-cash dividend per share (including extraordinary dividends) declared by the issuer.

fielddef.name: DividendFXTriggerDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the FX trigger date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: DividendFXTriggerDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendFXTriggerDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendFXTriggerDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendFXTriggerDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted FX trigger date.

fielddef.name: DividendFXTriggerDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for the FX trigger date adjustment.

fielddef.name: DividendFXTriggerDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted FX trigger date.

fielddef.name: NoDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the DividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenterGrp.

fielddef.name: DividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's FX trigger date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoDividendPeriods
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the DividendPeriodGrp component.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodSequence
fielddef.descr: Defines the ordinal dividend period. E.g. 1 = First period, 2 = Second period, etc.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date on which the dividend period will begin.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date on which the dividend period will end.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodUnderlierRefID
fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fixed strike price of the dividend period.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The dividend period dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodValuationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted dividend period valuation date.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodValuationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the dividend period valuation date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodValuationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted dividend period valuation date.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted dividend period payment date.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the dividend period payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodPaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted dividend period payment date.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier for linking this stream dividend period to an underlier through an instance of RelatedInstrumentGrp.

fielddef.name: NoDividendPeriodBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the DividendPeriodBusinessCenterGrp.

fielddef.name: DividendPeriodBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's dividend period date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoExtraordinaryEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of extraordinary events in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: ExtraordinaryEventType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of extraordinary or disruptive event applicable to the reference entity. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Extraordinary_Event_Type for code list of extraordinary event types and values.

fielddef.name: ExtraordinaryEventValue
fielddef.descr: The extraordinary or disruptive event value appropriate to ExtraordinaryEventType(42297). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Extraordinary_Event_Type for code list of extraordinary event types and values.

fielddef.name: StrikeIndexCurvePoint
fielddef.descr: The point on the floating rate index curve. Sample values: M = combination of a number between 1-12 and an "M" for month, e.g. 3M Y = combination of number between 1-100 and a "Y" for year, e.g. 10Y 10Y-OLD = see above, then add "-OLD" when appropriate INTERPOLATED = the point is mathematically derived 2/2031 5 3/8 = the point is stated via a combination of maturity month / year and coupon.

fielddef.name: StrikeIndexQuote
fielddef.descr: The quote side from which the index price is to be determined.

fielddef.name: ExtraordinaryEventAdjustmentMethod
fielddef.descr: Defines how adjustments will be made to the contract should one or more of the extraordinary events occur.

fielddef.name: ExchangeLookAlike
fielddef.descr: For a share option trade, indicates whether the instrument is to be treated as an 'exchange look-alike'.

fielddef.name: LegStrikeIndexCurvePoint
fielddef.descr: The point on the floating rate index curve. Sample values: M = combination of a number between 1-12 and an "M" for month, e.g. 3M Y = combination of number between 1-100 and a "Y" for year, e.g. 10Y 10Y-OLD = see above, then add "-OLD" when appropriate INTERPOLATED = the point is mathematically derived 2/2031 5 3/8 = the point is stated via a combination of maturity month / year and coupon.

fielddef.name: LegStrikeIndexQuote
fielddef.descr: The quote side from which the index price is to be determined.

fielddef.name: LegExtraordinaryEventAdjustmentMethod
fielddef.descr: Defines how adjustments will be made to the contract should one or more of the extraordinary events occur.

fielddef.name: LegExchangeLookAlike
fielddef.descr: For a share option trade, indicates whether the instrument is to be treated as an 'exchange look-alike'.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted cash settlement date.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the cash settlement provision's date. Used only to override the business day convention defined in the InstrumentLeg component.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the cash settlement date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted cash settlement date.

fielddef.name: NoLegCashSettlDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the cash settlement unadjusted or relative date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlPriceSource
fielddef.descr: The source from which the settlement price is to be obtained. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-price-source for values.

fielddef.name: LegCashSettlPriceDefault
fielddef.descr: The default election for determining settlement price.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventFuturesPriceValuation
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the official settlement price as announced by the related exchange is applicable, in accordance with the ISDA 2002 definitions. Applicable only to futures contracts.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventOptionsPriceValuation
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the official settlement price as announced by the related exchange is applicable, in accordance with the ISDA 2002 definitions. Applicable only to options contracts.

fielddef.name: LegComplexEventPVFinalPriceElectionFallback
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fallback provisions for the hedging party in the determination of the final settlement price

fielddef.name: NoLegDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenterGrp.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's dividend accrual payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloatingRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The dividend accrual floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloatingRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the dividend accrual floating rate index curve.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloatingRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the dividend accrual floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloatingRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloatingRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The basis points spread from the index specified in LegDividendFloatingRateIndex(42312).

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloatingRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloatingRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: LegDividendCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. It is only required where the floating rate is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegDividendCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegDividendCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate. The rate is expressed as a decimal, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegDividendInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. This is assumed to be the first required reset rate for the first regular calculation period. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. The initial rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegDividendFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction of the final rate.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision of the final rate in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: When averaging is applicable, used to specify whether a weighted or unweighted average method of calculation is to be used.

fielddef.name: LegDividendNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: The specification of any provisions for calculating payment obligations when a floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the accrual payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted accrual payment date.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Accrual payment date adjustment business day convention.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualPaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted accrual payment date.

fielddef.name: LegDividendReinvestmentIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the dividend will be reinvested.

fielddef.name: LegDividendEntitlementEvent
fielddef.descr: Defines the contract event which the receiver of the derivative is entitled to the dividend.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAmountType
fielddef.descr: Indicates how the gross cash dividend amount per share is determined.

fielddef.name: LegDividendUnderlierRefID
fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: LegExtraordinaryDividendPartySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the party through its side in the trade who makes the determination whether dividends are extraordinary in relation to normal levels.

fielddef.name: LegExtraordinaryDividendAmountType
fielddef.descr: Indicates how the extraordinary gross cash dividend per share is determined.

fielddef.name: LegExtraordinaryDividendCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency in which the excess dividend is denominated. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegExtraordinaryDividendDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method in which the excess amount is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: LegDividendAccrualFixedRate
fielddef.descr: The dividend accrual fixed rate per annum expressed as a decimal. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegDividendCompoundingMethod
fielddef.descr: The compounding method to be used when more than one dividend period contributes to a single payment.

fielddef.name: LegDividendNumOfIndexUnits
fielddef.descr: The number of index units applicable to dividends.

fielddef.name: LegDividendCashPercentage
fielddef.descr: Declared cash dividend percentage. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegDividendCashEquivalentPercentage
fielddef.descr: Declared cash-equivalent dividend percentage. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegNonCashDividendTreatment
fielddef.descr: Defines the treatment of non-cash dividends.

fielddef.name: LegDividendComposition
fielddef.descr: Defines how the composition of dividends is to be determined.

fielddef.name: LegSpecialDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether special dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: LegMaterialDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether material non-cash dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: LegOptionsExchangeDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether option exchange dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: LegAdditionalDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether additional dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: LegAllDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Represents the European Master Confirmation value of 'All Dividends' which, when applicable, signifies that, for a given Ex-Date, the daily observed share price for that day is adjusted (reduced) by the cash dividend and/or the cash value of any non-cash dividend per share (including extraordinary dividends) declared by the issuer.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFXTriggerDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the FX trigger date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFXTriggerDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFXTriggerDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFXTriggerDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFXTriggerDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted FX trigger date.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for the FX trigger date adjustment.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFXTriggerDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted FX trigger date.

fielddef.name: NoLegDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the LegDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenterGrp.

fielddef.name: LegDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's FX trigger date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegDividendPeriods
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the LegDividendPeriodGrp component.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodSequence
fielddef.descr: Defines the ordinal dividend period. E.g. 1 = First period, 2 = Second period, etc.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date on which the dividend period will begin.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date on which the dividend period will end.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodUnderlierRefID
fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.
