fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fixed strike price of the dividend period.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The dividend period dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodValuationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted dividend period valuation date.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodValuationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the dividend period valuation date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodValuationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted dividend period valuation date.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted dividend period payment date.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the dividend period payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodPaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted dividend period payment date.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier for linking this stream dividend period to an underlier through an instance of RelatedInstrumentGrp.

fielddef.name: NoLegDividendPeriodBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: The number of entries in the LegDividendPeriodBusinessCentersGrp component.

fielddef.name: LegDividendPeriodBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's dividend period date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegExtraordinaryEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of extraordinary events in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegExtraordinaryEventType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of extraordinary or disruptive event applicable to the reference entity. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Extraordinary_Event_Type for code list of extraordinary event types and values.

fielddef.name: LegExtraordinaryEventValue
fielddef.descr: The extraordinary or disruptive event value appropriate to LegExtraordinaryEventType(42389). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Extraordinary_Event_Type for code list of extraordinary event types and values.

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectingPartySide
fielddef.descr: Side value of the party electing the settlement method.

fielddef.name: LegMakeWholeDate
fielddef.descr: The date through which option cannot be exercised without penalty.

fielddef.name: LegMakeWholeAmount
fielddef.descr: Amount to be paid by the buyer of the option if the option is exercised prior to the LegMakeWholeDate(42392).

fielddef.name: LegMakeWholeBenchmarkCurveName
fielddef.descr: Identifies the benchmark floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegMakeWholeBenchmarkCurvePoint
fielddef.descr: The point on the floating rate index curve. Sample values: M = combination of a number between 1-12 and an "M" for month, e.g. 3M Y = combination of number between 1-100 and a "Y" for year, e.g. 10Y 10Y-OLD = see above, then add "-OLD" when appropriate INTERPOLATED = the point is mathematically derived 2/2031 5 3/8 = the point is stated via a combination of maturity month / year and coupon.

fielddef.name: LegMakeWholeRecallSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread over the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegMakeWholeBenchmarkQuote
fielddef.descr: The quote side of the benchmark to be used for calculating the "make whole" amount.

fielddef.name: LegMakeWholeInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the "make whole" amount. The most common is linear method.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCashSettlIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether cash settlement is applicable.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to the stream which details the compounding fixed or floating rate.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingSpread
fielddef.descr: The spread to be used for compounding. Used in scenarios where the interest payment is based on a compounding formula that uses a compounding spread in addition to the regular spread.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the index rate from multiple points on the curve. The most common is linear method.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamInterpolationPeriod
fielddef.descr: Defines applicable periods for interpolation.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingFixedRate
fielddef.descr: The compounding fixed rate applicable to the payment stream.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStreamCompoundingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDate
fielddef.descr: The compounding date. Type of date is specified in LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDateType(42407).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of payment compounding date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The compounding dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingPeriodSkip
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the "RelativeTo" schedule that are between each date in the compounding schedule. A skip of 2 would mean that compounding dates are relative to every second date in the "RelativeTo" schedule. If present this should have a value greater than 1.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency at which compounding dates occur.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency at which compounding dates occur.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of compounding dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamBoundsFirstDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first date of the compounding schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamBoundsLastDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted last date of the compounding schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stream compounding dates, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted compounding end date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted compounding end date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The payment stream's compounding floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the payment stream's compounding floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the payment stream's compounding floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the compounding floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The basis points spread from the index specified in LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndex(42427).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the compounding floating rate. It is only required where the compounding floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the compounding cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the compounding cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the compounding floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the compounding floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate. The rate is expressed as a decimal, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the compounding floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial compounding floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. The initial rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction for the compounding floating rate.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the compounding floating rate rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the averaging method when compounding floating rate averaging is applicable (e.g. weighted or unweighted).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method for calculating payment obligations when a compounding floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted compounding start date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted compounding start date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFormulaImageLength
fielddef.descr: Length in bytes of the LegPaymentStreamFormulaImage(42452) field.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFormulaImage
fielddef.descr: Image of the formula image when represented through an encoded clip in base64Binary.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted final price payment date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the final price payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted final price payment date.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStreamFixingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of fixing dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDate
fielddef.descr: The fixing date. Type of date is specified in LegPaymentStreamFixingDateType(42461).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of fixing date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted initial price observation date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the initial price observation date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the initial price observation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted initial price observation date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamUnderlierRefID
fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateNotionalReset
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the term "Equity Notional Reset" as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions is applicable ("Y") or not.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkInitialLevel
fielddef.descr: Price level at which the correlation or variance swap contract will strike.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkClosingLevelIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the correlation or variance swap contract will ("Y") strike off the closing level of the default exchange traded contract or not.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkExpiringLevelIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the correlation or variance swap contract will ("Y") strike off the expiring level of the default exchange traded contract or not.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkEstimatedTradingDays
fielddef.descr: The expected number of trading days in the variance or correlation swap stream.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: The strike price of a correlation or variance swap stream.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkStrikePriceType
fielddef.descr: For a variance swap specifies how LegPaymentStreamLinkStrikePrice(42472) is expressed.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkMaximumBoundary
fielddef.descr: Specifies the maximum or upper boundary for variance or strike determination. For a variation swap stream all observations above this price level will be excluded from the variance calculation. For a correlation swap stream the maximum boundary is a percentage of the strike price.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkMinimumBoundary
fielddef.descr: Specifies the minimum or lower boundary for variance or strike determination. For a variation swap stream all observations below this price level will be excluded from the variance calculation. For a correlation swap stream the minimum boundary is a percentage of the strike price.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamLinkNumberOfDataSeries
fielddef.descr: Number of data series for a correlation swap. Normal market practice is that correlation data sets are drawn from geographic market areas, such as America, Europe and Asia Pacific. Each of these geographic areas will have its own data series to avoid contagion.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamVarianceUnadjustedCap
fielddef.descr: Indicates the scaling factor to be multiplied by the variance strike price thereby making variance cap applicable.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRealizedVarianceMethod
fielddef.descr: Indicates which price to use to satisfy the boundary condition.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamDaysAdjustmentIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the contract specifies that the notional should be scaled by the number of days in range divided by the estimate trading days or not. The number of "days in range" refers to the number of returns that contribute to the realized volatility.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamNearestExchangeContractRefID
fielddef.descr: References a contract listed on an exchange through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamVegaNotionalAmount
fielddef.descr: Vega Notional represents the approximate gain/loss at maturity for a 1% difference between RVol (realized volatility) and KVol (strike volatility). It does not necessarily represent the Vega risk of the trade.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFormulaCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency in which the formula amount is denominated. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFormulaCurrencyDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method according to which the formula amount currency is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFormulaReferenceAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the reference amount when this term either corresponds to the standard ISDA Definition (either the 2002 Equity Definition for the Equity Amount, or the 2000 Definition for the Interest Amount), or refers to a term defined elsewhere in the swap document. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Payment_Amount_Relative_To for code list of reference amounts.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStreamFormulas
fielddef.descr: Number of formulas in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFormula
fielddef.descr: Contains an XML representation of the formula. Defined for flexibility in choice of language (MathML, OpenMath or text).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamFormulaDesc
fielddef.descr: A description of the math formula in LegPaymentStreamFormula(42486).

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted stub end date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The stub end date business day convention.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the stub end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted stub end date.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStubEndDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stub end date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted stub start date.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The stub start date business day convention.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the stub start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted stub start date.

fielddef.name: NoLegPaymentStubStartDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stub start date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionBreakFeeElection
fielddef.descr: Type of fee elected for the break provision.

fielddef.name: LegProvisionBreakFeeRate
fielddef.descr: Break fee election rate when the break fee is proportional to the notional. A fee rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: NoLegReturnRateDates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate date repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateDateMode
fielddef.descr: Specifies the valuation type applicable to the return rate date.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted start date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted start date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted end date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted end date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency at which return rate valuation dates occur.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency at which return rate valuation dates occur.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationFrequencyRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of return rate valuation dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The return rate valuation dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: NoLegReturnRateFXConversions
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate FX conversion repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateFXCurrencySymbol
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency pair for the FX conversion expressed using the CCY1/CCY2 convention. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateFXRate
fielddef.descr: The rate of exchange between the two currencies specified in LegReturnRateFXCurrencySymbol(42531).

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateFXRateCalc
fielddef.descr: The rate of exchange between the two currencies specified in LegReturnRateFXCurrencySymbol(42531).

fielddef.name: NoLegReturnRates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRatePriceSequence
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of price sequence of the return rate.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateCommissionBasis
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basis or unit used to calculate the commission.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateCommissionAmount
fielddef.descr: The commission amount.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateCommissionCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the commission amount is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateTotalCommissionPerTrade
fielddef.descr: The total commission per trade.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method by which the underlier prices are determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateAmountRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the reference amount when the return rate amount is relative to another amount in the trade. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Amount_Relative_To for code list of relative amounts.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteMeasureType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of the measure applied to the return rate's asset, e.g. valuation, sensitivity risk. This could be an NPV, a cash flow, a clean price, etc. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/asset-measure for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteUnits
fielddef.descr: Specifies the units that the measure is expressed in. If not specified, the default is a price/value in currency units. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/price-quote-units for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of quote used to determine the return rate of the swap.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the return rate quote is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 Currency Code.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteCurrencyType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of currency, e.g. settlement currency, base currency, etc., that the quote is reported in. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/reporting-currency-type for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies how or the timing when the quote is to be obtained.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteTime
fielddef.descr: The time when the quote is to be generated.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteDate
fielddef.descr: The date when the quote is to be generated.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteExpirationTime
fielddef.descr: The time when the quote ceases to be valid.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for adjustments associated with LegReturnRateQuoteTimeType(42547) or LegReturnRateQuoteTime(42548) and LegReturnRateQuoteDate(42549), e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuoteExchange
fielddef.descr: Specifies the exchange (e.g. stock or listed futures/options exchange) from which the quote is obtained.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateQuotePricingModel
fielddef.descr: Specifies the pricing model used to evaluate the underlying asset price. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/pricing-model for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateCashFlowType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of cash flows, e.g. coupon payment, premium fee, settlement fee, etc. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/cashflow-type for values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the timing at which the calculation agent values the underlying.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationTime
fielddef.descr: The time at which the calculation agent values the underlying asset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for adjustments associated with LegReturnRateValuationTimeType(42555) or LegReturnRateValuationTime(42556), e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationPriceOption
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether an ISDA price option applies, and if applicable which type of price.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateFinalPriceFallback
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fallback provision for the hedging party in the determination of the final price.

fielddef.name: NoLegReturnRateInformationSources
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate information source repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateInformationSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information. For FX the references source to be used for the FX spot rate.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. For FX, the reference page to the spot rate to be used for the reference FX spot rate. When LegReturnRateInformationSource(42561) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateReferencePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: NoLegReturnRatePrices
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate price repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRatePriceBasis
fielddef.descr: The basis of the return price.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRatePrice
fielddef.descr: Specifies the price of the underlying swap asset.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRatePriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the price of the leg swap asset. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRatePriceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the LegReturnRatePrice(42566) is expressed in absolute or relative terms.

fielddef.name: NoLegReturnRateValuationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate valuation date business center repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the return rate valuation unadjusted or relative dates, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoLegReturnRateValuationDates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate valuation date repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationDate
fielddef.descr: The return rate valuation date. The type of date is specified in LegReturnRateValuationDateType(42573).

fielddef.name: LegReturnRateValuationDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of return rate valuation date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectionDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted settlement method election date.

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectionDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The settlement method election date adjustment business day convention.

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectionDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the settlement method election date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectionDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectionDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectionDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectionDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted settlement method election date.

fielddef.name: NoLegSettlMethodElectionDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: LegSettlMethodElectionDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the settlement method election unadjusted or relative date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: LegStreamVersion
fielddef.descr: The stream version identifier when there have been modifications to the contract over time. Helps signal when there are embedded changes.

fielddef.name: LegStreamVersionEffectiveDate
fielddef.descr: The effective date of the LegStreamVersion(42583).

fielddef.name: LegStreamNotionalDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method for determining the floating notional value for equity swaps. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: LegStreamNotionalAdjustments
fielddef.descr: For equity swaps this specifies the conditions that govern the adjustment to the number of units of the swap.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectingPartySide
fielddef.descr: Side value of the party electing the settlement method.

fielddef.name: MakeWholeDate
fielddef.descr: The date through which option cannot be exercised without penalty.

fielddef.name: MakeWholeAmount
fielddef.descr: Amount to be paid by the buyer of the option if the option is exercised prior to the MakeWholeDate(42591).

fielddef.name: MakeWholeBenchmarkCurveName
fielddef.descr: Identifies the benchmark floating rate index.

fielddef.name: MakeWholeBenchmarkCurvePoint
fielddef.descr: The point on the floating rate index curve. Sample values: M = combination of a number between 1-12 and an "M" for month, e.g. 3M Y = combination of number between 1-100 and a "Y" for year, e.g. 10Y 10Y-OLD = see above, then add "-OLD" when appropriate INTERPOLATED = the point is mathematically derived 2/2031 5 3/8 = the point is stated via a combination of maturity month / year and coupon.

fielddef.name: MakeWholeRecallSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread over the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: MakeWholeBenchmarkQuote
fielddef.descr: The quote side of the benchmark to be used for calculating the "make whole" amount.

fielddef.name: MakeWholeInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the "make whole" amount. The most common is linear method.

fielddef.name: PaymentAmountRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the reference amount when the payment amount is relative to another amount in the message. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Payment_Amount_Relative_To for code list of relative amounts.

fielddef.name: PaymentAmountDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method by which a payment amount is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCashSettlIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether cash settlement is applicable.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to the stream which details the compounding fixed or floating rate.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingSpread
fielddef.descr: The spread to be used for compounding. Used in scenarios where the interest payment is based on a compounding formula that uses a compounding spread in addition to the regular spread.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the index rate from multiple points on the curve. The most common is linear method.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamInterpolationPeriod
fielddef.descr: Defines applicable periods for interpolation.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingFixedRate
fielddef.descr: The compounding fixed rate applicable to the payment stream.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamCompoundingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingDate
fielddef.descr: The compounding date. The type of date is specified in PaymentStreamCompoundingDateType(42608).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of payment compounding date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The compounding dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingDatesRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding dates are relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingPeriodSkip
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the "RelativeTo" schedule that are between each date in the compounding schedule. A skip of 2 would mean that compounding dates are relative to every second date in the "RelativeTo" schedule. If present this should have a value greater than 1.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency at which compounding dates occur.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency at which compounding dates occur.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of compounding dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamBoundsFirstDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first date of the compounding schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamBoundsLastDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted last date of the compounding schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stream compounding dates, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted compounding end date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted compounding end date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The payment stream's compounding floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the payment stream's compounding floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the payment stream's compounding floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the compounding floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The basis points spread from the index specified in PaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndex(42628).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the compounding floating rate. It is only required where the compounding floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the compounding cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the compounding cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the compounding floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the compounding floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate. The rate is expressed as a decimal, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the compounding floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial compounding floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. The initial rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction for the compounding floating rate.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the compounding floating rate rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the averaging method when compounding floating rate averaging is applicable (e.g. weighted or unweighted).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method for calculating payment obligations when a compounding floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted compounding start date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted compounding start date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFormulaImageLength
fielddef.descr: Length in bytes of the PaymentStreamFormulaImage(42563) field.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFormulaImage
fielddef.descr: Image of the formula image when represented through an encoded clip in base64Binary.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted final price payment date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the final price payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetfPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted final price payment date.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamFixingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of fixing dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDate
fielddef.descr: The fixing date. The type of date is specified in PaymentStreamFixingDateType(42662).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFixingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of fixing date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFirstObservationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted initial price observation date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFirstObservationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the initial price observation date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the initial price observation date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFirstObservationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted initial price observation date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamUnderlierRefID
fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateNotionalReset
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the term "Equity Notional Reset" as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions is applicable ("Y") or not.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkInitialLevel
fielddef.descr: Price level at which the correlation or variance swap contract will strike.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkClosingLevelIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the correlation or variance swap contract will ("Y") strike off the closing level of the default exchange traded contract or not.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkExpiringLevelIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the correlation or variance swap contract will ("Y") strike off the expiring level of the default exchange traded contract or not.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkEstimatedTradingDays
fielddef.descr: The expected number of trading days in the variance or correlation swap stream.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: The strike price of a correlation or variance swap stream.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkStrikePriceType
fielddef.descr: For a variance swap specifies how PaymentStreamLinkStrikePrice(42673) is expressed.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkMaximumBoundary
fielddef.descr: Specifies the maximum or upper boundary for variance or strike determination. For a variation swap stream all observations above this price level will be excluded from the variance calculation. For a correlation swap stream the maximum boundary is a percentage of the strike price.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkMinimumBoundary
fielddef.descr: Specifies the minimum or lower boundary for variance or strike determination. For a variation swap stream all observations below this price level will be excluded from the variance calculation. For a correlation swap stream the minimum boundary is a percentage of the strike price.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamLinkNumberOfDataSeries
fielddef.descr: Number of data series for a correlation swap. Normal market practice is that correlation data sets are drawn from geographic market areas, such as America, Europe and Asia Pacific. Each of these geographic areas will have its own data series to avoid contagion.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamVarianceUnadjustedCap
fielddef.descr: Indicates the scaling factor to be multiplied by the variance strike price thereby making variance cap applicable.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRealizedVarianceMethod
fielddef.descr: Indicates which price to use to satisfy the boundary condition.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamDaysAdjustmentIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the contract specifies that the notional should be scaled by the number of days in range divided by the estimate trading days or not. The number of "days in range" refers to the number of returns that contribute to the realized volatility.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamNearestExchangeContractRefID
fielddef.descr: References a contract listed on an exchange through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamVegaNotionalAmount
fielddef.descr: "Vega Notional" represents the approximate gain/loss at maturity for a 1% difference between RVol (realised volatility) and KVol (strike volatility). It does not necessarily represent the Vega risk of the trade.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStreamFormulas
fielddef.descr: Number of formulas in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFormula
fielddef.descr: Contains an XML representation of the formula. Defined for flexibility in choice of language (MathML, OpenMath or text).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFormulaDesc
fielddef.descr: A description of the math formula in PaymentStreamFormula(42684).

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFormulaCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency in which the formula amount is denominated. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFormulaCurrencyDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method according to which the formula amount currency is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamFormulaReferenceAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the reference amount when this term either corresponds to the standard ISDA Definition (either the 2002 Equity Definition for the Equity Amount, or the 2000 Definition for the Interest Amount), or refers to a term defined elsewhere in the swap document. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Payment_Amount_Relative_To for code list of reference amounts.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted stub end date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubEndDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The stub end date business day convention.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the stub end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted stub end date.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStubEndDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubEndDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stub end date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted stub start date.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubStartDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The stub start date business day convention.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the stub start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted stub start date.

fielddef.name: NoPaymentStubStartDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PaymentStubStartDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stub start date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: ProvisionBreakFeeElection
fielddef.descr: Type of fee elected for the break provision.

fielddef.name: ProvisionBreakFeeRate
fielddef.descr: Break fee election rate when the break fee is proportional to the notional. A fee rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: RelatedToDividendPeriodXIDRef
fielddef.descr: The DividendPeriodXID(42293) of the stream dividend period with which the related instrument has correlation.

fielddef.name: NoReturnRateDates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate date repeating group.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateDateMode
fielddef.descr: Specifies the valuation type applicable to the return rate date.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation dates are relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted start date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted start date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted end date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted end date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency at which return rate valuation dates occur.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency at which return rate valuation dates occur.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationFrequencyRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of return rate valuation dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The return rate valuation dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: NoReturnRateFXConversions
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate FX conversion repeating group.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateFXCurrencySymbol
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency pair for the FX conversion expressed using the CCY1/CCY2 convention. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateFXRate
fielddef.descr: The rate of exchange between the two currencies specified in ReturnRateFXCurrencySymbol(42732).

fielddef.name: ReturnRateFXRateCalc
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether ReturnRateFXRate(42733) should be multiplied or divided.

fielddef.name: NoReturnRates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate repeating group.

fielddef.name: ReturnRatePriceSequence
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of price sequence of the return rate.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateCommissionBasis
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basis or unit used to calculate the commission.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateCommissionAmount
fielddef.descr: The commission amount.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateCommissionCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the commission amount is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateTotalCommissionPerTrade
fielddef.descr: The total commission per trade.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method by which the underlier prices are determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateAmountRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the reference amount when the return rate amount is relative to another amount in the trade. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Payment_Amount_Relative_To for code list of relative amounts.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteMeasureType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of the measure applied to the return rate's asset, e.g. valuation, sensitivity risk. This could be an NPV, a cash flow, a clean price, etc. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/asset-measure for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteUnits
fielddef.descr: Specifies the units that the measure is expressed in. If not specified, the default is a price/value in currency units. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/price-quote-units for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of quote used to determine the return rate of the swap.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the return rate quote is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 Currency Code.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteCurrencyType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of currency, e.g. settlement currency, base currency, etc., that the quote is reported in. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/reporting-currency-type for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteTimeType
fielddef.item: As specified in the master confirmation
fielddef.descr: Specifies how or the timing when the quote is to be obtained.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteTime
fielddef.descr: The time when the quote is to be generated.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteDate
fielddef.descr: The date when the quote is to be generated.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteExpirationTime
fielddef.descr: The time when the quote ceases to be valid.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for adjustments associated with ReturnRateQuoteTimeType(42748) or ReturnRateQuoteTime(42749) and ReturnRateQuoteDate(42750), e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuoteExchange
fielddef.descr: Specifies the exchange (e.g. stock or listed futures/options exchange) from which the quote is obtained.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateQuotePricingModel
fielddef.descr: Specifies the pricing model used to evaluate the underlying asset price. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/pricing-model for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateCashFlowType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of cash flows, e.g. coupon payment, premium fee, settlement fee, etc. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/cashflow-type for values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the timing at which the calculation agent values the underlying.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationTime
fielddef.descr: The time at which the calculation agent values the underlying asset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for adjustments associated with ReturnRateValuationTimeType(42756) or ReturnRateValuationTime(42757), e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationPriceOption
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether an ISDA price option applies, and if applicable which type of price.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateFinalPriceFallback
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fallback provision for the hedging party in the determination of the final price.

fielddef.name: NoReturnRateInformationSources
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate information source repeating group.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateInformationSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information. For FX the references source to be used for the FX spot rate.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. For FX, the reference page to the spot rate to be used for the reference FX spot rate. When ReturnRateInformationSource(42762) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: ReturnRateReferencePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: NoReturnRatePrices
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate price repeating group.

fielddef.name: ReturnRatePriceBasis
fielddef.descr: The basis of the return price.

fielddef.name: ReturnRatePrice
fielddef.descr: Specifies the price of the underlying swap asset.

fielddef.name: ReturnRatePriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the price of the underlying swap asset. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: ReturnRatePriceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the ReturnRatePrice(42767) is expressed in absolute or relative terms.

fielddef.name: NoReturnRateValuationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate valuation date business center repeating group.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the return rate valuation unadjusted or relative dates, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoReturnRateValuationDates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate valuation date repeating group.

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationDate
fielddef.descr: The return rate valuation date. Type of date is specified in ReturnRateValuationDateType(42774).

fielddef.name: ReturnRateValuationDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of return rate valuation date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: NoSettlMethodElectionDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectionDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the settlement method election unadjusted or relative date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectionDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted settlement method election date.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectionDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The settlement method election date adjustment business day convention.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectionDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the settlement method election date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectionDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectionDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectionDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: SettlMethodElectionDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted settlement method election date.

fielddef.name: StreamVersion
fielddef.descr: The stream version identifier when there have been modifications to the contract over time. Helps signal when there are embedded changes.

fielddef.name: StreamVersionEffectiveDate
fielddef.descr: The effective date of the StreamVersion(42784).

fielddef.name: StreamNotionalDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method for determining the floating notional value for equity swaps. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: StreamNotionalAdjustments
fielddef.descr: For equity swaps this specifies the conditions that govern the adjustment to the number of units of the swap.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingCashSettlDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the cash settlement unadjusted or relative date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted cash settlement date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used to adjust the cash settlement provision's date. Used only to override the business day convention defined in the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the cash settlement date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative cash settlement date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted cash settlement date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlPriceSource
fielddef.descr: The source from which the settlement price is to be obtained. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-price-source for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingCashSettlPriceDefault
fielddef.descr: The default election for determining settlement price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventFuturesPriceValuation
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the official settlement price as announced by the related exchange is applicable, in accordance with the ISDA 2002 definitions. Applicable only to futures contracts.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventOptionsPriceValuation
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the official settlement price as announced by the related exchange is applicable, in accordance with the ISDA 2002 definitions. Applicable only to options contracts.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingComplexEventPVFinalPriceElectionFallback
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fallback provisions for the hedging party in the determination of the final settlement price

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenterGrp.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's dividend accrual payment date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloatingRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The dividend accrual floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloatingRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the dividend accrual floating rate index curve.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloatingRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the dividend accrual floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloatingRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the contract.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloatingRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The basis points spread from the index specified in UnderlyingDividendFloatingRateIndex(42801).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloatingRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloatingRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. It is only required where the floating rate is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the floating rate is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate. The rate is expressed as a decimal, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. This is assumed to be the first required reset rate for the first regular calculation period. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. The initial rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction of the final rate.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding precision of the final rate in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: When averaging is applicable, used to specify whether a weighted or unweighted average method of calculation is to be used.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: The specification of any provisions for calculating payment obligations when a floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the accrual payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative accrual payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted accrual payment date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: Accrual payment date adjustment business day convention.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualPaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted accrual payment date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendReinvestmentIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the dividend will be reinvested.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendEntitlementEvent
fielddef.descr: Defines the contract event which the receiver of the derivative is entitled to the dividend.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAmountType
fielddef.descr: Indicates how the gross cash dividend amount per share is determined.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendUnderlierRefID
