fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in a separate instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExtraordinaryDividendPartySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the party through its side in the trade who makes the determination whether dividends are extraordinary in relation to normal levels.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExtraordinaryDividendAmountType
fielddef.descr: Indicates how the extraordinary gross cash dividend per share is determined.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExtraordinaryDividendCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency in which the excess dividend is denominated. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExtraordinaryDividendDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method in which the excess amount is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccrualFixedRate
fielddef.descr: The dividend accrual fixed rate per annum expressed as a decimal. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendCompoundingMethod
fielddef.descr: The compounding method to be used when more than one dividend period contributes to a single payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendNumOfIndexUnits
fielddef.descr: The number of index units applicable to dividends.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendCashPercentage
fielddef.descr: Declared cash dividend percentage. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendCashEquivalentPercentage
fielddef.descr: Declared cash-equivalent dividend percentage. A value of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingNonCashDividendTreatment
fielddef.descr: Defines the treatment of non-cash dividends.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendComposition
fielddef.descr: Defines how the composition of dividends is to be determined.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSpecialDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether special dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMaterialDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether material non-cash dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOptionsExchangeDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether option exchange dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAdditionalDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether additional dividends are applicable.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAllDividendsIndicator
fielddef.descr: Represents the European Master Confirmation value of 'All Dividends' which, when applicable, signifies that, for a given Ex-Date, the daily observed share price for that day is adjusted (reduced) by the cash dividend and/or the cash value of any non-cash dividend per share (including extraordinary dividends) declared by the issuer.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the FX trigger date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative FX trigger date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted FX trigger date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The business day convention used for the FX trigger date adjustment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted FX trigger date.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenterGrp.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendFXTriggerDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's FX trigger date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDividendPayments
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPaymentDate
fielddef.descr: Specifies the date that the dividend or coupon payment is due.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPaymentAmount
fielddef.descr: The amount of the dividend or coupon payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPaymentCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the UnderlyingDividendPaymentAmount(42857) is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendAccruedInterest
fielddef.descr: Accrued interest on the dividend or coupon payment.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPayoutRatio
fielddef.descr: Specifies the actual dividend payout ratio associated with the equity or bond underlier.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPayoutConditions
fielddef.descr: Specifies the dividend payout conditions that will be applied in the case where the actual ratio is not known, typically because of regulatory or legal uncertainties.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDividendPeriods
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the UnderlyingDividendPeriodGrp component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodSequence
fielddef.descr: Defines the ordinal dividend period. E.g. 1 = First period, 2 = Second period, etc.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date on which the dividend period will begin.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted date on which the dividend period will end.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodUnderlierRefID
fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fixed strike price of the dividend period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The dividend period dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodValuationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted dividend period valuation date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodValuationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the dividend period valuation date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodValuationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative dividend period valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodValuationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted dividend period valuation date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodPaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted dividend period payment date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodPaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the dividend period payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodPaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative dividend period payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodPaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted dividend period payment date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier for linking this stream dividend period to an underlier through an instance of RelatedInstrumentGrp.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingDividendPeriodBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in UnderlyingDividendPeriodBusinessCenterGrp.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDividendPeriodBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the instrument's dividend period date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingExtraordinaryEvents
fielddef.descr: Number of extraordinary events in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExtraordinaryEventType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of extraordinary or disruptive event applicable to UnderlyingExtraordinaryEventType(42885). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Extraordinary_Event_Type for code list of extraordinary event types and values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExtraordinaryEventValue
fielddef.descr: The extraordinary or disruptive event value appropriate to UnderlyingExtraordinaryEventType(42885). See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Extraordinary_Event_Type for code list of extraordinary event types and values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingNotional
fielddef.descr: Notional value for the equity or bond underlier.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingNotionalCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency denomination of the notional value. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingNotionalDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method of determining the notional amount. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingNotionalAdjustments
fielddef.descr: Specifies the conditions that govern the adjustment to the number of units of the return swap.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingNotionalXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Cross reference to another notional amount for duplicating its properties.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingFutureID
fielddef.descr: In the case of an index underlier specifies the unique identifier for the referenced futures contract.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingFutureIDSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of the UnderlyingFutureID(2620).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStrikeIndexCurvePoint
fielddef.descr: The point on the floating rate index curve. Sample values: M = combination of a number between 1-12 and an "M" for month, e.g. 3M Y = combination of number between 1-100 and a "Y" for year, e.g. 10Y 10Y-OLD = see above, then add "-OLD" when appropriate INTERPOLATED = the point is mathematically derived 2/2031 5 3/8 = the point is stated via a combination of maturity month / year and coupon.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStrikeIndexQuote
fielddef.descr: The quote side from which the index price is to be determined.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExtraordinaryEventAdjustmentMethod
fielddef.descr: Defines how adjustments will be made to the contract should one or more of the extraordinary events occur.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingExchangeLookAlike
fielddef.descr: For a share option trade, indicates whether the instrument is to be treated as an 'exchange look-alike'.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAverageVolumeLimitationPercentage
fielddef.descr: The limit of average percentage of individual securities traded in a day or a number of days.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAverageVolumeLimitationPeriodDays
fielddef.descr: Specifies the limitation period for average daily trading volume in number of days.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDepositoryReceiptIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the underlier is a depository receipt.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingOpenUnits
fielddef.descr: The number of units (units of the index or number of securities, par amount of a bond) that constitute the underlier. In the case of a basket swap, this is used to reference both the number of basket units, and the number of each asset components of the basket when these are expressed in absolute terms.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingBasketDivisor
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basket divisor amount. This value is normally used to adjust the constituent weight for pricing or to adjust for dividends, or other corporate actions.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingInstrumentXID
fielddef.descr: Identifier for referencing this UnderlyingInstrument from a parent instrument or a convertible instrument.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectingPartySide
fielddef.descr: Side value of the party electing the settlement method.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMakeWholeDate
fielddef.descr: The date through which the option cannot be exercised without penalty.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMakeWholeAmount
fielddef.descr: Amount to be paid by the buyer of the option if the option is exercised prior to the UnderlyingMakeWholeDate(42888).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMakeWholeBenchmarkCurveName
fielddef.descr: Identifies the benchmark floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMakeWholeBenchmarkCurvePoint
fielddef.descr: The point on the floating rate index curve. Sample values: M = combination of a number between 1-12 and an "M" for month, e.g. 3M Y = combination of number between 1-100 and a "Y" for year, e.g. 10Y 10Y-OLD = see above, then add "-OLD" when appropriate INTERPOLATED = the point is mathematically derived 2/2031 5 3/8 = the point is stated via a combination of maturity month / year and coupon.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMakeWholeRecallSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread over the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMakeWholeBenchmarkQuote
fielddef.descr: The quote side of the benchmark to be used for calculating the "make whole" amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingMakeWholeInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the "make whole" amount. The most common is linear method.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCashSettlIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether cash settlement is applicable.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingXIDRef
fielddef.descr: Reference to the stream which details the compounding fixed or floating rate.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingSpread
fielddef.descr: The spread to be used for compounding. Used in scenarios where the interest payment is based on a compounding formula that uses a compounding spread in addition to the regular spread.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInterpolationMethod
fielddef.descr: The method used when calculating the index rate from multiple points on the curve. The most common is linear method.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamInterpolationPeriod
fielddef.descr: Defines applicable periods for interpolation.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingFixedRate
fielddef.descr: The compounding fixed rate applicable to the payment stream.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDate
fielddef.descr: The compounding date. Type of date is specified in UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDateType(42903).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of payment compounding date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The compounding dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding dates are relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingPeriodSkip
fielddef.descr: The number of periods in the "RelativeTo" schedule that are between each date in the compounding schedule. A skip of 2 would mean that compounding dates are relative to every second date in the "RelativeTo" schedule. If present this should have a value greater than 1.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency at which compounding dates occur.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency at which compounding dates occur.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of compounding dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamBoundsFirstDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted first date of the compounding schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamBoundsLastDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted last date of the compounding schedule. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingDatesBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stream compounding dates, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted compounding end date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted compounding end date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndex
fielddef.descr: The payment stream's compounding floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the payment stream's compounding floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the payment stream's compounding floating rate index curve period.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRateMultiplier
fielddef.descr: A rate multiplier to apply to the compounding floating rate. The multiplier can be less than or greater than 1 (one). This should only be included if the multiplier is not equal to 1 (one) for the term of the stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRateSpread
fielddef.descr: The basis points spread from the index specified in UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRateIndex(42923).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRateSpreadPositionType
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the rate spread is applied to a long or short position.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the yield calculation treatment for the index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingCapRate
fielddef.descr: The cap rate, if any, which applies to the compounding floating rate. It is only required where the compounding floating rate on a swap stream is capped at a certain level. The cap rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A cap rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingCapRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the compounding cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingCapRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the compounding cap rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRate
fielddef.descr: The floor rate, if any, which applies to the compounding floating rate. The floor rate (strike) is only required where the compounding floating rate on a swap stream is floored at a certain strike level. The floor rate is assumed to be exclusive of any spread and is a per annum rate. The rate is expressed as a decimal, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRateBuySide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the buyer of the compounding floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingFloorRateSellSide
fielddef.descr: Reference to the seller of the floor rate option through its trade side.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingInitialRate
fielddef.descr: The initial compounding floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. It should only be included when the rate is not equal to the rate published on the source implied by the floating rate index. The initial rate is expressed in decimal form, e.g. 5% is represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingFinalRateRoundingDirection
fielddef.descr: Specifies the rounding direction for the compounding floating rate.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingFinalRatePrecision
fielddef.descr: Specifies the compounding floating rate rounding precision in terms of a number of decimal places. Note how a percentage rate rounding of 5 decimal places is expressed as a rounding precision of 7.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingAveragingMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the averaging method when compounding floating rate averaging is applicable (e.g. weighted or unweighted).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingNegativeRateTreatment
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method for calculating payment obligations when a compounding floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted compounding start date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the compounding start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative compounding start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamCompoundingStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted compounding start date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormulaImageLength
fielddef.descr: Length in bytes of the UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormulaImage(42948) field.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormulaImage
fielddef.descr: Image of the formula image when represented through an encoded clip in base64Binary.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted final price payment date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the final price payment date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative final price payment date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted final price payment date.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDates
fielddef.descr: Number of fixing dates in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDate
fielddef.descr: The fixing date. Type of date is specified in UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateType(42957).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFixingDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of fixing date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted initial price observation date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the initial price observation date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the initial price observation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFirstObservationDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted initial price observation date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamUnderlierRefID
fielddef.descr: References the dividend underlier through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateNotionalReset
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the term "Equity Notional Reset" as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions is applicable ("Y") or not.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkInitialLevel
fielddef.descr: Price level at which the correlation or variance swap contract will strike.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkClosingLevelIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the correlation or variance swap contract will ("Y") strike off the closing level of the default exchange traded contract or not.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkExpiringLevelIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the correlation or variance swap contract will ("Y") strike off the expiring level of the default exchange traded contract or not.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkEstimatedTradingDays
fielddef.descr: The expected number of trading days in the variance or correlation swap stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkStrikePrice
fielddef.descr: The strike price of a correlation or variance swap stream.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkStrikePriceType
fielddef.descr: For a variance swap specifies how UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkStrikePrice(42968) is expressed.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkMaximumBoundary
fielddef.descr: Specifies the maximum or upper boundary for variance or strike determination. For a variation swap stream all observations above this price level will be excluded from the variance calculation. For a correlation swap stream the maximum boundary is a percentage of the strike price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkMinimumBoundary
fielddef.descr: Specifies the minimum or lower boundary for variance or strike determination. For a variation swap stream all observations below this price level will be excluded from the variance calculation. For a correlation swap stream the minimum boundary is a percentage of the strike price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamLinkNumberOfDataSeries
fielddef.descr: Number of data series for a correlation swap. Normal market practice is that correlation data sets are drawn from geographic market areas, such as America, Europe and Asia Pacific. Each of these geographic areas will have its own data series to avoid contagion.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamVarianceUnadjustedCap
fielddef.descr: Indicates the scaling factor to be multiplied by the variance strike price thereby making variance cap applicable.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRealizedVarianceMethod
fielddef.descr: Indicates which price to use to satisfy the boundary condition.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamDaysAdjustmentIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the contract specifies that the notional should be scaled by the number of days in range divided by the estimate trading days or not. The number of "days in range" refers to the number of returns that contribute to the realized volatility.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamNearestExchangeContractRefID
fielddef.descr: References a contract listed on an exchange through the instrument's UnderlyingSecurityID(309) which must be fully specified in an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamVegaNotionalAmount
fielddef.descr: Vega Notional represents the approximate gain/loss at maturity for a 1% difference between RVol (realised volatility) and KVol (strike volatility). It does not necessarily represent the Vega risk of the trade.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormulaCurrency
fielddef.descr: The currency in which the formula amount is denominated. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormulaCurrencyDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method according to which the formula amount currency is determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormulaReferenceAmount
fielddef.descr: Specifies the reference amount when this term either corresponds to the standard ISDA Definition (either the 2002 Equity Definition for the Equity Amount, or the 2000 Definition for the Interest Amount), or refers to a term defined elsewhere in the swap document. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Payment_Amount_Relative_To for code list of reference amounts.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStreamFormulas
fielddef.descr: Number of formulas in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormula
fielddef.descr: Contains an XML representation of the formula. Defined for flexibility in choice of language (MathML, OpenMath or text).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormulaDesc
fielddef.descr: A description of the math formula in UnderlyingPaymentStreamFormula(42982).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted stub end date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The stub end date business day convention.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the stub end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative stub end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted stub end date.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubEndDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stub end date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted stub start date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The stub start date business day convention.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the stub start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative stub start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted stub start date.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStubStartDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the payment stub start date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionBreakFeeElection
fielddef.descr: Type of fee elected for the break provision.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingProvisionBreakFeeRate
fielddef.descr: Break fee election rate when the break fee is proportional to the notional. A fee rate of 5% would be represented as "0.05".

fielddef.name: UnderlyingRateSpreadInitialValue
fielddef.descr: Specifies the initial rate spread for a basket underlier.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingRateSpreadSteps
fielddef.descr: Number of entries in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingRateSpreadStepDate
fielddef.descr: The date that the rate spread step takes affect.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingRateSpreadStepValue
fielddef.descr: The the value of the new rate spread as of the UnderlyingRateSpreadStepDate(43006).

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingReturnRateDates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate date repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateDateMode
fielddef.descr: Specifies the valuation type applicable to the return rate date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation dates are relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationStartDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted start date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationStartDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation start date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationStartDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation start date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationStartDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted start date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationEndDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted end date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationEndDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the return rate valuation end date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationEndDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative return rate valuation end date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationEndDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted end date for return rate valuation. This can be used to restrict the range of dates when they are relative.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationFrequencyPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the frequency at which return rate valuation dates occur.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationFrequencyUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the frequency at which return rate valuation dates occur.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationFrequencyRollConvention
fielddef.descr: The convention for determining the sequence of return rate valuation dates. It is used in conjunction with a specified frequency.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The return rate valuation dates business day convention.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingReturnRateFXConversions
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate FX conversion repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateFXCurrencySymbol
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency pair for the FX conversion expressed using the CCY1/CCY2 convention. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateFXRate
fielddef.descr: The rate of exchange between the two currencies specified in UnderlyingReturnRateFXCurrencySymbol(43031).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateFXRateCalc
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether UnderlyingReturnRateFXRate(43032) should be multiplied or divided.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingReturnRates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRatePriceSequence
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of price sequence of the return rate.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateCommissionBasis
fielddef.descr: Specifies the basis or unit used to calculate the commission.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateCommissionAmount
fielddef.descr: The commission amount.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateCommissionCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the commission amount is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateTotalCommissionPerTrade
fielddef.descr: The total commission per trade.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method by which the underlier prices are determined. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateAmountRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the reference amount when the return rate amount is relative to another amount in the trade. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Payment_Amount_Relative_To for code list of relative amounts.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteMeasureType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of the measure applied to the return rate's asset, e.g. valuation, sensitivity risk. This could be an NPV, a cash flow, a clean price, etc. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/asset-measure for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteUnits
fielddef.descr: Specifies the units that the measure is expressed in. If not specified, the default is a price/value in currency units. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/price-quote-units for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of quote used to determine the return rate of the swap.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency the return rate quote is denominated in. Uses ISO 4217 Currency Code.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteCurrencyType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of currency, e.g. settlement currency, base currency, etc., that the quote is reported in. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/reporting-currency-type for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies how or the timing when the quote is to be obtained.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteTime
fielddef.descr: The time when the quote is to be generated.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteDate
fielddef.descr: The date when the quote is to be generated.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteExpirationTime
fielddef.descr: The time when the quote ceases to be valid.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for adjustments associated with UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteTimeType(43047) or UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteTime(43048) and UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteDate(43049), e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuoteExchange
fielddef.descr: Specifies the exchange (e.g. stock or listed futures/options exchange) from which the quote is obtained.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateQuotePricingModel
fielddef.descr: Specifies the pricing model used to evaluate the underlying asset price. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/pricing-model for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateCashFlowType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of cash flows, e.g. coupon payment, premium fee, settlement fee, etc. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/cashflow-type for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationTimeType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the timing at which the calculation agent values the underlying.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationTime
fielddef.descr: The time at which the calculation agent values the underlying asset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationTimeBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for adjustments associated with UnderlyingReturnRateValuationTimeType(43055) or UnderlyingReturnRateValuationTime(43056) , e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationPriceOption
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether an ISDA price option applies, and if applicable which type of price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateFinalPriceFallback
fielddef.descr: Specifies the fallback provision for the hedging party in the determination of the final price.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingReturnRateInformationSources
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate information source repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateInformationSource
fielddef.descr: Identifies the source of rate information. For FX the references source to be used for the FX spot rate.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateReferencePage
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reference "page" from the rate source. For FX, the reference page to the spot rate to be used for the reference FX spot rate. When UnderlyingReturnRateInformationSource(43061) = 3 (ISDA Settlement Rate Option) this contains the value from the scheme that reflects the terms of the Annex A to the ISDA 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions. See: http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/settlement-rate-option

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateReferencePageHeading
fielddef.descr: Identifies the page heading from the rate source.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingReturnRatePrices
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate price repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRatePriceBasis
fielddef.descr: The basis of the return price.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRatePrice
fielddef.descr: Specifies the price of the underlying swap asset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRatePriceCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the price of the underlying swap asset. Uses ISO 4217 currency codes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRatePriceType
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether the UnderlyingReturnRatePrice(43066) is expressed in absolute or relative terms.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate valuation date business center repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the return rate valuation unadjusted or relative dates, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingReturnRateValuationDates
fielddef.descr: Number of iterations in the return rate valuation date repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDate
fielddef.descr: The return rate valuation date. Type of date is specified in UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateType(43073).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnRateValuationDateType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of return rate valuation date (e.g. adjusted for holidays).

fielddef.name: NoUnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateBusinessCenters
fielddef.descr: Number of business centers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateBusinessCenter
fielddef.descr: The business center calendar used for date adjustment of the settlement method election unadjusted or relative date, e.g. "GBLO". See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/business-center for standard 4-character code values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateUnadjusted
fielddef.descr: The unadjusted settlement method election date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateBusinessDayConvention
fielddef.descr: The settlement method election date adjustment business day convention.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateRelativeTo
fielddef.descr: Specifies the anchor date when the settlement method election date is relative to an anchor date. See http://www.fixtradingcommunity.org/codelists#Relative_To_Date for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateOffsetPeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateOffsetUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateOffsetDayType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the day type of the relative settlement method election date offset.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSettlMethodElectionDateAdjusted
fielddef.descr: The adjusted settlement method election date.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamVersion
fielddef.descr: The stream version identifier when there have been modifications to the contract over time. Helps signal when there are embedded changes.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamVersionEffectiveDate
fielddef.descr: The effective date of the UnderlyingStreamVersion(43083).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamNotionalDeterminationMethod
fielddef.descr: Specifies the method for determining the floating notional value for equity swaps. See http://www.fpml.org/coding-scheme/determination-method for values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingStreamNotionalAdjustments
fielddef.descr: For equity swaps this specifies the conditions that govern the adjustment to the number of units of the swap.

fielddef.name: RemunerationIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the trade price was adjusted for compensation (i.e. includes a mark-up, mark-down or commission) in the price paid.

fielddef.name: CompressionGroupID
fielddef.descr: Use to identify a netting or compression group where trades in the group were netted or compressed. This includes both terminating trades and any remnant trades that result from the operation.

fielddef.name: SelfMatchPreventionID
fielddef.descr: Identifies an order or trade that should not be matched to an opposite order or trade if both buy and sell orders for the same asset contain the same SelfMatchPreventionID(2362) and submitted by the same firm.

fielddef.name: PartyRiskLimitStatus
fielddef.descr: The status of risk limits for a party.

fielddef.name: TradeConfirmationReferenceID
fielddef.descr: A reference or control identifier or number used as a trade confirmation key.

fielddef.name: AlgorithmicTradeIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates that the order or trade originates from a computer program or algorithm requiring little-to-no human intervention.

fielddef.name: NoTrdRegPublications
fielddef.descr: Number of regulatory publication rules in repeating group.

fielddef.name: TrdRegPublicationType
fielddef.descr: Specifies the type of regulatory trade publication. Additional reasons for the publication type may be specified in TrdRegPublicationReason(2670).

fielddef.name: TrdRegPublicationReason
fielddef.item: No preceding order in book as transaction price set within average spread of a liquid instrument
No preceding order in book as transaction price depends on system-set reference price for an illiquid instrument
No preceding order in book as transaction price is for transaction subject to conditions other than current market price
No public price for preceding order as public reference price was used for matching orders
No public price quoted as instrument is illiquid
No public price quoted due to "Size"
No public price and/or size quoted as transaction is "large in scale"
No public price and/or size quoted due to order being hidden
Exempted due to securities financing transaction
Exempted due to European System of Central Banks (ESCB) policy transaction
fielddef.descr: Additional reason for trade publication type specified in TrdRegPublicationType(2669). Reasons may be specific to regulatory trade publication rules.
fielddef.item: Exception due to report by paper
Exception due to trade with non-reporting party

fielddef.name: LegDifferentialPrice
fielddef.descr: Used in pricing a group of individual Trade at Settlement (TAS) and Trade At Marker (TAM) contracts as an atomic unit. The value is the negotiated currency offset either at settlement (TAS) or at the time specified in the product definition (TAM). The final contract price is reported in LegLastPx(637).

fielddef.name: CrossedIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates whether the order or quote was crossed with another order or quote having the same context, e.g. having accounts with a common ownership.

fielddef.name: NoOrderAttributes
fielddef.descr: Number of order attribute entries.

fielddef.name: OrderAttributeType
fielddef.item: All executions for the order are to be submitted to an APA
fielddef.descr: The type of order attribute.
fielddef.item: Subject to EU share trading obligation (STO)
Subject to UK share trading obligation (STO)

fielddef.name: OrderAttributeValue
fielddef.descr: The value associated with the order attribute type specified in OrderAttributeType(2594).

fielddef.name: TradeReportingIndicator
fielddef.item: Trade has been or will be reported by a trading venue as an "on-book" trade
Trade has been or will be reported as a "systematic internaliser" seller trade
Trade has been or will be reported as a "systematic internaliser" buyer trade
Trade has been or will be reported as a "non-systematic internaliser" seller trade
Trade has been or will be reported under a sub-delegation arrangement by an investment firm to a reporting facility (e.g. APA) on behalf of another investment firm
Trade has been or will be reported
Trade has been or will be reported as a "non-Systematic Internaliser" buyer trade
Trade has been or will be reported by a trading venue as an "off-book" trade
fielddef.descr: Used between parties to convey trade reporting status.

fielddef.name: SideTradeReportingIndicator
fielddef.item: Trade has been reported by a trading venue as an "on-book" trade
Trade has been reported as a "systematic internaliser" seller trade
Trade has been reported as a "systematic internaliser" buyer trade
Trade has been reported as a "non-systematic internaliser" seller trade
Trade has been reported under a sub-delegation arrangement by an investment firm to a reporting facility (e.g. APA) on behalf of another investment firm
Trade has been or will be reported
Trade has been or will be reported as a "non-Systematic Internaliser" buyer trade
Trade has been or will be reported by a trading venue as an "off-book" trade
fielddef.descr: Used between parties to convey trade reporting status.

fielddef.name: CrossRequestID
fielddef.descr: Unique message identifier for a cross request as assigned by the submitter of the request.

fielddef.name: FillMatchID
fielddef.descr: Identifier assigned by a matching system to a match event containing multiple executions.

fielddef.name: FillMatchSubID
fielddef.descr: Identifier assigned by a matching system to a price level (e.g. match step, clip) within a match event containing multiple executions.

fielddef.name: MassActionReason
fielddef.descr: Reason for submission of mass action.

fielddef.name: MaximumPriceDeviation
fielddef.descr: Maximum deviation, in percentage terms, of an execution price from a reference price, e.g. the initial price of a match event.

fielddef.name: NotAffectedReason
fielddef.descr: Reason for order being unaffected by mass action even though it belongs to the orders covered by MassActionScope(1374).

fielddef.name: TotalNotAffectedOrders
fielddef.descr: Total number of orders unaffected by either the OrderMassActionRequest(35=CA) or OrderMassCancelRequest(35=Q).

fielddef.name: OrderOwnershipIndicator
fielddef.item: Change of ownership to executing party
Change of ownership to entering party
Change of ownership to specified party
fielddef.descr: Change of ownership of an order to a specific party.

fielddef.name: LegAccount
fielddef.descr: Account mnemonic as agreed between buy and sell sides, e.g. broker and institution or investor/intermediary and fund manager.

fielddef.name: InTheMoneyCondition
fielddef.descr: Specifies an option instrument's "in the money" condition.

fielddef.name: LegInTheMoneyCondition
fielddef.descr: Specifies an option instrument's "in the money" condition in general terms.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingInTheMoneyCondition
fielddef.descr: Specifies an option instrument's "in the money" condition in general terms.

fielddef.name: DerivativeInTheMoneyCondition
fielddef.descr: Specifies an option instrument's "in the money" condition in general terms.

fielddef.name: ContraryInstructionEligibilityIndicator
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the option instrument is eligible for contrary instructions at the time of exercise. The contrariness of an instruction will be determined in the context of InTheMoneyCondition(2681). When not specified, the eligibility is undefined or not applicable.

fielddef.name: LegContraryInstructionEligibilityIndicator
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the option instrument is eligible for contrary instructions at the time of exercise. The contrariness of an instruction will be determined in the context of LegInTheMoneyCondition(2682). When not specified, the eligibility is undefined or not applicable.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingContraryInstructionEligibilityIndicator
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the option instrument is eligible for contrary instructions at the time of exercise. The contrariness of an instruction will be determined in the context of UnderlyingInTheMoneyCondition(2683). When not specified, the eligibility is undefined or not applicable.

fielddef.name: DerivativeContraryInstructionEligibilityIndicator
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the option instrument is eligible for contrary instructions at the time of exercise. The contrariness of an instruction will be determined in the context of DerivativeInTheMoneyCondition(2684). When not specified, the eligibility is undefined or not applicable.

fielddef.name: CollateralMarketPrice
fielddef.descr: Market price of the collateral, either from market sources or pre-agreed by the counterparties.

fielddef.name: CollateralPercentOverage
fielddef.descr: Percentage of over-collateralization particularly when CollateralAmountType(2632) = 4 (Additional collateral value)

fielddef.name: NoSideCollateralAmounts
fielddef.descr: Number of side collateral amount entries.

fielddef.name: SideCollateralAmountMarketID
fielddef.descr: Market associated with the collateral amount.

fielddef.name: SideCollateralAmountMarketSegmentID
fielddef.descr: Market segment associated with the collateral amount.

fielddef.name: SideCollateralAmountType
fielddef.descr: The type of value in CurrentCollateralAmount(1704).

fielddef.name: SideCollateralCurrency
fielddef.descr: Specifies the currency of the collateral; optional, defaults to the settlement currency if not specified. Uses ISO 4217 Currency Code.

fielddef.name: SideCollateralFXRate
fielddef.descr: Foreign exchange rate used to compute the SideCurrentCollateralAmount(2702) from the SideCollateralCurrency(2695) and the Currency(15).

fielddef.name: SideCollateralFXRateCalc
fielddef.descr: Specifies whether or not SideCollateralFXRate(2696) should be multiplied or divided.

fielddef.name: SideCollateralMarketPrice
fielddef.descr: Market price of the collateral, either from market sources or pre-agreed by the counterparties.

fielddef.name: SideCollateralPercentOverage
fielddef.descr: Percentage of over-collateralization particularly when SideCollateralAmountType(2694) = 4 (Additional collateral value).

fielddef.name: SideCollateralPortfolioID
fielddef.descr: Identifier of the collateral portfolio when reporting on a portfolio basis.

fielddef.name: SideCollateralType
fielddef.descr: Type of collateral on deposit being reported.

fielddef.name: SideCurrentCollateralAmount
fielddef.descr: Currency value currently attributed to the collateral.

fielddef.name: SideHaircutIndicator
fielddef.descr: Indicates, if "Y", that a stated valuation includes a haircut, e.g. that the stated value reflects the subtraction of the haircut. Note that a value of "N" does not imply a haircut is not applicable, only that the haircut (if any) is not reflected in the stated valuation.

fielddef.name: ExDestinationType
fielddef.item: Can be traded only on a trading venue
Can be traded only on a Systematic Internaliser (SI)
Can be traded on a trading venue or Systematic internaliser (SI)
fielddef.descr: Identifies the type of execution destination for the order.

fielddef.name: MarketCondition
fielddef.descr: Market condition. In the context of ESMA RTS 8 it is important that trading venues communicate the condition of the market, particularly "stressed" and "exceptional", in order to provide incentives for firms contributing to liquidity.

fielddef.name: NoQuoteAttributes
fielddef.descr: Number of quote attributes entries.

fielddef.name: QuoteAttributeType
fielddef.item: Quote is above standard market size
Quote is above size specific to the instrument
Quote applicable for liquidity provision activity
fielddef.descr: The type of attribute for the quote.

fielddef.name: QuoteAttributeValue
fielddef.descr: The value associated with the quote attribute type specified in QuoteAttributeType(2707).

fielddef.name: NoPriceQualifiers
fielddef.descr: Number of price qualifiers in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: PriceQualifier
fielddef.item: Accrued interest (if any) is factored into the price
Tax is factored into the price
The effect of bond amortization or the floating rate index offset is factored into the price
fielddef.descr: Qualifier for price. May be used when the price needs to be explicitly qualified.

fielddef.name: MDValueTier
fielddef.descr: Describes the reporting ranges for executed transactions.

fielddef.name: MiscFeeQualifier
fielddef.descr: Identifies whether the current entry contributes to the trade or transaction economics, i.e. affects NetMoney(118).

fielddef.name: MiscFeeDesc
fielddef.descr: Can be used to provide a textual description of the fee type.

fielddef.name: FinancialInstrumentFullName
fielddef.descr: The full normative name of the financial instrument.

fielddef.name: EncodedFinancialInstrumentFullNameLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedFinancialInstrumentFullName(2716) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedFinancialInstrumentFullName
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the FinancialInstrumentFullName(2714) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the FinancialInstrumentFullName(2714) field.

fielddef.name: LegFinancialInstrumentFullName
fielddef.descr: The full normative name of the multileg's financial instrument.

fielddef.name: EncodedLegFinancialInstrumentFullNameLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) individual multileg instrument's EncodedLegFinancialInstrumentFullName(2719).

fielddef.name: EncodedLegFinancialInstrumentFullName
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the LegFinancialInstrumentFullName(2717) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the LegFinancialInstrumentFullName(2717) field.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingFinancialInstrumentFullName
fielddef.descr: The full normative name of the underlying financial instrument.

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingFinancialInstrumentFullNameLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) underlying instrument's EncodedUnderlyingFinancialInstrumentFullName(2722).

fielddef.name: EncodedUnderlyingFinancialInstrumentFullName
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the UnderlyingFinancialInstrumentFullName(2720) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the UnderlyingFinancialInstrumentFullName(2720) field.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Curve time unit associated with the underlying index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Curve time multiplier for the underlying index.

fielddef.name: CommissionAmountSubType
fielddef.descr: Further sub classification of the CommissionAmountType(2641).

fielddef.name: AllocCommissionAmountSubType
fielddef.descr: Further sub classification of the AllocCommissionAmountType(2655).

fielddef.name: AllocLegRefID
fielddef.descr: Unique identifier for a specific leg (uniqueness not defined as part of the FIX specification). AllocLegRefID(2727) references the value from LegID(1788) in the current multileg order or trade message specifying to which leg the allocation instance applies.

fielddef.name: FloatingRateIndexCurvePeriod
fielddef.descr: Time unit multiplier for the floating rate index identified in FloatingRateIndexID(2731).

fielddef.name: FloatingRateIndexCurveSpread
fielddef.descr: Spread from the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: FloatingRateIndexCurveUnit
fielddef.descr: Time unit associated with the floating rate index identified in FloatingRateIndexID(2731).

fielddef.name: FloatingRateIndexID
fielddef.descr: Security identifier of the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: FloatingRateIndexIDSource
fielddef.descr: Source for the floating rate index identified in FloatingRateIndexID(2731).

fielddef.name: IndexRollMonth
fielddef.descr: Month identified in the index roll.

fielddef.name: NoIndexRollMonths
fielddef.descr: Number of instances of the index roll month.

fielddef.name: AssetSubType
fielddef.descr: Used to provide a more specific description of the asset specified in AssetType(1940). See https://www.fixtrading.org/codelists/AssetSubType for code list of applicable values.

fielddef.name: CommodityFinalPriceType
fielddef.descr: Final price type of the commodity as specified by the trading venue.

fielddef.name: FinancialInstrumentShortName
fielddef.descr: Short name of the financial instrument. Uses ISO 18774 (FINS) values.

fielddef.name: NextIndexRollDate
fielddef.descr: Next index roll date.

fielddef.name: LegAssetSubType
fielddef.descr: Used to provide a more specific description of the asset specified in LegAssetType(2069). See https://www.fixtrading.org/codelists/AssetSubType for code list of applicable values.

fielddef.name: LegFinancialInstrumentShortName
fielddef.descr: Short name of the financial instrument. Uses ISO 18774 (FISN) values.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexID
fielddef.descr: Security identifier of the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: LegPaymentStreamRateIndexIDSource
fielddef.descr: Source for the floating rate index identified in LegPaymentStreamRateIndexID(43088).

fielddef.name: LegSecondaryAssetSubType
fielddef.descr: Used to provide a more specific description of the asset specified in LegSecondaryAssetType(2079). See https://www.fixtrading.org/codelists/AssetSubType for code list of applicable values.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexID
fielddef.descr: Security identifier of the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: PaymentStreamRateIndexIDSource
fielddef.descr: Source for the floating rate index identified in PaymentStreamRateIndexID(43090).

fielddef.name: NoReferenceDataDates
fielddef.descr: Number of instances of reference data dates.

fielddef.name: ReferenceDataDate
fielddef.descr: Reference data entry's date-time of the type specified in ReferenceDataDateType(2748).

fielddef.name: ReferenceDataDateType
fielddef.item: Date of request for admission to trading
Date of approval of admission to trading
Date of admission to trading or date of first trade
fielddef.descr: Reference data entry's date-time type.

fielddef.name: SecondaryAssetSubType
fielddef.descr: Used to provide a more specific description of the asset specified in SecondaryAssetType(1979). See https://www.fixtrading.org/codelists/AssetSubType for code list of applicable values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingFinancialInstrumentShortName
fielddef.descr: Short name of the financial instrument. Uses ISO 18774 (FINS) values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingAssetSubType
fielddef.descr: Used to provide a more specific description of the asset specified in UnderlyingAssetType(2015). See https://www.fixtrading.org/codelists/AssetSubType for code list of applicable values.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexID
fielddef.descr: Security identifier of the floating rate index.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexIDSource
fielddef.descr: Source for the floating rate index identified in UnderlyingPaymentStreamRateIndexID(43092).

fielddef.name: UnderlyingSecondaryAssetSubType
fielddef.descr: May be used to provide a more specific description of the asset specified in UnderlyingSecondaryAssetType(2083). See https://www.fixtrading.org/codelists/AssetSubType for code list of applicable values.

fielddef.name: DeliveryStreamRouteOrCharter
fielddef.descr: Specific delivery route or time charter average. Applicable to commodity freight swaps.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryStreamRouteOrCharter
fielddef.descr: Specific delivery route or time charter average. Applicable to commodity freight swaps.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryStreamRouteOrCharter
fielddef.descr: Specific delivery route or time charter average. Applicable to commodity freight swaps.

fielddef.name: ExecutionTimestamp
fielddef.descr: Time of the individual execution.

fielddef.name: ReportingPx
fielddef.descr: Represents the reportable price on fill when an instance of the Parties component with PartyRole(452) = 73 (Execution Venue) is present to prevent having to compute running totals.

fielddef.name: ReportingQty
fielddef.descr: Represents the reportable quantity on fill when an instance of the Parties component with PartyRole(452) = 73 (Execution Venue) is present to prevent having to compute running totals.

fielddef.name: DeliveryRouteOrCharter
fielddef.descr: Specific delivery route or time charter average. Applicable to commodity freight contracts.

fielddef.name: ReturnTrigger
fielddef.descr: Indicates the type of return or payout trigger for the swap or forward.

fielddef.name: LegDeliveryRouteOrCharter
fielddef.descr: Specific delivery route or time charter average. Applicable to commodity freight contracts.

fielddef.name: LegReturnTrigger
fielddef.descr: Indicates the type of return or payout trigger for the swap or forward.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingDeliveryRouteOrCharter
fielddef.descr: Specific delivery route or time charter average. Applicable to commodity freight contracts.

fielddef.name: UnderlyingReturnTrigger
fielddef.descr: Indicates the type of return or payout trigger for the swap or forward.

fielddef.name: AllocRequestID
fielddef.descr: Unique identifier for the request message.

fielddef.name: GroupAmount
fielddef.descr: Indicates the total notional units or amount of an allocation group. Includes any allocated units or amount.

fielddef.name: GroupRemainingAmount
fielddef.descr: Indicates the remaining notional units or amount of an allocation group that has not yet been allocated.

fielddef.name: AllocGroupAmount
fielddef.descr: Indicates the notional units or amount being allocated.

fielddef.name: PriceMarkup
fielddef.Description: Price offset of the markup denominated in the price type of the trade.

fielddef.name: AveragePriceType
fielddef.Description: The average pricing model used for block trades.

fielddef.name: AveragePriceStartTime
fielddef.Description: Start of the time period during which price averaging occurred.

fielddef.name: AveragePriceEndTime
fielddef.Description: End of the time period during which price averaging occurred.

fielddef.name: OrderPercentOfTotalVolume
fielddef.Description: For Percent-of-volume (POV) average pricing this is the target percentage this order quantity represents of the total trading volume of an instrument during the specified time period. This provides the data needed to ensure that the average price is fair based on the total sum of grouped POV trades.

fielddef.name: AllocGroupStatus
fielddef.item: Replaced (An allocated trade or give-up has moved from one allocation group to another)
Pending (A request to assign or change an allocation group is pending)
fielddef.Description: Status of the trade give-up relative to the group identified in AllocGroupID(1730).

fielddef.name: AllocAvgPxIndicator
fielddef.item: Trade is part of an average price group identified by the AvgPxGroupID(1731)
Last trade of the average price group identified by the AvgPxGroupID(1731)
Trade is part of a notional value average price group
fielddef.Description: Average pricing indicator at the allocation level.

fielddef.name: AllocAvgPxGroupID
fielddef.descr: Used by submitting firm to group trades being sub-allocated into an average price group. The trades in the average price group will be used to calculate an average price for the group.

fielddef.name: PreviousAllocGroupID
fielddef.descr: When reporting a group change by the central counterparty to allocations of trades for the same instrument traded at the same price this identifies the previous group identifier.

fielddef.name: NoMatchExceptions
fielddef.descr: Number of match exceptions in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: MatchExceptionType
fielddef.descr: Type of matching exception.

fielddef.name: MatchExceptionElementType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the data point used in the matching operation which resulted in an exception.

fielddef.name: MatchExceptionElementName
fielddef.descr: The matching exception data point name, for example: "Trade currency". This may be used for display purposes, providing a corresponding description for the value in MatchExcecptionElementType(2774).

fielddef.name: MatchExceptionAllocValue
fielddef.descr: The allocating party's data value used in the match operation.

fielddef.name: MatchExceptionConfirmValue
fielddef.descr: The confirming party's data value used in the match operation.

fielddef.name: MatchExceptionToleranceValue
fielddef.descr: The data element's tolerance value. Omitted if no tolerance is allowed or not applicable.

fielddef.name: MatchExceptionToleranceValueType
fielddef.descr: The type of value in MatchExceptionToleranceValue(2778). Omitted if no tolerance is allowed or not applicable. For example, if the tolerance for accrued interest is 0.01% of total accrued interest then MatchExceptionElementType(2774)=1 (Accrued interest), MatchExceptionToleranceValueType(2779)=2 (Percentage) and MatchExcecptionToleranceValue(2778)=0.0001. If tolerance for the exchange rate of an FX trade is "0.001" then MatchExceptionElementType(2774)=2 (Deal price), MatchExceptionToleranceValueType(2779)=1 (Fixed amount) and MatchExcecptionToleranceValue(2778)=0.001.

fielddef.name: MatchExceptionText
fielddef.descr: Description of the exception.

fielddef.name: NoMatchingDataPoints
fielddef.descr: Number of matching data points in the repeating group.

fielddef.name: MatchingDataPointIndicator
fielddef.descr: Data point's matching type.

fielddef.name: MatchingDataPointValue
fielddef.descr: Value of the matching data point.

fielddef.name: MatchingDataPointType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the data point used in the matching operation. Values may not have applicable tolerance values, in this case this means the data point was used for matching but did not match.

fielddef.name: MatchingDataPointName
fielddef.descr: The matching data point name, for example: "Trade currency". This may be used for display purposes, providing a corresponding description for the value in MatchingDataPointType(2784).

fielddef.name: TradeAggregationRequestID
fielddef.descr: The message identifier for the trade aggregation request.

fielddef.name: TradeAggregationRequestRefID
fielddef.descr: Reference identifier to a previously sent trade aggregation message being cancelled or replaced.

fielddef.name: TradeAggregationTransType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the trade aggregation transaction type.

fielddef.name: AggregatedQty
fielddef.descr: Total quantity of orders or fills quantity aggregated.

fielddef.name: TradeAggregationRequestStatus
fielddef.descr: Status of the trade aggregation request.

fielddef.name: TradeAggregationRejectReason
fielddef.descr: Reason for trade aggregation request being rejected.

fielddef.name: TradeAggregationReportID
fielddef.descr: Unique identifier for the TradeAggregationReport(35=DX).

fielddef.name: AvgSpotRate
fielddef.descr: The average FX spot rate.

fielddef.name: AvgForwardPoints
fielddef.descr: The average forward points. May be a negative value.

fielddef.name: OffshoreIndicator
fielddef.item: Regular. Default if not specified. The notion of onshore and offshore rates does not apply.
Offshore. Used to indicate that the rate specified is an offshore rate which differs from its onshore rate.
Onshore. Used to indicate that the rate specified is an onshore rate which differs from its offshore rate.
fielddef.descr: Identifies the trade aggregation transaction type.

fielddef.name: FXBenchmarkRateFix
fielddef.descr: Specifies the foreign exchange benchmark rate fixing to be used in valuing the transaction. For example "London 4 p.m." or "Tokyo 3 p.m."

fielddef.name: EncodedMatchExceptionTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedMatchExceptionText (2798) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedMatchExceptionText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the MatchExceptionText(2780) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the MatchExceptionText(27808) field.

fielddef.name: PayReportID
fielddef.descr: Unique ID of the PayReport(35=DY) message.

fielddef.name: PayDisputeReason
fielddef.descr: Used to provide a machine-readable value giving the reason for disputing a request or report. See https://www.fixtrading.org/packages/ PayDisputeReason for the list of applicable values.

fielddef.name: EncodedReplaceText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the ReplaceText(2805) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the ReplaceText(2805) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedReplaceTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedReplaceText(2801) field.

fielddef.name: PayReportRefID
fielddef.descr: Reference identifier of the PayReport(35=DY). To be used with PayReportTransType(2804)=1 (Replace).

fielddef.name: PayReportTransType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the message transaction type.

fielddef.name: ReplaceText
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reason for amendment.

fielddef.name: PayReportStatus
fielddef.descr: Identifies status of the payment report.

fielddef.name: CancelText
fielddef.descr: Identifies the reason for cancelation.

fielddef.name: EncodedCancelText
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the CancelText(2807) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the CancelText(2807) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedCancelTextLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedCancelText(2808) field.

fielddef.name: PayRequestRefID
fielddef.descr: Reference identifier of the PayRequest(35=EA). To be used with PayRequestTransType(2811)=1 (Cancel).

fielddef.name: PyRequestTransType
fielddef.descr: Identifies the message transaction type.

fielddef.name: PayRequestID
fielddef.descr: Unique ID of the PayRequest(35=EA) message.

fielddef.name: PayRequestStatus
fielddef.descr: Identifies status of the request being responded to.

fielddef.name: EncodedPostTradePaymentDesc
fielddef.descr: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the PostTradePaymentDesc(2820) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field. If used, the ASCII (English) representation should also be specified in the PostTradePaymentDesc(2820) field.

fielddef.name: EncodedPostTradePaymentDescLen
fielddef.descr: Byte length of encoded (non-ASCII characters) EncodedPostTradePaymentDesc(2814) field.
