descr.p: PaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDate is a subcomponent of the PaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlTerms component used to specify predetermined fixing dates.

For the purpose of optimization, the NonDeliverableFixingDateType(40827) field may optionally be omitted after the first instance provided the instance(s) which immediately follow is of the same date type. When the next instance requires a different date type from the prior instance, the NonDeliverableFixingDateType(40827) is required to specify the date type.

blockdef.name: PaymentScheduleGrp

field.name: PaymentScheduleType
field.comment: Required if NoPaymentSchedules(40828) > 0.

field.name: PaymentScheduleStepFrequencyPeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleStepFrequencyUnit(40845) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleStepFrequencyUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleStepFrequencyPeriod(40844) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessDayConvention
field.comment: When specified, this overrides the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument. The specified value would be specific to this instance of the payment schedule.

block.comment: When specified, this overrides the business centers defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument. The specified values would be specific to this instance of the payment schedule.

field.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetPeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetUnit(40856) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleFixingDateOffsetPeriod(40855) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesBusinessDayConvention
field.comment: When specified, this overrides the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument. The specified value would be specific to this instance of the payment schedule.

block.comment: When specified, this overrides the business centers defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument. The specified values would be specific to this instance of the payment schedule.

field.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetPeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetUnit(40865) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesOffsetPeriod(40864) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleFixingLagPeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleFixingLagUnit(41177) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleFixingLagUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleFixingLagPeriod(41176) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetPeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetUnit(41179) is specified.

field.name: PaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationDateOffsetPeriod(41178) is specified.

blockdef.descr: The PaymentScheduleGrp is a repeating subcomponent of the StreamGrp component used to specify notional and rate steps of the payment stream.
blockdef.comment: The Fixing Lag Interval (PaymentScheduleFixingLagPeriod(41176) and PaymentScheduleFixingLagUnit(41177)) and the First Observation Offset Duration (PaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationOffsetPeriod(41178) and PaymentScheduleFixingFirstObservationOffsetUnit(41179)) are used together. If the First Observation Offset Duration is specified, the observation starts the Fixing Lag Interval prior to each calculation. If the First Observation Offset Duration is not specified, the observation starts immediately preceeding each calculation.

blockdef.name: PaymentScheduleRateSourceGrp

field.name: PaymentScheduleRateSource
field.comment: Required if NoPaymentScheduleRateSources(40868) > 0.

field.name: PaymentScheduleRateSourceType
field.comment: Required if NoPaymentScheduleRateSources(40868) > 0.

field.name: PaymentScheduleReferencePage
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentScheduleRateSource(40869) = 99 (Other)

blockdef.descr: PaymentScheduleRateSourceGrp is a repeating component within the PaymentScheduleGrp component used to identify primary and secondary rate sources

blockdef.name: PaymentStubGrp

field.name: PaymentStubType
field.comment: Required if NoPaymentStubs(40872) > 0.

field.name: PaymentStubIndexCurvePeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentStubIndexCurveUnit(40881) is specified.

field.name: PaymentStubIndexCurveUnit

field.name: PaymentStubIndex2CurvePeriod

field.name: PaymentStubIndex2CurveUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when PaymentStubIndex2CurvePeriod(40894) is specified.

blockdef.descr: The PaymentStubGrp is a repeating subcomponent of the StreamGrp component used to specify front and back stubs of the payment stream.

blockdef.name: LegSettlRateDisruptionFallbackGrp

field.name: LegSettlRatePostponementMaximumDays
field.comment: Required if NoLegSettlRateFallbacks(40902) > 0.

blockdef.descr: The LegSettlRateDisruptionsFallbackGrp is a repeating subcomponent of the LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableSettlTerms component used to specify the method, prioritized by the order it is listed, to get a replacement rate for a disrupted settlement rate option for a non-deliverable settlement currency.

blockdef.name: StreamEffectiveDate

field.name: StreamEffectiveDateBusinessDayConvention
field.comment: When specified, this overrides the business day convention defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument. The specified value would be specific to this instance of the effective date of the stream.

block.comment: When specified, this overrides the business centers defined in the DateAdjustment component in Instrument. The specified values would be specific to this instance of the effective date of the stream.

field.name: StreamEffectiveDateOffsetPeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when StreamEffectiveDateOffsetUnit(40912) is specified.

field.name: StreamEffectiveDateOffsetUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when StreamEffectiveDateOffsetPeriod(40911) is specified.

blockdef.descr: StreamEffectivedDate is a subcomponent of the StreamGrp component used to specify the effective date of the stream.

blockdef.name: CashSettlDealerGrp

field.name: CashSettlDealer
field.comment: Required if NoCashSettlDealers(40277) > 0.

blockdef.descr: CashSettlDealerGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the CashSettlTermGrp component. It is used to specify the dealers from whom price quotations for the reference obligation are obtained for the purpose of cash settlement valuation.

blockdef.name: BusinessCenterGrp

field.name: BusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoBusinessCenters(40278) > 0.

blockdef.descr: BusinessCenterGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the DateAdjustment component. It is used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. The business centers defined here apply to all adjustable dates in the instrument unless specifically overridden in the respective specified components elsewhere.

blockdef.name: DateAdjustment
blockdef.descr: DateAdjustment is a subcomponent in the Instrument component. It is used to specify date adjustment parameters and rules. The date adjustments specified here applies to all adjustable dates for the instrument, unless specifically overridden in the respective specified components elsewhere.

blockdef.name: LegBusinessCenterGrp

field.name: LegBusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoLegBusinessCenters(40923) > 0.

blockdef.descr: LegBusinessCenterGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the LegDateAdjustment component. It is used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. The business centers defined here apply to all adjustable dates in the instrument leg unless specifically overridden elsewhere in the respective specified components further within the InstrumentLeg component.

blockdef.name: LegDateAdjustment
blockdef.descr: LegDateAdjustment is a subcomponent within the InstrumentLeg component. It is used to specify date adjustment parameters and rules. The date adjustements specified here applies to all adjustable dates for the instrument leg, unless specifically overridden elsewhere in the respective specified components further within the InstrumentLeg component.

blockdef.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenterGrp

field.name: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenters(40927) > 0.

blockdef.descr: LegPaymentScheduleFixingDateBusinessCenterGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the LegPaymentScheduleGrp component. It is used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

blockdef.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateBusinessCenterGrp

field.name: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDatesBusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateBusinessCenters(40928) > 0.

blockdef.descr: LegPaymentScheduleInterimExchangeDateBusinessCenterGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the LegPaymentScheduleGrp component. It is used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg

blockdef.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessCenterGrp

field.name: LegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentStreamNonDeliverableFixingDatesBusinessCenters(40929) > 0.

It is used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

blockdef.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessCenterGrp

field.name: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessCenter
field.comment: Requirend if NoLegPaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessCenters(40930) > 0.

blockdef.descr: LegPaymentStreamPaymentDateBusinessCenterGrp is a repeating subcomponent of the LegPaymentStreamPaymentDates component used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive date adjustment. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentStreamResetDateBusinessCenters(40931) > 0.

blockdef.descr: LegPaymentStreamResetDateBusinessCenterGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the LegPaymentStreamResetDates component. It is used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

blockdef.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessCenterGrp

field.name: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessCenters(40932) > 0.

blockdef.descr: LegPaymentStreamInitialFixingDateBusinessCenterGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the LegPaymentStreamResetDates component used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

blockdef.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessCenterGrp

field.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessCenters(40933) > 0.

blockdef.descr: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateBusinessCenterGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the LegPaymentStreamResetDates component. It is used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

blockdef.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessCenterGrp

field.name: LegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoLegProvisionCashSettlPaymentDateBusinessCenters(40934) > 0.

It is used to specify the set of business centers whose calendars drive the date adjustment. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg.

blockdef.name: OptionExercise

field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the ExerciseDesc(41106) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

blockdef.descr: The OptionExercise component is a subcomponent of the Instrument component used to specify option exercise provisions. Its purpose is to identify the opportunities and conditions for exercise, e.g. the schedule of dates on which exercise is allowed. The embedded OptionExerciseExpiration component is used to terminate the opportunity for exercise.

blockdef.descr: The OptionExerciseExpiration component is a subcomponent of the OptionExercise component used to specify option exercise expiration dates and times. The purpose of OptionExercise is to identify the scheduled opportunities for exercise. OptionExerciseExpiration identifies the end of the schedule.

blockdef.descr: The LegOptionExercise component is a subcomponent of the InstrumentLeg component used to specify option exercise provisions. Its purpose is to identify the opportunities and conditions for exercise, e.g. the schedule of dates on which exercise is allowed. The embedded LegOptionExerciseExpiration component is used to terminate the opportunity for exercise.

blockdef.name: LegComplexEvents

field.name: LegComplexEventType
field.comment: Required if NoLegComplexEvents(2218)) > 0.

field.name: LegComplexEventCondition
field.comment: Conditionally required when there are more than one LegComplexEvents occurrences. A chain of LegComplexEvents must be linked together through use of the LegComplexEventCondition(2232) in which the relationship between any two events is described. For any two LegComplexEvents the first occurrence will specify the LegComplexEventCondition(2232) which links it with the second event.

blockdef.descr: The LegComplexEvent Group is a repeating block which allows specifying an unlimited number and types of advanced events, such as observation and pricing over the lifetime of an option, futures, commodities or equity swap contract. Use LegEvntGrp to specify more straightforward events.

field.name: LegInstrumentPartyRole
field.comment: Identifies the type of LegInstrumentPartyID(2255) (e.g. Executing Broker). Required if NoLegInstrumentParties(2254) > 0.

field.comment: Must be set if EncodedText(355) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedText

descr.p: Party Risk Limits Report Ack is an optional message used as a response to the the Party Risk Limit Report (35=CM) or Party Risk Limit Update Report (35=CR) messages to acknowledge or reject those messages.

field.name: RiskLimitCheckRequestID
field.comment: Either RiskLimitCheckRequestID(2318) or RiskLimitCheckID(2319) must be specified. RiskLimitCheckRequestID(2318) is conditionally required in a message-chaining model in which a subsequent message may refer to a prior message via RiskLimitCheckRequestRefID(2322). The alternative is an entity-based model in which RiskLimitCheckID(2319) is used to statically identify a given request. In this case RiskLimitCheckID(2319) is required and RiskLimitRequestID(1666) can be optionally specified.

field.name: RiskLimitCheckID
field.comment: Either RiskLimitCheckRequestID(2318) or RiskLimitCheckID(2319) must be specified.

field.name: RiskLimitCheckRequestRefID
field.comment: Conditionally required when RiskLimitCheckTransType(2320) = 1 (Cancel) or 2 (Replace), and message-chaining model is used.

field.name: RefOrderID
field.comment: Used to specify the transaction reference for this limit check request.

field.name: RefOrderIDSource
field.comment: Identifies the type of reference specified in RefOrderID(1080) for this limit check request.

field.name: RiskLimitCheckAmount
field.comment: Specifies the amount being requested or consumed, as indicated by RiskLimitCheckType(2321).

field.name: EncodedTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedText(355) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the Text(58) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: RiskLimitCheckID

field.name: RiskLimitCheckTransType
field.comment: Identifies the RiskLimitCheckTransType(2320) this message is responding to as specified in the request message.

field.name: RiskLimitCheckType

field.name: RiskLimitCheckRequestRefID
field.comment: Conditionally required when RiskLimitCheckTransType(2320) = 1 (Cancel) or 2 (Replace)

field.name: RiskLimitApprovedAmount
field.comment: Conditionally required when RiskLimitCheckRequestStatus(2325) = 1 (Partially approved)

field.name: ExpireTime
field.comment: Optionally used to specify when the approved credit limit being reserved will expire.

field.name: EncodedTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedText(355) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the Text(58) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the Text(58) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: MarketID
field.comment: Use to reduce the scope to a market.

field.name: MarketSegmentID
field.comment: Use to reduce the scope to a market segment.

block.comment: Use to reduce the scope of instruments.

msgdef.descr: The PartyActionRequest message is used suspend or halt the specified party from further trading activities at the Respondent. The Respondent must respond with a PartyActionReport(35=DI) message.

msgdef.descr: s Used to respond to the PartyActionRequest(35=DH) message, indicating whether the request has been received, accepted or rejected. Can also be used in an unsolicited manner to report party actions, e.g. reinstatements after a manual intervention out of band.

When used in the PartyEntitlementRequest(35=CU) message it serves to provide filtering criteria for the results set

descr.p: UnderlyingCashSettlDealerGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the UnderlyingCashSettlTermGrp component. It is used to specify the dealers from whom price quotations for the reference obligation are obtained for the purpose of cash settlement valuation.

field.comment: Required if NoUnderlyingCashSettlTerms(42041) > 0.

descr.p: The UnderlyingCashSettlTermGrp is a repeating component within the UnderlyingInstrument component used to report cash settlement terms.

Component Elaboration Usage of UnderlyingCashSettlTermGrp must either include a known UnderlyingCashSettlAmount(42054) or provide the cash settlement term parameters needed to derive the cash settlement amount. UnderlyingCashSettlTermXID(42059) is provided for cross-referencing from an instance of the UnderlyingInstrument component through the UnderlyingSettlTermXIDRef(41315) field.

block.comment: Required if NoUnderlyingPhysicalSettlTerms(42060) > 0.

descr.p: The UnderlyingPhysicalSettlTermGrp is a repeating component within the UnderlyingInstrument component used to report physical settlement terms

field.name: UnderlyingProtectionTermNotional
field.comment: Required if NoUnderlyingProtectionTerms(42068) > 0.

descr.p: The UnderlyingProtectionTermGrp is a repeating component within the UnderlyingInstrument component used to report contract protection term details.

descr.p: UnderlyingProtectionTermEventNewsSourceGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the UnderlyingProtectionTermGrp component. This should only be used to override the business centers defined in the UnderlyingDateAdjustment component in UnderlyingInstrument.

field.name: OrderEntryAction
field.comment: Required if NoOrderEntries(2428) > 0.

field.name: OrderEntryID
field.comment: Unique order entry identification across all entries of a single message. Conditionally required when neither ClOrdID(11) nor OrderID(37) is provided.

field.name: ClOrdID
field.comment: Conditionally required when neither OrderEntryID(2430) nor OrderID(37) is provided.

field.name: OrigClOrdID
field.comment: Conditionally required when OrderEntryAction(2429) is not "1" (Add), ClOrdID(11) was provided in original order, and message-chaining model is used.

field.condreq: not(T$2429='1') and not existtags(T$11) and not existtags(T$2430)
field.name: OrderID
field.comment: Conditionally required when OrderEntryAction(2429) is not "1" (Add) and neither OrderEntryID(2430) nor ClOrdID(11) is provided.

field.name: OrdType
field.comment: Conditionally required when OrderEntryAction (2429) = 1 (Add) or 2 (Modify). Only a subset of OrdType(40) values permitted that do not require additional pricing fields other than Price(44) field.

field.name: Price
field.comment: Conditionally required when OrdType(40) = 2 (Limit)

field.name: Side
field.comment: Conditionally required when OrderEntryAction(2429) = 1 (Add) or 2 (Modify)

field.name: TimeInForce
field.comment: Only subset of values permitted that do not require additional fields

comment.p: Conditionally required when OrderEntryAction(2429) = 1 (Add) or 2 (Modify)

block.comment: Required if NoOrderEntries(2428) > 0.

descr.p: Group of order transactions across one or more instruments

field.comment: Required if NoOrderEntries(2428) > 0.

field.name: ExecType
field.comment: Required if NoOrderEntries(2428) > 0.

field.name: OrderEntryID
field.comment: Conditionally required when neither ClOrdID(11) nor OrderID(37) is provided.

field.name: ClOrdID
field.comment: Conditionally required when neither OrderEntryID(2430) nor OrderID(37) is provided.

field.name: OrigClOrdID
field.comment: ClOrdID(11) of the previous non rejected order (NOT the initial order of the day) when canceling or replacing an order. Conditionally required when ClOrdID(11) is provided and message-chaining model is used.

field.name: OrderID
field.comment: Conditionally required when neither OrderEntryID(2430) nor ClOrdID(11) is provided.

field.name: CumQty
field.comment: Use to explicitly provide executed quantity.

field.name: LeavesQty
field.comment: Use to explicitly provide remaining quantity.

field.name: CxlQty
field.comment: Use to explicitly provide cancelled quantity.

descr.p: Acknowledgment for a group of order transactions across one or more instruments
The acknowledgement may or may not echo back input values from the submission but it has to provide the current status of each order including the impact of immediate executions or suspensions.

field.name: MassOrderRequestID
field.comment: Unique identifier of MassOrder(35=DJ) message as assigned by the submitter of the request.

block.comment: This is party information related to the submitter

field.name: EncodedTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedText(355) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the Text(58) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: TotNoOrderEntries
field.comment: Used to support fragmentation. Sum of NoOrderEntries(2428) within the OrderEntryGrp across all messages with the same MassOrderRequestID(2423).

field.name: LastFragment
field.comment: Indicates whether this is the last fragment in a sequence of message fragments. Only required where message has been fragmented.

descr.p: The MassOrder(35=DJ) message can be used to add, modify or delete multiple unrelated orders with a single message. Apart from clearing related attributes, only the key order attributes for high performance trading are available

The behavior of individual orders within a MassOrder(35=DJ) may vary depending upon its attributes, e.g. OrdType(40) and TimeInForce(59). Individual orders may be modified or deleted/cancelled with single order messages such as OrderCancelReplaceRequest (35=G) and OrderCancelRequest(35=F). Each of the orders in the MassOrder(35=DJ) are to be treated as stand-alone individual orders.

block.comment: For use in drop copy applications. NOT FOR USE in transactional applications.

field.name: MassOrderRequestID
field.comment: Unique identifier of MassOrder(35=DJ) message as assigned by the submitter of the request.

field.name: MassOrderReportID
field.comment: Unique identifier of MassOrder(35=DJ) message as assigned by the receiver

field.name: MassOrderRequestStatus
field.comment: Message level request status

field.name: MassOrderRequestResult
field.comment: Message level request result

field.name: OrderResponseLevel
field.comment: Level of response requested from receiver of MassOrder (35=DJ) message.

field.name: EncodedRejectTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedRejectText(1665) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedRejectText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the RejectText(1328) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: EncodedTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedRejectText(355) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the RejectText(1328) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: TotNoOrderEntries
field.comment: Used to support fragmentation. Sum of NoOrderEntries(2428) within the OrderEntryAckGrp across all messages with the same MassOrderRequestID(2423).

field.name: LastFragment
field.comment: Indicates whether this is the last fragment in a sequence of message fragments. Only required where message has been fragmented.

comment.p: Omit when the entire MassOrder(35=DJ) message is rejected or when no order entries are being rejected or accepted with additional events. Presence of this component is contingent upon the OrderResponseLevel(2427) value set by the order in the MassOrder(35=DJ) message

descr.p: Required if NoTargetPartySubIDs > 0.
Required if NoTargetPartySubIDs > 0.
Repeating group of target party sub-identifiers

comment.p: Submitting, cancelling, changing, accepting, and declining a transfer are all considered separate instructions, and each must have a unique ID. Chaining of firm generated IDs is not supported; TransferID assigned by the CCP must be used when sending an instruction referencing a previously submitted transfer.
Conditionally required when responding to a Position TransferReport message (e.g. when accepting or declining a transfer) or performing an action on a transfer (e.g. cancel or replace.
Specifies the source of the position transfer, e.g. the transferor
Specifies the target of the position transfer, e.g. the transferor
Business date the transfer would clear
Trade date associated with the position being transferred.
If not specified, indicates the transfer is for all instruments.

Position to transfer from the perspective of the source party prior to the transfer. If not specified, indicates transfer of all positions for an a specified instrument, if Instrument is specified, or transfer of all positions if no Instrument is not specified
Price at which the position is transferred.
Optionally used to include cash residuals, etc., viewed from the perspective of the source party prior to the transfer.

descr.p: The PositionTransferInstruction is sent by clearing firms to CCPs to initiate position transfers, or to accept or decline position transfers

comment.p: The identifier of the PositionTransfer Instruction this message is responding to.

Optional when responding to a "new" transfer. When responding to a Position Transfer Instruction accepting, declining, or cancelling a transfer already initiated, this field can echo the TransferID sent.

descr.p: The PositionTransferInstructionAck is sent by CCPs to clearing firms to acknowledge position transfer instructions, and to report errors processing position transfer instructions.

The PositionTransferInstructionAck is intended to be a technical acknowledgment, not a business level acknowledgment which would instead be provided by the PositionTransferReport message. As such, TransferID, a business level ID assigned by the CCP, need not be assigned when providing a technical acknowledgment to a new or rejected position transfer request

Conditionally required when MDStatisticFrequencyPeriod(2460) is specified
Conditionally required when MDStatisticDelayUnit(2463) is specified.
Conditionally required when MDStatisticDelayPeriod(2462) is specified.
Conditionally required for MDStatisticIntervalType (2464)= 1 (Sliding winndow) or 2 (Sliding window peak).
Conditionally required when MDStatisticIntervalUnit(2467) is specified.
Conditionally required when MDStatisticIntervalPeriod(2466) is specified and MDStatisticIntervalType(2464) = 5(Current time unit), 6(Previous time unit) or 8(Maximum range up to previous time unit)
Can be used to define a date range for a sliding window peak other than the current day. Omission represents a date range starting with the first available day.
Can be used to define a date range for a sliding window peak other than the current day. Omission represents a date range including the current day
Can be used to define a date range for a sliding window peak other than the complete day. Omission represents a date range starting with the first available day.
Can be used to define a date range for a sliding window peak other than the complete day. Omission represents a date range including the current day
Conditionally required when MDStatisticType(2456) = 5=(Ratio).

descr.p: This component comprises all parameters that can be used to describe the market data statistics. These can be part of the request as well as the response. All parameters defined on the MarketDataStatisticsRequest(35=DO) message should be echoed in the MarketDataStatisticsReport(35=DP) message as the latter could also be sent unsolicited.

The general category and the entities involved in the statistics are defined by MDStatisticType(2456), MDStatisticScope(2458), and MDStatisticIntervalType(2464) and must always be specified. The remaining fields are optional and restrict the data range in one way or another. The time range for the data can either be specified in terms of an interval for which the statistics are typically calculated on a regular basis or in terms of an absolute date and/or time range.

field.name: ExposureDurationUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when ExposureDuration(1629) is specified.

comment.p: Unique message identifier for the request or the identifier of a previous request when unsubscribing.

descr.p: The MarketDataStatisticsRequest(35=DO) can beis used to ask request for statistical data. The simple form is to use an identifier (MDStatisticID(2475)) assigned by the market place which would denotes pre-defined statistical report. Alternatively, or also in addition, the request can define a number of parameters to for the desired statistical information

The resulting data set can be restricted to a specific market, market segment or predefined security list for which a single set of statistics will be returned. It is also possible to specify individual instruments or group of instruments by means of the component blocks Instrument, UndInstrmtGrp and InstrmtLegGrp. Fields specified in the request used as filter criteria to restrict the resulting data returned.

comment.p: Unique message identifier for the report

Unique message identifier for the request or the identifier of a previous request when unsubscribing. Conditionally required if report is sent in response to a MarketDataStatisticsRequest(35=DO) message
Conditionally required if report is sent in response to a MarketDataStatisticsRequest(35=DO) message.
Set to "Y" if message is sent as a result of a subscription request not a snapshot request

field.name: EncodedTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedText field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the Text field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding field.

descr.p: The MarketDataStatisticsReport(35=DP) is used to provide unsolicited statistical information or in response to a specific request. Each report contains a set of statistics for a single entity which could be a market, a market segment, a security list or an instrument

blockdef.descr: Component block is optionally used for financial transactions where legal contracts, master agreements or master confirmations are to be referenced. This component identifies the legal agreement under which the deal was made and other unique characteristics of the transaction. For example, the LegAgreementDesc(2497) field refers to base standard documents such as MRA 1996 Repurchase Agreement, GMRA 2000 Bills Transaction (U.K.), MSLA 1993 Securities Loan - Amended 1998, for example.

descr.p: Collateral Report Ack(35=DQ) is used as a response to the Collateral Report(35=BA). It can be used to reject a CollateralReport(35=BA) when the content of the report is invalid based on the business rules of the receiver. The message may also be used to acknowledge receipt of a valid CollateralReport(35=BA).

blockdef.descr: UnderlyingReturnRateGrp is a repeating subcomponent within the UnderlyingPaymentStreamFloatingRate component. It is used to specify the multiple return rates for an equity return swap payment stream.

field.comment: Conditionally required when LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetUnit(42456) is specified.

field.name: LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when LegPaymentStreamFinalPricePaymentDateOffsetPeriod(42455) is specified.

field.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDate
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentStreamFixingDates(42459) > 0.

field.name: LegPaymentStreamFixingDateType
field.comment: When specified it applies not only to the current date instance but to all subsequent date instances in the group until overridden when a new type is specified.

field.name: LegPaymentStreamFormula
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentStreamFormulas(42485) > 0.

field.name: LegPaymentStreamFormulaLength
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentStreamFormulas(42485) > 0.

field.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateBusinessDayConvention
field.comment: When specified, this overrides the business day convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg. The specified value would be specific to this payment stub instance.

block.comment: When specified, this overrides the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg. The specified values would be specific to this payment stub instance.

field.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateOffsetPeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when LegPaymentStubEndDateOffsetUnit(42492) is specified.

field.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateOffsetUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when LegPaymentStubEndDateOffsetPeriod(42491) is specified.

field.name: LegPaymentStubEndDateBusinessCenter
field.comment: Required if NoLegPaymentStubEndDateBusinessCenters(42495) > 0.

field.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateBusinessDayConvention
field.comment: When specified, this overrides the business day convention defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg. The specified value would be specific to this payment stub instance.

block.comment: When specified, this overrides the business centers defined in the LegDateAdjustment component in InstrumentLeg. The specified values would be specific to this payment stub instance.

field.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateOffsetPeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when LegPaymentStubStartDateOffsetUnit(42501) is specified.

field.name: LegPaymentStubStartDateOffsetUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when LegPaymentStubStartDateOffsetPeriod(42500) is specified.

field.name: TrdRegPublicationType
field.comment: Required if NoTrdRegPublications(2668) > 0.

descr.p: The TrdRegPublicationGrp component is used to express trade publication reasons that are required by regulatory agencies. Reasons may include deferrals, exemptions, waivers, etc.

field.name: OrderAttributeType
field.comment: Required if NoOrderAttributes(2593) > 0.

field.name: OrderAttributeValue
field.comment: Required if NoOrderAttributes(2593) > 0.

descr.p: The OrderAttributeGrp component provides additional attributes about the order.
Attributes included in this component are primarily "indicators" that may be associated with regulatory requirements and are typically not part of normal trading activities.

field.name: SideCurrentCollateralAmount
field.comment: Required if NoSideCollateralAmounts(2691) > 0.

field.name: SideCollateralCurrency
field.comment: Can be used to specify the currency of SideCollateralAmount(2702) if Currency(15) is not specified or is not the same.

field.name: SideCollateralReinvestmentRate
field.comment: When multiple instances of the SideCollateralReinvestmentGrp component are present this field specifies the average reinvestment rate.

field.name: SideUnderlyingRefID
field.comment: May be used to indicate that this entry applies to the underlying collateral instrument being referenced by the value in UnderlyingID(2874).

field.name: QuoteAttributeType
field.comment: Required if NoQuoteAttributes(2706) > 0.

field.name: QuoteAttributeValue
field.comment: Required if NoQuoteAttributes(2706) > 0.

blockdef.name: PriceQualifierGrp

field.name: PriceQualifier
field.comment: Required if NoPriceQualifiers(2709) > 0.

blockdef.descr: The PriceQualifierGrp component clarifies the composition of the price when standard market practice for the security calls for a price that is atypical when traded in other markets, or when a price can be expressed in more than one way.

field.name: IndexRollMonth
field.comment: Required if NoIndexRollMonths(2734) > 0.

field.name: ReferenceDataDate
field.comment: Required if NoReferenceDataDates(2746) > 0.

field.name: FloatingRateIndexID
field.comment: Conditionally required when FloatingRateIndexIDSource(2732) is specified.

field.name: FloatingRateIndexIDSource
field.comment: Conditionally required when FloatingRateIndexID(2731) is specified.

field.name: FloatingRateIndexCurveUnit
field.comment: Conditionally required when FloatingRateIndexCurvePeriod(2728) is specified.

field.name: FloatingRateIndexCurvePeriod
field.comment: Conditionally required when FloatingRateIndexCurveUnit(2730) is specified.

field.name: AveragePriceStartTime
field.comment: Required if AveragePriceType(2763)=2 (Percent of volume average price) or 0 (Time weighted average price).

field.name: AveragePriceEndTime
field.comment: Required if AveragePriceType(2763)=2 (Percent of volume average price) or 0 (Time weighted average price).

field.name: CrossRequestID
field.comment: Unique identifier for cross request message.

field.name: OrderQty
field.comment: Can be used to announce a maximum quantity that is subject to crossing.

field.name: CrossRequestID
field.comment: Unique identifier for the cross request message being confirmed.

field.name: AllocRequestID
field.comment: Unique identifier for this message. If used, other allocation messages may link to the request through this field.

msgdef.name: AllocationInstructionAlertRequestAck

field.name: AllocRequestID
field.comment: Unique identifier for this message. If used, other allocation messages may link to the request through this field.

field.name: RejectText
field.comment: May be used to further describe rejection reasons when AllocRequestStatus(2768)=1 (Rejected)

field.name: EncodedRejectTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedRejectText(1665) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedRejectText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the RejectText(1328) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

msgdef.descr: This message is used in a clearinghouse 3-party allocation model to acknowledge a AllocationInstructionAlertRequest(35=DU) message for an AllocationInstructionAlert(35=BM) message from the clearinghouse.

msgdef.name: TradeAggregationRequest

field.name: TradeAggregationRequestID
field.comment: Unique identifier for the message.

field.name: TradeAggregationRequestRefID
field.comment: Required when TradeAggregationTransType(2788)=1 (Cancel) or 2 (Replace).

field.name: TradeAggregationTransType
field.comment: Note that for the recommended practices only "new" is supported.

field.name: AggregatedQty
field.comment: This may optionally be used to show the aggregated amount/quantity in this message based on the orders or executions identified in either of the components below.

field.name: Currency
field.comment: Identifies the dealt currency for aggregation.

field.name: AvgPx
field.comment: The all-in average price, if specified, for the aggregation.

block.comment: Maybe used to specify the IDs of the orders being aggregated together.
Maybe used to specify the IDs of the execution fills being aggregated together. This will be mandatory for FX recommended practices.

field.name: Account
field.comment: Aggregation or holding account identifier.

msgdef.descr: TradeAggregationRequest(35=DW) is used to request that the identified trades between the initiator and respondent be aggregated together for further processing.

msgdef.name: TradeAggregationReport

field.name: TradeAggregationReportID
field.comment: Unique identifier for the report message.

field.name: TradeAggregationRequestID
field.comment: TradeAggregationRequest(35=DW) message being responded to.

field.name: TradeID
field.comment: Conditionally required when TradeAggregationRequestStatus(2790)=0 (Accepted). The trade identifier for the group of aggregated trades. This would be used by the sell-side to provide an aggregated trade identifier if the request was accepted.

field.name: AggregatedQty
field.comment: Conditionally required when TradeAggregationRequestStatus(2790)=0 (Accepted).

field.name: AvgPx
field.comment: Conditionally required when TradeAggregationRequestStatus(2790)=0 (Accepted). The all-in average rate for the aggregated trades.

block.comment: Conditionally required when TradeAggregationRequestStatus(2790)=0 (Accepted).

field.name: Side
field.comment: Conditionally required when TradeAggregationRequestStatus(2790)=0 (Accepted).

field.name: RejectText
field.comment: Optionally used to provide a text narrative for rejecting the request.

field.name: EncodedRejectTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedRejectText(1665) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedRejectText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the RejectText(1328) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

msgdef.descr: TradeAggregationReport(35=DX) is used to respond to the TradeAggregationRequest(35=DW) message. It provides the status of the request (e.g. accepted or rejected) and may also provide additional information supplied by the respondent.

field.name: PostTradePaymentCalculationDate
field.comment: Only PayRequestStuats(2813)=0 (Received) is applicable in this message.

field.name: PostTradePaymentValueDate
field.comment: The date the payment is legally confirmed to settle.

field.name: PostTradePaymentFinalValueDate
field.comment: The actual payment date in the event the payment differs from the date specified in PostTradePaymentValueDate(2826).

field.name: EncodedPostTradePaymentDescLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedPostTradePaymentDesc(2814) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedPostTradePaymentDesc
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the PostTradePaymentDesc(2820) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: PostTradePaymentStatus
field.comment: Used when PayReportTransType(2804)=2 (Status) to report actual payment status from payment service (i.e. after payment or remittance instruction with payment service).

field.name: PayRequestID
field.comment: Conditionally required when responding to PayRequest(35=EA). Omitted for an unsolicited report.

field.name: PayReportRefID
field.comment: Required for PayReportTransType(2804)=1 (Replace).

field.name: ReplaceText
field.comment: May be used to provide reason for PayReportTransType(2804)=1 (Replace).

field.name: EncodedReplaceTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedReplaceText(2801) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedReplaceText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the ReplaceText(2805) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: PayRequestStatus
field.comment: PayRequestStatus(2813)=0 (Received) is not applicable in this message.

field.name: PayDisputeReason
field.comment: May be used to provide reason for PayRequestStatus(2813)=3 (Disputed).

field.name: RejectText
field.comment: May be used to elaborate the reason for rejection or dispute.

field.name: EncodedRejectTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedRejectText(1665) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedRejectText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the RejectText(1328) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: ClearingBusinessDate
field.comment: Echos back the business date of the PayRequest(35=EA) message if this report is responding to a request. When the report is sent unsolicited, this is the business date of the report. This may carry the same date as the payment calculation date in PostTradePaymentCalculationDate(2825).

field.name: EncodedTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedText(355) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the Text(58) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

block.comment: May be included with minimal detail to identify the security or contract for which payments are to be made.
May be included to identify the trade(s) for which payments are to be made. Each instance identifies a separate trade.
Identifies the parties to the contracts or trades. The account to be debited or credited is identified in the PostTradePayment component.

field.name: PayDisputeReason
field.comment: May be used to provide reason for PayReportStatus(2806)=3 (Disputed).

field.name: RejectText
field.comment: May be used to elaborate the reason for rejection or dispute.

field.name: EncodedRejectTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedRejectText(1665) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedRejectText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the RejectText(1328) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: PayRequestRefID
field.comment: Required for PayRequestTransType(2811)=1 (Cancel).

field.name: CancelText
field.comment: May be used to provide reason for PayRequestTransType(2811)=1 (Cancel).

field.name: EncodedCancelTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedCancelText(2808) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedCancelText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the CancelText(2807) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

field.name: ClearingBusinessDate
field.comment: The business date of the request. This may carry the same date as the payment calculation date in PostTradePaymentCalculationDate(2825).

field.name: EncodedTextLen
field.comment: Must be set if EncodedText(355) field is specified and must immediately precede it.

field.name: EncodedText
field.comment: Encoded (non-ASCII characters) representation of the Text(58) field in the encoded format specified via the MessageEncoding(347) field.

block.comment: May be included with minimal detail to identify the security or contract for which payments are to be made.
May be included to identify the trade(s) for which payments are to be made. Each instance identifies a separate trade.
Identifies the parties to the contracts or trades. The account to be debited or credited is identified in the PostTradePayment component.

field.name: PayRequestStatus
field.comment: Only PayRequestStuats(2813)=0 (Received) is applicable in this message.

field.name: CollateralReinvestmentType
field.comment: Required if NoCollateralReinvestments(2845) > 0.

field.name: FundingSource
field.comment: Required if NoFundingSources(2849) > 0.

field.name: TransactionAttributeType
field.comment: Required if NoTransactionAttributes(2871) > 0.

field.name: SideCollateralReinvestmentType
field.comment: Required if NoSideCollateralReinvestments(2864) > 0.

field.name: RelatedOrderID
field.comment: Required if NoOrders(73) > 0.

field.name: RelatedOrderIDSource
field.comment: The same value must be used for all orders having the same OrderRelationship(2890) value.

field.name: OrderRelationship
field.comment: May be used to explicitly express the type of relationship or to provide orders having different relationships.

field.name: OrderOriginationFirmID
field.comment: May be used when aggregating orders that were originally submitted by different firms, e.g. due to a merger or acquisition.
